summary: Take playing with toy trains into the virtual world with ‘My Train World’! Master a variety of puzzles at different difficulty levels in Puzzle Mode. Let your imagination flow in the Sandbox Mode and build the train-set of your dreams. (Note: Saving layouts is disabled in demo)

name: My Dangerous Life
summary: Hinata has only just arrived in New York, but things are already going downhill. Then a handsome stranger offers his help, and suddenly Hinata finds himself in a shared apartment with three hot guys. A rollercoaster of emotions begins.

name: My Ten-day Girlfriend
summary: This is a simulating game combined with Galgame. “Highland Island” is the place where the Devil died, this place has become popular tourism after decades. Not sure if it's the call of fate or conspiracy, me-a senior Otaku is traveling here from another world, and my dream trip starts here! ٩(๑>◡

name: My Sweet Ants!
summary: My Sweet Ants! is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Ants. The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: My Neighbor Alice
summary: My Neighbor Alice is a multiplayer builder-game where players build and create their own virtual lands, interact with neighbors, perform exciting daily activities and earn rewards.

name: My Dear Frankenstein
summary:
“Come. While the darkness is still welcoming...”

“My Dear Frankenstein” is a point-and-click adventure visual novel produced by the indie Japanese circle Number7 and localised by Moonchime Studios.

As a newborn little monster, the protagonist will have to explore the City of Shipberry at night and search for the pieces of his heart that got scattered all around it. Players will get to delve into universal themes like life, friendship and grief through his experiences in this emotional quest.

Content warnings: suicide, cruelty, references to death and the occult.

name: My Mud Game
summary: Do you know Mud? It was a popular multiplayer online game 20 years ago ~ It is only declining with the development of graphical games, and My Mud Game is to let everyone recall the past and even create games developed by their own games.

name: Mysterious Blocks
summary: Mysterious Blocks is a puzzle game in which you will find many interesting and difficult levels.

name: My Dear Prince
summary: A sweet and light yuri story about an airheaded daydreamer and a tomboy set on a quaint Japanese island filled with cute bunnies.

name: Mysterious: Dark Journey
summary: Mysterious: Dark Journey - is an action platformer, where you explore mythical lands full of enigmatic creatures and dangerours passages, hidden behind the Gates. Transform to use different abilities in order to overcome challenges that are waiting for you.

name: My Last Memories About You
summary: My Last Memories About You is about a husband who is fulfilling the last wish of his late wife in this short first-person exploration game. The game is short, but in exchange delivers an emotional and heartwarming story, which stays with the player long after experiencing this adventure.

name: My Silly Life
summary: A linear visual novel about the experiences and thoughts of a young boy seeking for his place to live. Animated backgrounds and character sprites will help you fully immerse yourself in the game's history. Feel the experience of the main character, will you agree with him?

name: My Personal Hilopet
summary: My Personal Hilopet is an 8-bit monster raising game, packed into a digital recreation of a physical toy. Play with, train, and support your virtual friend as they become the ultimate fighter! And along your pet's journey, explore the world to uncover secrets about the its geometric inhabitants.

name: My Very Own Lair
summary: True artificial intelligence is at hand, time to build your very own lair! Start from an old mansion in the UK and pick a place to move. But careful, the World will try to stop you. Will you make it to Mars?

name: My Home Poltergeist
summary: Curse humans with Poltergeist! Ghosts move objects in the mansion so that humans are not exposed to the curse ritual, and humans should carefully observe the objects to prevent the curse rituals from being achieved!

name: My UnReal Pet
summary: My Unreal Pet is an experience game that temporarily protects abandoned dogs for 7 days. Challenge yourself if you can keep a dog!

name: My New Memories
summary: Memories...One of the most important things in our lives. But what happens if you forget who you are? If you don't remember anything? Then you can only hope that the people that do know who you are help you out...This is your journey...On your way to finding new memories...

name: Mysterica
summary: Experience VR combat as if you were an anime character with special abilities!Draw a magic circle with your own hands! Swinging the sword sends a slashing wave into the air.PvP and PvE VR action game. Enjoy the speedy and tense combat.

name: My Friend Pedro: Ripe for Revenge
summary: My Friend Pedro is back in a brand new mobile adventure of blood, bullets and bananas! Flip and fire your way through 37 action packed levels on foot, on a motorcycle and even on a skateboard. Plan your high caliber choreography for the best scores and, if your skin is tough enough, test your skills in Blood Rush mode.

name: My House My Rules
summary: My House My Rules is a horror with elements of humor, the main character is no longer a helpless whipping doll! You will be armed with the most powerful weapon - a word!

name: Mythrealm
summary: Explore a fallen land of mystery and lore. Battle against dark and ancient monsters. Traverse deadly pitfalls, and advance your character in this fantasy 3rd person action RPG. Uncover the chaos that is darkening the land and fight for the magic that empowers the Mythrealm.

name: My Time Alive
summary: In 2023, industry leading pharmaceutical company "HT Pharmaceuticals" found the complete cure for COVID-19, and they released the vaccine to the public. 9 months later, not much is left of mankind. Complete supply missions and conduct research studies to help find the cure to the infection.

name: Mysterious Puzzles Collection: Nemezis, Schizm, Reah
My Little Prince: A Jigsaw Puzzle Tale
summary: “But eyes are blind. You have to look with the heart.” A jigsaw puzzle game to remember a beloved classic story. Contains illustrations created by Katia Numakura with inspiration from “The Little Prince” by Antoine de Saint-Exupéry, and from RPGs.

name: My waifu guild
summary: Collect the entire guild of beautiful girls and guide them through all the dangers. Hordes of opponents await you, giant bosses and naked bodies of the main characters!

name: My Cousin the Rogue
summary: A simple traditional roguelike with ASCII art where you save the monsters instead of hurting them.

name: My Lust Wish
summary: My Lust Wish is an Adult LifeSim RPG Sandbox. The game tells about a young girl Ashley, who came to a small sweet town to study at university. Ashley will have to survive in this city on her own, earn money, buy food and things, study at the university and etc.

name: My Cute Commissar
summary: My Cute Commissar – satyrical historical visual novel with “match-3” type of gameplay. Take part in the political struggle in the 1920’s communist Russia and prevent Stalin’s tyranical rule!

name: MyCompany996
summary: 在《我的公司996》中，你会遇到各种典型职场人物和职场事件，公司危机四伏，如果想要保住饭碗，你需要“机灵点”，与同事维护好关系，哄的老板心花怒放，更快升职、加薪。当然，游戏里可以自由选择，你可以另辟蹊径，制霸职场…… 20余种迥异的大结局，近百种成就，等待你来解锁。

name: My Garage
summary: My Garage is a car simulation game with main focus being simulating real car repair, maintenance, and physics.

name: My Jigsaw Adventures: A Lost Story
summary: A whole new world is within reach; prepare for a fantastic adventure. Piece after piece, complete puzzles to progress in the story. Enjoy puzzles the way you like; decide how you want to play.

name: My Jigsaw Adventures: Forgotten Destiny
summary: Jump into an adventure and travel through fabulous hand-painted jigsaw puzzles! Play the way you want using different number of pieces, shapes and helpers.

name: My Jigsaw Adventures: The Source of Power
summary: Find the pieces to discover and to travel in the Solar System! 45 jigsaw puzzles and in game achievements for an adventure in the middle of the stars!

name: Mysticism
summary: Mysticism is a VR adventure game centred around Snowdonia and the progression up mount Snowdon.

name: My Neighborhood Arcade: Block Puzzle Unit
summary: Choose from 4 different game modes to join tetromino blocks together in Block Puzzle to create and complete rows and columns.

name: My Wife
summary: This is an action puzzle game with a heavy plot.Dedicated to those who have been obsessed with love. In the game, you will encounter all kinds of difficulties, occasionally need your excellent operation to avoid, occasionally need your smart brain to solve puzzles!

name: Mysterium: Secrets & Lies
summary: Other secrets still reside in Warwick Manor... With Secrets & Lies, the second expansion of the game Mysterium, the search for the real culprit gets even more challenging. Thanks to help from the ghost and their 42 new vision cards, it's up to you to shed light on the circumstances of this murder.

name: Mysterium: Hidden Signs
summary: This expansion includes: - 6 suspects, - 6 locations, - 6 objects, - 42 new vision cards.

name: My Fluffy Life
summary: ꒰ welcome to cotton-floof, a countryside village on the poofties' world for newborn stuffed animals to experience life safely and happily. a simple game about taking a walk, collecting memories, decorating and making friends !! take some rest and enjoy the small things ♡ ꒱

name: My Low Poly City
summary: Build your own colorful mini city, and take a ride in it.

name: Mystical Lights
summary: Mystical Lights is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: My boss is weird
summary: "My boss is weird" is a career AVG choice play as the core of the game, the game about a workplace Xiaobai, was inexplicably suspected as a peeper, in order to prove his innocence. In the game, players will face a series of choices, some of which seem small, but lead to different results.

name: Mythlands: Flappy Dragon
summary: Flappy Dragon is an endless runner with realistic graphics. Avoid obstacles to gain points pick up lives, shields and coins.

name: My Strong Horse
summary: Become a knight on a medieval horse, and defeat 5 enemy captains to win.

name: Mystery Solitaire: Grimm's Tales 3
summary: Help the girl become a friend with Mother Hulda and back home!

name: Mythic Writer
summary: The Mythic Writer is a notetaking and worldbuilding application that lets you write and organize your creative writings, content and world maps.

name: Mysterious warrior
summary: Mysterious warrior - Introduces a 2D action platformer adventure. You have to play as a mystical warrior, carry out the orders of the servants of the deity and destroy the evil spirits that have infected this world.

name: My Life Changed
summary: In this game I will tell, through 6 puzzle arts, a little about an event that changed the lives of thousands of people. Play using various features to aid your experience, such as a relaxing soundtrack, different difficulty levels, scene preview, etc.

name: My Furry Neighbour
summary: There's a new girl in town! You live a boring otaku life until one day your new neighbour completely changes everything. Experience a story full of romance, comedy and a little personal drama!

name: My Home Town
summary: A tiny accident occur in modern Japanese town.

name: My Village Life
summary: My Village Life is a open world village simulator vehicle driving game.

name: My Best Nightmare
summary: The quest with psychological horror elements, nice pixel art, and a non-linear story.

name: Mystery
summary: Darkness and silence. Then a beep that precedes the opening of the cell in the isolation ward. A bright light turns on in the camera. You are again being taken for questioning about the disappearance of a group of young guys. The story is full of secrets and only you can put all the dots.

name: Mysteries of Shaola: The Cave
summary: Become Ice of Zuda, the legendary investigator caught in a web of intrigue woven by corrupt forces.

name: My Smug Bully Girlfriend
summary: You play as a minimum wage worker with a rich girlfriend that bullies you for your unsuccessful life. In an effort to impress her, you decide to get involved in other business opportunities that leads you into a fight with robots and dangerous gangsters.

name: Myth of Mist: Legacy
summary: In the mist-surrounded City of Time and Eternity, you are the son of a noble family, going between various factions aiming to fight against the upcoming disaster of the Mist of Doomsday. This game is for players who love SLGs and multi-ending RPGs. Join us and write your own legend!

name: My Fight: Mariana Ro
summary: You can open a new game character in the game My Fight - Mariana Ro, having bought this set of DLC. The character will be immediately available after purchase.

name: My Fight: EeOneGuy
summary: You can open a new game character in the game My Fight - Ivangya, having bought this set of DLC. The character will be immediately available after purchase.

name: My Lil Horror
summary: Just a basic puzzle solving/survival game. Kill zombies, have fun, get to the end without dying! Updated versions may include more weapons, extra chapters, and more.

name: My Hero One's Justice: Playable Character - Pro Hero Endeavor
summary: Unlocks Endeavor as a playable fighter.

name: My Hero One's Justice: Mission - Above and Beyond Endeavor
summary: Unlocks the additional mission ""Above and Beyond."" Complete it to acquire new items and accessories.

name: My Hero One's Justice: Mission - O.F.A Deku Shoot Style
summary: Unlocks the additional mission ""O.F.A"" Complete it to acquire new items and accessories.

name: My Hero One's Justice: Playable Character - Inasa Yoarashi
summary: Unlocks Inasa Yoarashi as a playable fighter.

name: My Hero One's Justice: Additional Mission - Gale
summary: Unlocks the additional mission "Gale." Complete it to acquire new items and accessories.

name: My Hero One's Justice 2: DLC Pack 5 - Gentle & La Brava
summary: Play as Gentle & La Brava in My Hero One's Justice 2! This pack also includes 10 color variations for Gentle & La Brava’s costumes.

name: My Hero One's Justice 2: DLC Pack 3 - Itsuka Kendo
summary: Play as Itsuka Kendo in My Hero One's Justice 2! This pack also includes 10 color variations for Itsuka Kendo's costume.

name: My Hero One's Justice 2: DLC Pack 2 - Mei Hatsume
summary: Play as Mei Hatsume in My Hero One's Justice 2! This pack also includes 10 color variations for Mei Hatsume's costume.

name: My Hero One's Justice 2: DLC Pack 1 - Hawks
summary: Play as Hawks in My Hero One's Justice 2! This pack also includes 10 color variations for Hawks' costume.

name: My Hero One's Justice 2: DLC Pack 4 - Tetsutetsu Tetsutetsu
summary: Play as Tetsutetsu Tetsutetsu in My Hero One's Justice 2! This pack also includes 10 color variations for Tetsutetsu Tetsutetsu’s costume.

name: Mystic Destinies: Serendipity of Aeons - Takumi Epilogue
summary: Several months after you solved a years-long case, you and Takumi are still working as partners on dangerous missions. With Valentine's Day coming up, you both resolve to try and relax for once and go on a proper date.

name: Mystic Destinies: Serendipity of Aeons - Shinji
summary: "It's fine, don't worry about it." These are common words said by Shinji, who is well-known around Hagiwara's campus for being a helpful guy. But when people misread his reliable nature for something more, he withdraws into himself.

name: Mystic Destinies: Serendipity of Aeons - Takumi
summary: Rejecting the path set before her by Professor Kazama, Tsubasa turns to her childhood friend Takumi for help in finding her mother – an enigma directly tied to Takumi’s brother, Yasu. Despite being targeted by an all-powerful vampire mafia, the pair follows the faint trails of evidence, spending night after night in the underworld,...

name: Mystic Destinies: Serendipity of Aeons - Tatsuya
summary: Forced to take sides even as she tries to control on her unstable powers and emotions, Tsubasa is pulled into large scale business negotiations and the politics of the ancient Ryu clan. Can you navigate a path wrought with mysteries and drama to find happiness?

name: Mystic Destinies: Serendipity of Aeons - Tatsuya Epilogue
summary: Fast forward two years to the future and see how life has changed for you and Tatsuya. While you've never been more in love, you're not quite as far along in the relationship as you'd hoped. After a romantic date though, your life changes forever. Can an old threat bring promises of a new, brighter future?

name: Mystic Destinies: Serendipity of Aeons - Shou Epilogue
summary: It's been five months since the incidents at Caro mansion. Your relationship with Shou is going well and you even bring him along to meet your family. But there are still some things you feel Shou is keeping from you about his new life.

name: Mystic Destinies: Serendipity of Aeons - Hikaru: Book 1
summary: In the finale of Mystic Destinies: Serendipity of Aeons, become Tsubasa one last time and begin an epic journey spanning time and space while uncovering some of largest secrets of the Mystic Destinies universe. In the process, you may just find yourself falling in love with a man who is anything but what you expected.

name: Mystic Destinies: Serendipity of Aeons - Deluxe Edition
summary: Expand the Mystic Destinies experience with additional content!

name: Mystic Destinies: Serendipity of Aeons - Shinji Epilogue
summary: One year after the events of the Spring Castle, you and Shinji are still together. You two seem to both be growing and changing and yet...there are still so many questions unanswered. Finally, you turn to the only one who may be able to help answer them. But even if you know the answer, will you be able to grasp the truth?

name: Mystic Destinies: Serendipity of Aeons - Shou
summary: Despite his problems, Shou does his best to help support Tsubasa as she learns about her new world and how to control her powers. But as they grow closer, the two soon learn of an ancient threat lurking amidst the darkness: one that will take all of their abilities to stop, else they'll forfeit their very lives.

name: Mystic Destinies: Serendipity of Aeons - Hikaru: Book II
summary: In the finale of Mystic Destinies: Serendipity of Aeons, become Tsubasa one last time and begin an epic journey spanning time and space while uncovering some of largest secrets of the Mystic Destinies universe.

name: My Furry Dictator
summary: Wake up, comrade, you arrived to the best country in the world! We have socialism, paws and most importantly - a hot dictator. Experience the story of a young billionare and his relationship with the most insane woman in his life!

name: My Neighborhood Arcade: Pathfinder
summary: In Pathfinder, there are 3 worlds with 16 puzzles each that require you to find the path connecting dots across the shape lines without going over a line more than once. You can currently play Pathfinder for free in My Neighborhood Arcade.

name: My Neighborhood Arcade: Number Crunchers
summary: Enjoy Several Number based puzzle casual games: Power Puzzle, Get 11, 2048 Bricks, Hexa Power Puzzle and 10x10. You can currently play for free in My Neighborhood Arcade.

name: My Neighborhood Arcade: Rolling Ball 3D Unit
summary: Guide your ball through an obstacle course in Rolling Ball 3D. Stay on platforms, travel through tunnels, jump ramps and avoid blocks to reach new levels in this infinite runner game.

name: My Neighborhood Arcade: Tower Stacker Unit
summary: Enjoy this classic stacking-style game as you build towering sky scrapers. Precision matters to achieve the highest heights—any part of a block that doesn’t align with the building falls away, making your target increasingly smaller.

name: My Neighborhood Arcade: Speed Box Unit
summary: In this infinite runner, you guide your box inside another box avoiding obstacles to collect cubes. Collect enough cubes and go up in challenge rating. (This game is currently available to play for free in My Neighborhood Arcade)

name: My Neighborhood Arcade: Hoop Swish
summary: Hoop Swish is one of the My Neighborhood Arcade ticket machines. You get a ticket for new difficulty level you reach in this spin on the classic basket ball game where you move the hoop to where the ball is going. You can currently play this game for free in My Neighborhood Arcade.

name: My Neighborhood Arcade: RC Targets - Dronez
summary: Pilot an RC drone through a target course In RC Targets: Dronez @ Castle^Punk. Beat your best times as you navigate through target gates on multiple courses in 2 environments, Medieval Castle and CyberPunk settings.

name: My Neighborhood Arcade: InfiniMath Unit
summary: Challenge and hone your math and logic skills with InfiniMath, an endless math puzzle game. From simple to complex, the puzzle difficulty increases as you progress.

name: My Neighborhood Arcade: Wheels of Fortunes Unit
summary: Wheels of Fortunes is one of the My Neighborhood Arcade Ticket Machines. In Wheels of Fortunes, spin up to four wheels at a time to earn credits and tickets—you could win big…or you could walk away with fewer tickets* than you started with.

name: Mystika 4: Dark Omens
summary: Sarel, a power-hungry dragon, stole the book "Dark Omens" causing the activation of an ancient inter-dimensional portal located north of Lumina, allowing evil creatures to invade the world.Help Alrik and Tenebria seal this gate! Explore the world of Lumina through 160 magic levels.

name: My Universe: Doctors & Nurses
summary:
Step into the shoes of a doctor or a nurse! Diagnose illnesses and infections so you can treat and help your many patients. Set out on an adventure in a buzzing hospital environment, meet all sorts of characters and discover a story full of surprises!

Play as two new hospital recruits! Gradually realize that your day-to-day existence is going to be anything but restful. Build relationships with the other members of your team and get to know their personalities. Over the course of your next adventure, you’ll take care of various patients, listen to them carefully to understand their symptoms and play fun mini-games to treat them. Every day is a new challenge with its fair share of surprises including a rival colleague called Doctor Pierce! Try not to let him distract you from your patient’s care!

name: My Universe: Interior Designer
summary:
Start your own agency as a young interior designer and receive your first clients in your office. Discuss with them to find out their ideas, preferences, and expectations for their dream house. Once the project has been defined, you will have to renovate their home and fulfill the objectives of the mission to satisfy each client. The happier your client is with the result, the more your fame and level increase, unlocking new items, styles, decoration possibilities and bigger projects! With hard work and a sense of style you’ll soon become the most famous designer in town!

Once an experienced designer, you can decide to keep working on a client’s project or to design your own and even choose between the renovation mode or the decoration mode. In renovation mode, modify the house’s structure by destroying or building walls, remove the hard wood floor or tiles, paint, change the lining, fix the electricity installation, or add a water supply. Then switch to the decoration mode to choose and set up furniture, plants, carpets, wallpapers, curtains and so on. It’s up to you to give each house a real personality.

Feel free to work on your own projects whenever you want. You can choose the structure of your house: Flat, studio, house or duplex and decorate as you wish.

name: My Universe: Puppies and Kittens
summary: Whether you’re a dog or a cat person, your new companions are waiting for you to take them home and give them endless love. Help them grow daily with good care and proper training so they will become well behaved pets. Do not forget to give them lots of cuddles and play with them often. Each animal is unique and has its own personality and preferences so pay attention to your animal needs and they will give it back to you by becoming the most loyal of friends. You can even teach your pet tricks and train them to enter competitions and unlock rewards & new accessories. Participate also in various activities like exploring your neighborhood to find treasures, visiting the meadow and the dog park or go to the shop to acquire new items. Engage with other pets whist walking your companion so they can make four-legged friends to play with and get advice from other owners on how to raise your puppy well.

name: Mystery Trackers: Train to Hellswich - Collector's Edition
summary: It's no ordinary train ride...

name: My First Furry
summary: Short puzzle game with beautiful furry girls. Relaxing music and cozy yet spicy atmosphere. Awesome for relax after a day at work.

name: My Boyfriend's a Werecat!
summary: You are Zack Kuroneko, a 20-something college grad living blissfully with his long term boyfriend, Spencer Waters. One day, however, Zack begins to notice something strange. Feels strange. The sun feels so nice to lay in, and the birds look all too fun to chase. Zack has become a Werecat!

name: My Territory Was Witches' Island!?
summary: Territory Management X Tower Defense SLG

name: My First Date RPG
summary: In the "My First Date RPG" series, play as characters who experience a big part of growing up: going out on your first date!

name: My Living Things
summary: My name is Jeremy. I can bring things to life.

name: My Universe: My Baby - New Edition
summary:
New Edition content:
My Baby first edition on Switch stopped when your baby was 24 months old. Now you can keep raising your baby up to 3 years old!

name: My Train Arrives: Neighbouring cities
summary: With this DLC you will be able to play on a big map with three cities on it.

name: My Train Arrives: City pack
summary: In the DLC you will get access to three new cities.

name: My Train Arrives: Big cities
summary: In this update you get access to two big maps.

name: Mystery Tales: Master of Puppets - Collector's Edition
summary: Can you save a family from a deadly presence?

name: Mystery Case Files: The Harbinger - Collector's Edition
summary: A small-town murder case hides a revelation that will shake the agency to its core!

name: My Lovely Daughter: The Inquisitor
summary: A mysterious guest is coming to the Salach Village. The Inquisitor DLC includes new game mechanic, new story and gameplay adjustment for My Lovely Daughter.

name: My Father's Secret
summary: Your father abandoned you as a child. After many years of searching, you have tracked down where he lives. What awaits you in this mysterious house on the hill?

name: Mysterious Song
summary: Mysterious Song is an RPG strongly influenced by the style of the early Final Fantasy games. Your character is a knight, sent by the king to investigate the trouble arising in the land, with the help of two other party members whom you pick up as you travel. The combat is turn-based, with a very simple magic system based on spell points. One party member is a mage, one specializes in physical combat, and your main character is a mix. There is no class selection, only leveling up.

name: My Personal World
summary: If you bored at stay at home and you want to create your own Personal World you can do it with this game. Random objects spawn from up and every 15 minutes world gravity activates, you have to finish the your personal world before big time over.

name: Mytheon: Egypt Pack
summary: The gods of Greece have been defeated, but they are not the only pantheon who has risen up against mankind. In this expansion to MYTHEON, The gods of Egypt led by Anubis have laid siege to the city of Thebes. Only the mightiest of Stonecasters can hope to prevail against this new threat!

name: My Life As An Archeologist
summary: Click your way through 100 levels of archeological treasure hunting, loot and improve your equipment, uncover build-defining artefacts on every boss, choose between three different classes and find the one that best fits your playstyle! Research monsters cards and improve every run!

name: My Journey to Your World
summary: A casual free-to-play puzzle game with randomly scrambled puzzle pieces that can be solved under a certain time to win.

name: Mystic Vale: Vale of Magic
summary: Mystic Vale: Vale of Magic introduces 54 new advancement cards and 18 vale cards to the Mystic Vale base game, expanding players' options and opening up new crafting combinations.

name: Mystic Vale: Mana Storm
summary: The campaign to restore Gaia’s realm continues as other druids and creatures join the ranks. With the extra resources, will the cursed land finally be cured? Discover 48 new Advancement Cards, 18 Vale Cards, 8 Leaders and for the first-time amulets in a bid to win the fight.

name: Mystic Vale: Vale of the Wild
summary: The Vale of the Wild expansion introduces two new mechanics to Mystic Vale, making your cards even stronger and opening up a whole new realm of combo possibilities! Pick your druidic leader and head into battle, the Valley of Life depends on you!

name: Mystery Island
summary: Millionaire James Harvey has died and his son inherited it all. Now he is missing. It is your job to solve the mystery!

name: Mystic Rhythms
summary: In this game, you take the role of a normal and successful guy married to a gorgeous Russian woman. You met her online and following a quick long distance courtship, you paid for her trip out of Russia and the fancy engagement ceremony that followed. Since then life has been good and you've been the envy of many.

name: Mythos Ever After: A Cthulhu Dating Sim
summary: Just your average cosmic horror dating sim.

name: Mysteries of Peak Valley: Case 1 - The Lost Sonata
summary:
After receiving a mysterious phone call, psychic medium Zack Gellar travels to a large estate house in northern Peak Valley, where he is greeted by a desperate woman's pleas for help. Seeing that the woman is on the brink, he agrees to help her, vowing to communicate with the spirit that haunts her, and in turn help it to find eternal peace.

Mysteries of Peak Valley centers around Zack Gellar, psychic medium. Zack gained his ability to speak to the dead after an automobile accident that made him an orphan. After mastering in psychology during his formative years at university, he decided to make a living by communicating with the spirits that haunt his clients and, in turn, help the souls left forever to wander the mortal realm find their eternal peace.

name: Mysteries of Peak Valley: Case 2 - The White Lady
summary:
It’s been a year since the Boulyn incident and a prestigious case lures Zack back to Peak Valley. Arriving at Burnom Manor, famous for being allegedly haunted by a woman dressed all in white, Zack must use his psychic medium talents to finally unravel the legend of the White Lady.

Mysteries of Peak Valley centers around Zack Gellar, psychic medium. Zack gained his ability to speak to the dead after an automobile accident that made him an orphan. After mastering in psychology during his formative years at university, he decided to make a living by communicating with the spirits that haunt his clients and, in turn, help the souls left forever to wander the mortal realm find their eternal peace.

name: Mysteries of Peak Valley: Case 3 - The Ruin of Souls
summary:
A hotshot investigative journalist finds himself embroiled in a homicide case. A controversial psychic medium awakens in a strange location suffering from memory loss. Mysteries of Peak Valley 3: The Ruin of Souls takes the player on a grueling journey through a nefarious conspiracy and tangled webs of illusion where secrets are revealed, mysteries are unraveled and truths shall be questioned. Is this the end or merely the beginning?

Sunny Penguin Games presents the free-to-play third instalment of the supernatural ghost drama series, Mysteries of Peak Valley, blending time-honored point-and-click adventure gaming with modern expectations and visual novel elements.

----

Mysteries of Peak Valley centers around Zack Gellar, psychic medium. Zack gained his ability to speak to the dead after an automobile accident that made him an orphan. After mastering in psychology during his formative years at university, he decided to make a living by communicating with the spirits that haunt his clients and, in turn, help the souls left forever to wander the mortal realm find their eternal peace.

name: My Friendly Neighborhood
summary: Something is amiss with everyone's favorite Saturday morning puppet show! For years, the colorful cast of The Friendly Neighborhood delighted audiences across the globe with their cooky capers and educational adventures. However, as time went on and interest waned, the production studio found themselves out of money and closed their doors for good. Toy sales would dwindle, and birthday balloons and cakes would find new mascots. In time, the once household names would fade into increasingly niche fandoms. Until one night years later, the studio unexpectedly clicks back to life and starts broadcasting The Friendly Neighborhood. TV sets across the globe flicker for a moment before the familiar puppets return for a surprise encore! But this isn't your typical family-friendly holiday special... are those puppets eating each other!?

name: Myriad: A Rogue Adventure
summary: Myriad is an Action-Adventure game with Roguelite elements. Play as a new character each run, loot tons of weapons, and fight hordes of enemies in a randomly generated world.

name: Mystery Swords
summary: Mystery Swords is a survival game with RPG elements. Your village was attacked by evil orcs. To protect the inhabitants, you, as the best soldier, are sent to explore the forest, but the enemies were much closer than it seemed. Can you stop a whole horde of hostile orcs?

name: My Name Is Velcro
summary: My Name Is Velcro is a hardcore platformer. You play as a piece of dirt named Velcro. The goal of the game is to grab the ceiling with the web and move on. There are several types of traps. You are also forbidden to touch any edges.

name: Mythic: Forest Warden
summary: An action game where you play as a forest`s pagan god in the WW II times. Use god`s magic, brute force, sharp claws, and Nazi`s weapons to drive Germans away from your land.

name: Mystery at Morgoth
summary: Who is behind the evil events that unfurled in Feldar Vale? Journey to the land of Morgoth to halt the dark force that terrorizes the people and learn who is behind the mysterious Cabal. An adventure for 4-6 characters of Level 1-6, loosely based on Dungeons & Dragons Open Game License (OGL 1e/2e).

name: My Inner Darkness is a Hot Anime Girl!
summary: My Inner Darkness Is A Hot Anime Girl! is a 3D turn-based RPG game featuring surreal enemy designs and dream-like locations, packed into a gripping story about overcoming the thoughts and memories you would rather not have but can't stop thinking about. You know, the ones that keep you up at night.

name: My Creampie Heaven
summary: Three Japanese visual novels merged into one! Pick between three gorgeous goddesses and purify one of them with the power of LOVE~ There is the cool beauty Reiu, a sexy saint Cecil, and the foxy Yuuko who doubles as your childhood friend and a fluffy-tailed goddess of agriculture.

name: My Dream Girls
summary: This is not only a game, but also a test of the brain and cattle. Is the girl in your dream black silk, flesh-colored or bikini or...?

name: My Dream Girl
summary: Relax game to keep you in a good mood

name: Mystery Box: Hidden Secrets
summary: A point-and-click puzzle game where you have to solve intriguing riddles around different boxes and discover some cool stories about popular inventions!

name: My Little Car Wash
summary: You're the boss of the car wash - do you get all these cars clean again? The "must have" for all young cars fans! Experiment in your lab and mix your own super wash foam. With the great photo feature you can make funny pictures of yourself. With the permission of your parents you also can send these pictures to your friends. A variety of different vehicles and functions ensures long-lasting gaming fun.

name: Myrddin
summary:
The classic handheld game, back in the palm of your hand. A faithful reproduction of the late-'70s bestseller Merlin, with all six of the original games:
• Tic-Tac-Toe
• Music Machine
• Echo
• Blackjack 13
• Magic Square
• Mindbender

name: My Hero One's Justice 2: DLC Pack 6 - Hitoshi Shinso
summary: Play as Hitoshi Shinso in MY HERO ONE'S JUSTICE 2! This pack also includes 10 color variations for Hitoshi Shinso's costume.

name: My Hero Academia: Heart of Heroes
summary: Every ordinary person is born extraordinary. You have a hero's heart and vow to be a hero to save others!

name: Mystic Saga
summary:
Embark on an extraordinary journey in the world of Mystic Saga, where the thrill of assembling a diverse ensemble of extraordinary allies intertwines seamlessly with the exhilaration of engaging in strategic conflicts.
Uncover mystical beings with unique abilities, and strategically deploy them in epic battles that test your tactical prowess. Explore the enchanting realms, discover rare companions, and forge alliances as you delve into the rich narrative of Mystic Saga.
Your destiny awaits as you master the art of collection and immerse yourself in the heart-pounding excitement of battle, shaping the saga that echoes through the ages.
developers: China Mobile Games and Entertainment Group (CMGE)

name: Mystery of Fortune 3
summary:
Mystery of Fortune 3 is the ninth story of Fortune Chronicles Episode series. This is an official sequel and the third story of SRPG Mystery of Fortune that was released in 2014 and 2016.
Go for an adventure to find Meteor Dragon hid deep inside of the dungeon and search for "the Ether Ambergris", the source of all magic.

name: Mystic Gunner
summary: Evade quickly and shoot without hesitation! You don't have to show mercy to your enemies. Prepare your gear and skills and explore random generated areas. Collect powerful weapons and equipment, dodge bullets and defeat all enemies while acquiring new skills! The roguelike elements are well designed, making the game very easy to control and offers an andrenaline-pumping gameplay.

name: My Little Restaurant
summary: In My Little Restaurant you seat your guests, collect orders, deliver meals and earn money. Every once in a while jump into kitchen and prepare some tastylicious burgers or perfect sushi. Touching, tapping and sliding fun, all with one finger and all for the whole family. Thirty-nine unique levels, extra game features, power-ups and a love story to follow. You won’t find a better deal at any other place.

name: Mystic Garden
summary:
Mystic Garden is a tranquil yet engaging puzzle game. Can you turn ALL of the plants green?

Arrange the water drops to give each plant just the right amount of moisture, restoring the garden to its perfect balance. Then watch it magically bloom!
Over 600 garden puzzles will keep you mystified for quite some time. But there is no rush. The gardens reward the patient and reflective player.

name: My Little Ramenbar
summary: Create healthy meals with the help of delicious recipes and create your customers a smile on their face. Learn different dishes and serve your customers to earn a huge profits. Use your hard earned money to buy more props to upgrade your kitchen and complete all levels!

name: Myriads: Renaissance
summary: Myriads: Renaissance is a turn-based strategy game with city-building and 4X mechanics. Set in a fantasy world made up of thousands of floating islands, you must grow your capital and expand your kingdom. Resist waves of powerful corsairs and construct defence towers to survive their incursions.

name: My Beloved Faction
summary: Is that dude in my team or not?

name: My Rusty Submarine
summary: You are the proud owner of a rather rusty submarine, on your way to discover the deepest depths of the ocean. Now and then there might be a small leak or another annoyance but that's what you love about your very own submarine, it's a two way relationship giving repairs and in return receiving shelter and transportation. So grab a friend and go on a journey, be careful to stay on track to not end up loosing your valuable progress. Keep your boat intact and reach places nobody has reached before.

name: My Puzzles
summary: In this puzzle-game adapted for children from 3 to 8 years old, you will make puzzles in many universes with Fun, one of the Fun4Family's mascots!

name: My Legs Got Tubed
summary: Your doctor just threw away your legs. Have fun! v1.6 out now!

name: My Defi Pet
summary:
My DeFi Pet is the initiative for our vision of a mass-adoption blockchain game. The name encompasses the three characteristics of the game: “Pet” raising game, “DeFi” features integrated, and “My” personalization.

My DeFi Pet" revolves around a core loop of engaging gaming activities such as collecting, breeding, evolving, battling with, and trading/socializing for pets. It uses the
concept of Season to break down the game progress into smaller parts. This mechanism complements our human tendency for short term rewards.

name: My Place
summary: My Place is a 2017 horror game that acts like a normal indie game, but when the player gets more and more into the game, it begins to act corrupt like something is wrong with it and it's up to the player to explore the corruption this game has until there's an end. It features a story of a suspicious "Rose" that is making the game act very strange. It also features characters you meet and some bosses you kill with a powerful flower that you obtain later in the game. You have to obtain the supplies to make the key which leads to the exit of freedom with little you have. But the question is "is it really an exit"?

name: Mysteries Under Lake Ophelia
summary: In Mysteries Under Lake Ophelia you play as a young kid who has decided to fish at the titular Lake Ophelia. You'll find yourself simply fishing the day away and trading in those fish for either a yummy meal or some new gear.

name: My Dear Neighbor, edition 404
summary: Go to your neighbor’s house for dinner and end up in a glitchy nightmare !

name: My Dream Job: How I Survived Job Hunting in Animation
summary: A bitsy game about career choices, heartache, and perseverance.

name: Mycorrhiza
summary:
Mycorrhiza is a love letter to horror manga in the form of a visual novel. Some of our biggest inspirations include the works of Junji Ito and Masaaki Nakayama.

While Scott is trying to find a way back home, reality distorts and people’s morals start shifting in cruel and unexpected ways. A peculiar plant transforming animals, a horrifying comedy trend and a strange building trapping people. Each of the three arcs explores different terrors.

As you explore this terrifying world, you'll find out more and more about how and why Scott is trapped in it and what lead up to Scott being spirited away.

The game features a manga aesthetic with animated CGs and character art drawn by a manga artist, a focus on elaborate audio implementation, as well as an honest attempt to make the game accessible by providing visual audio cues and a dyslexic font option.

name: My Potion Shop
summary: A game where you brew some potions for some people!

name: My Loving Wife
summary: This is the story of you and your wife. Every day you come home from work to see her and the two of you spend time together. You love her moew than anything and hope you're time together will last forever.

name: Myth: A Guff's Tale
summary: Journey through the twisted labyrinth of a Grumbling Cave Troll. Your imagination is the key to every locked door, the sword that will slay any foe!

name: My Little Roguelike
summary: My Little Roguelike is an exciting roguelike game where every run is unique.

name: My Very Own Train Station
summary: There are many different trains you could take - which one will you take?

name: My Favorite Match
summary: A broken heart, a matchmaker, and a twist of fate change her life forever.

name: My Master's Birthday
summary: You play as a werewolf butler named Damien. it's October 31st, and he wants to impress his master, Victoria, by buying her her favorite foods for her birthday!

name: My Grumpy Hyena!
summary: As seen on TV. (*Not actually on TV)

name: My Talking Tom 2
summary: From the creators of My Talking Tom comes a new global hit game, My Talking Tom 2! In this game, the famous pet cat Tom is going on an amazing life adventure! The coolest cat on the block: Talking Tom is funnier and more lively than ever before!

name: Mystic Realm Dizzy
summary: A fan game, inspired by classic Dizzy games

name: Mystery of the Opera: The Phantom's Secret
summary: Find hidden objects, explore beautiful worlds, play dozens of mini-games, enjoy challenging quests, and solve the Phantom's Mystery!

name: Mystery Tales: The House of Others
summary: Your brother is the host of Ghost Riders – a popular ghost hunting TV show, but one night you receive a strange package that forewarns his death! You’ll need your special astral glasses to help you view the past and interact with the astral plane, but first you’ll have to find them! Travel to the haunted mansion of a serial killer and unwrap this unsolved ghost story, before you and your brother become the next chapter of it in this haunting hidden-object puzzle adventure game!

name: Mystera Legacy
summary: Free 2D sandbox MMORPG in open beta. Play in your browser!

name: Mystic Tribes
summary:
Ancient Creatures Lived Across, From Gigantic Dinos To Spiders With Claws;
Wield Blades & Axes To Win Big Successes, Break Out The Cage Of This Stone Age Madness!

name: My Empire
summary: My Empire was a city building facebook game, with an ancient Greco-Roman theme.

name: Mythic Heroes
summary:
Dark forces threaten the fate of the world, but you are not alone!
Summon an army of unique Gods and Heroes from distinct cultures to create your own elite team.
You can then enhance their abilities with powerful new skills, unlock their iconic weapons, and strengthen them for epic battles.
Your game will even collect rewards while you are AFK to help you save the realm!

name: Mystery Miniaturist
summary: A Disco Elysium Fangame

name: My 3rd Date with my Cyber Girlfriend
Mystfed
summary: A Short Horror Game with Clicker-style about feeding a Mysterious Monster lurking in the dark

name: Mysterious Unnamed Space Game
summary: Explore a distant galaxy and find a way home.

name: My World Still Burns
summary: Life on the run has not taught Lio Fotia the first thing about domesticity, laundry or cooking. Still, that won't keep him from creating the World's #1 Dinner for his second anniversary with Galo Thymos. Lio used to lead the Burnish in their fight against oppression, surely he can manage one simple meal! Meanwhile, Galo has planned an anniversary surprise of his own...

name: My Hero Holiday
summary: Holiday-themed Otome game in the "My Hero Academia" universe.

name: Mystik Adventure
summary:
You enter a world, after selecting New Game and entering a 'World-Seed'.

This number determines how the world looks and plays like. Find powerful spells and mighty weapons and armors that help you bring peace to the worlds!

The goal for the hero is to retrieve 3 crystals out of the dungeons and use them to enter the Void where the Dark Master waits. Can you defeat him? Or can you defeat him more than once?

name: My Vampire Girlfriend.
summary: Can you choose between your best friend and becoming a vampire?

name: Myether
summary: 16 bit style world building survival game. Craft. Expand. Survive.

name: My Name is Legion
summary: A top-down dungeon explorer where you need to find power-ups and choose which ones fit your style best.

name: My Best Friend's Birthday
summary: Give something nice for your friend's special day!

name: My Special Little Flower
summary: minimal 2d adventure about gay plants.

name: My Cabin
summary: Paint your dream cabin landscape.

name: My Hero Academia: Ultra Impact
summary:
My Hero Academia Ultra Impact is a mobile RPG where players can experience 3v3 turn-based battles and other campaigns, along with game-original stories that further explore the world with various cast members of the beloved anime and manga series. The app had an original Japanese launch mid-2021 before releasing in English on February 9, 2022.

The English version of Ultra Impact pushed out material until they were caught up with the Japanese version, and now all new gacha units and events are released concurrently on both servers.

name: My Adventures Checking Out "Animals of the World: The Adventures of Civette the Space-Faring Civet"
summary:
Year 3112 aboard The Adamant Gambit.

The best book in the whole library.

name: My Story
summary: A short, narrative-driven, precision platformer about the most toxic community on Earth: Human Social Interaction

name: My Last First Kiss
summary: The Story: Even after all these years, you haven’t forgotten about your first love. You try confessing your feelings to him, but he turns you down. Luckily the friends you grew up with are there to help mend your broken heart… until that night, when you become more than just friends… Characters: Ayato Hidaka "The Likeable Popular Guy" Ichiya Misono "The Unfriendly Lone Wolf" Makoto Morimachi "The Loyal Older Brother" Takamune Kitami "The Passive Soccer Player" Riku Morimachi "The Quiet Younger Brother" Contents: Includes "Main Stories" in the app "Love 365: Find Your Story," up until "Delivering the News"

name: My Candy Love: High School Life
summary: A dating sim where the scenario adapts entirely to your choices for a unique love story! My Candy Love: High School Life is the first season of My Candy Love. The season ran from March 16, 2011, to April 24, 2018, ending with a total of 40 episodes.

name: My Candy Love: University Life
summary: My Candy Love: University Life is the second season of My Candy Love that happens four years after the events of the last season, where Candy returns to the city to complete her college education at Anteros Academy. It ran from June 6, 2018, to March 4, 2020, with a total of 20 episodes.

name: My Candy Love: Love Life
summary:
Three years have passed since Candy graduated from Anteros Academy. Now owner and manager of the Cosy Bear Café, Candy will have to navigate her adult life with the help of her university sweetheart.

My Candy Love: Love Life is the third season of My Candy Love, which follows after the events of the previous season. It began on March 4th, 2020 and finished on November 10th, 2021, with a total of 15 episodes.

name: My Nemesis and Hero
summary: Join Kai in his daily life as he fails to realize the two guys, who he knew since childhood, have a huge crush on him. One is his best friend, and the other is his rival. So they can't possibly have romantic feelings for him... right?

name: My Soldiers
summary: My Soldiers places you in the role of a soldier who's new to a post near the border, you are gonna meet three soldiers here. So "My Soldiers" tells a story that happens in this small post with these guys. These guys have different personalities, There are 3 routes and over 100 CGs in all.

name: Mysteries of Darkness
summary:
A roguelike single-player card game where you battle fierce creatures in turn-based combat.
Win battles to improve your cards, and build a powerful deck capable of defeating the demon that opened the portal to hell.

name: Mystik Belle: Enchanted Edition
summary: Welcome to Hagmore School of Magic! Step into the clogs of a freshman witch-in-training Belle MacFae, and explore ancient haunted castle, while solving inventory puzzles!

name: My Sweet Zombie!
summary: When you crave cookies instead of brains.

name: Mystical Riddles: Snowy Peak Hotel - Collector's Edition
summary: Your journalist friend went missing while investigating weird happenings in a mysterious hotel. You are the only one who can save her and uncover the truth before it’s too late. Are you up for the challenge?

name: Mystery of Fortune 2 Refine
summary: Explore dungeons with your own army and try to make the most efficient corps.

name: Mystery Tales: Art and Souls
summary: Will you find a way out of the Painted World?

name: Mystery Trackers: The Fall of Iron Rock
summary:
Elephant Games brings you the latest exhilarating installment of the Mystery Trackers series!

After five years, the Mystery Trackers finally have an idea of where your lost colleague could be! But Iron Rock isn't the town you expected when you arrive to find it patrolled by the new Mayor's robots, leaving little hope for the remaining residents to escape! Can you use your top-notch detective skills to find out what's really going on and escape with the residents in time?! Find out in this thrilling Hidden-Object Puzzle adventure!

name: Mystery Trackers: Mist Over Blackhill
summary:
Elephant Games, creators of Halloween Stories, Grim Tales, and Chimeras, invites you to track down the truth behind another thrilling supernatural mystery!

For a seasoned Mystery Trackers detective, even a relaxing bike ride can quickly become a case! Passing through the town of Blackhill, you notice something is terribly wrong - the residents have gone into hiding, and an army of shadow monsters roams the streets! The activity seems to originate from the home of a local scientist who was conducting secretive experiments… but getting there will be dangerous. And what you discover when you arrive just might change the world as you know it! Can you uncover what happened before the darkness spreads? Find out in this thrilling Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure game!

name: Mystery Trackers: Memories of Shadowfield
summary: Can you recover your memories and save a missing girl in time?

name: Mystery Tales: Master of Puppets
summary: Who is the true master?

name: Mystery Trackers: The Secret of Watch Hill
summary: Can you save your hometown from the entity that killed your family?

name: Mystery Trackers: Forgotten Voices
summary: Attendance is down at Misthill College!

name: Mystery Trackers: Train to Hellswich
summary: Your hard work has definitely earned you a vacation. What starts as a normal train ride quickly takes a dark turn as mysterious hooded creatures start terrorizing passengers! Can you uncover what they're after and stop them before it's too late? Find out in this rousing hidden-object puzzle adventure!

name: Mystery Case Files: Incident at Pendle Tower
summary: A Dark Past Lies Within…

name: Myths or Reality: Fairy Lands - Collector's Edition
summary: The further into the forest the more fantastic things you will see. Do not be afraid of what you do not know or understand. Remember the oldest legends about fairies that live deeply in a forest. Be bold enough to face something unusual in a classical English village!

name: Myths and Legends Bundle: Tunche & Black Book
My Darkest Moment
summary:
Short but profound, My Darkest Moment is a game of surprising emotional weight.
Our protagonist is not blessed. Instead, they are excluded, depressed, stuck in internal sufferings.
They journey through bustling streets, trudge among crowds wearing masks, and step by step, walk into devouring darkness. Our hero is lost, in between the intertwined pictures of the real world and their illusion.
Would you jump in and face their authentic self?

name: Mystery of the Missing Brigantine
summary: An exciting Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure game which takes you on the amazing journey of treasure hunters who need your help to find the missing person. Enjoy hours of fun in this mystic, storydriven game!

name: My Girlfriend is a Mermaid!? Refine
summary: My Girlfriend is a Mermaid!?

name: My Girlfriend is a Mermaid!? Refine: Limited Edition
summary:
My Girlfriend is a Mermaid!? Refine: Limited Edition includes;
- The game (region free)
- The soundtrack CD
- The theme song CD
- A Mascot figure
- A digital artbook download code (while supplies last)

name: My Father My Son
summary: Two castaways: a father and son end up on a deserted island after an unexpected storm. The sailboat cruise that was to bring them together turns into a deadly fight for survival. The characters can only count on each other.

name: Mysteria of the World: The Forest of Death
summary: A visual novel that immerses the reader in a fantastic and frightening world. Will you be able to return home, avoiding all the dangers?

name: My Cashy Side Job at Lost&Found in the Subway of Million-Person City
summary: Noir adventure for an unlucky subway's lost and found worker!

name: Mythic
summary: Mythic is a Roguelite MMO where you explore an infinite, procedurally generated labyrinth. Discover a world packed with puzzles, enemies, bosses, and treasure. Join forces with fellow heroes to hunt down the gods, or strike out alone and be the first to discover uncharted territory. Become Mythic.

name: Mycosis
summary: Mycosis is action-platformer situated in an underground laboratory complex. The gameplay includes fighting various enemies, mostly the fungus infected zombies, collecting different items and solving some simple puzzles. It was inspired by Abuse, Half-life and everyday laboratory work!

name: Mystic Cards
summary: This Game is a card oracle simulator.It's a game that could change the way you consult an oracle.

name: Mysterious Adventure of Michael 2
summary: Action game of dreams and hopes.

name: Mythic Legions Tactics
summary: Discover the world of Mythoss and build your "Mythic Legion" in this innovative, customizable, non-Pay-to-win tactics game featuring Fully 3D Realistic Environments, Hundreds of Class options, and Skill Based Battles! Build your Legion! Change your faction! Fight in the war of the aetherblade!

name: Mystery Chamber 2015 Forever
summary: The final and expanded edition of Mystery Chamber 2015, which includes various improvements, gameplay changes, and new content.

name: Mystery of Island
summary: Mystery of Island is a wilderness survival game. Various enemies, huge map to explore, collect resources to improve and strengthen yourself over time.

name: My Last Journey
summary: We all fall once...And now that day has come,when we were down,too.You have to go on an unforgettable adventure,which change you forever.Your fate depends on your decisions, will be you able to survive,or this journey will be your last...

name: My Otaku Academia
summary: A Fan made game of 9 Anitube all stars and a mystery girl. Play as Nux Taku as his first day in a new school begins! Make friends, enemies, and fall in love!

name: Mythos: Sudoku
summary: Embark on a mythic adventure and experience sudoku in a whole new way, with new rules and magical items as you overcome trials and find your way home.

name: Mysterious House
summary: Logic platformer with logic tasks with all sorts of obstacles and teleports. Closed doors, assistants can open. The main thing is to remember, they are very stupid, so it is worth protecting them.

name: Mystery Trackers: Raincliff
summary: After a group of young students go missing, the Mystery Trackers are called in to search the city of Raincliff!

name: Mystery Trackers: Raincliff - Collector's Edition
summary: After a group of young students go missing, the Mystery Trackers are called in to search the city of Raincliff!

name: My Next Life as a Villainess: All Routes Lead to Doom! - Pirates of the Disturbance
summary: Catarina Claes, the young daughter of a noble family, one day bumps her head and regains memories of her past life as an otaku. It is then that she realizes she has been reborn into the world of the otome game Fortune Lover, reincarnated as the game's villainess who, regardless of what route the player took in the original game, is doomed to be either killed or exiled. In order to avoid these routes that lead to doom, Catarina begins taking countermeasures to try and avoid things going the same way as the game. This, however, ends up having unexpected consequences on her relations with the other characters of the game's world.

name: My Little World
summary: A relaxing building game where you create your own world using hexagonal tiles.

name: My Museum : Treasure Hunter
summary:
My Museum is a educational FPV simulator designed for fans of renovation, management and history buffs! You can find astounding renovation mechanics, enhanced economy and loads of historical facts!
In the game, you enter the role of the owner, art enthusiast, restorer of antiques, but also a businessman.
Your first task will be to restore the museum that you inherited from your grandfather, return it to glory and compete for the admiration of critics and visitors!

name: My Little Pony: A Maretime Bay Adventure
summary: Only you can help Sunny throw the most magical celebration Equestria has ever seen in the adventure game My Little Pony: A Maretime Bay Adventure. Use your magic to put on fashion shows, find the cutest animals, fly with the Pegasi and more. Customize your ponies by unlocking new skills and accessories, including new hats and jewelry, rollerblades, and fashion magic. Your friends Hitch, Izzy, Zipp and Pipp are here to lend a helping hoof every step of the way. And you can invite another player for multiplayer minigames!

name: My Furry Detective
summary: My Furry Detective is a comedy detective story about motivation, hard work and dreams. Investigate the crime, spend time with your partner, and who knows, maybe you can get along, or even solve the crime together?

name: My University Girlfriend
summary: This is a relaxing and casual puzzle game that can train your memory and observation skills. The after-school life in Angel Academy is always so colorful, and the graceful and colorful figures in the club are full of youth and vitality. Here, what kind of beautiful encounter will be waiting for you?

name: MySims SkyHeroes
summary:
The DS port of the final game in the MySims series.

MySims SkyHeroes is an action-adventure game in which players select a "cartoony" airplane to complete a variety of missions: racing, target shooting, aerial combat, etc. In some missions, players use "goo guns", stylized rockets, and blasters to defeat enemy aircraft or win races. It has a different story line and a few changes with characters to the console versions.

name: Mystery Case Files: Incident at Pendle Tower - Collector's Edition
summary: A Dark Past Lies Within…

name: My Hero One's Justice 2: Pack 8 Kurogiri
summary: Play as Kurogiri in My Hero One's Justice 2! This pack also includes 10 color variations for Kurogiri's costume.

name: My Hero One's Justice 2: Pack 7 Present Mic
summary: Play as Present Mic in My Hero One's Justice 2! This pack also includes 10 color variations for Present Mic's costume.

name: Mystery Trackers: Queen of Hearts - Collector's Edition
summary: The townspeople of Brightfield are becoming infected by a mysterious illness and turning into monsters! This is no simple investigation as you struggle to save both the townspeople and yourself. Can you stop whoever is behind the infection in time? Find out in this spine-tingling hidden-object puzzle adventure!

name: Myths of Gallantium
summary: Myths of Gallantium is an open-world adventure RPG with a focus on exploration and deep character customization. Inspired by the atmosphere of Zelda: Breath of the Wild, and countless possibilities of MMO RPGs.

name: My First Rayman
summary: My First Rayman (Rayman Premiers Clics in French) is one of the educational games from the Rayman learning game Series. This game was released in 2000 for the PC and MAC and was only sold in France, Canada, Spain, Germany and Italy, being available in the four corresponding languages. My First Rayman is aimed for a pre-school audience between two and four years old, being designed to help children enter infant education by teaching them basic concepts. Some earlier editions of it were also bundled with an exclusive Rayman-branded computer mouse or a t-shirt.

name: My Little Colony
summary: In My Little Colony, you play as an aspiring ant keeper. You will get to choose, build, and expand your colony. But make sure your queen has food and water to keep the colony growing! As players progress food and water will be in more of a demand so spend your coins wisely.

name: My Train Arrives: In ten years
summary: Take a look at your favorite cities in ten years. 8 cities from the original campaign will be available in this extension. The game area increased by 65%. New passenger and cargo stations appeared in all cities.

name: Mystery Solitaire: Powerful Alchemist 2
summary: Return to the Middle Ages and become a powerful alchemist! This is a new sequel to the beloved game.

name: Mystery Solitaire: The Black Raven 2
summary: A continuation of the solitaire game based on the famous mystical poem "The Raven" by Edgar Allan Poe.

name: Mystery Solitaire: Grimm's Tales 4
summary: Remove the spell of the evil fairy from the sleeping princess and awaken the kingdom from its slumber!

name: Myth: Gods of Asgard
summary: Enter the Norse world and become the Norse Gods' incarnation! Experience the ultimate aestheticization of violence in battles.

name: My Heroes: Dungeon Raid
summary: My Heroes: Dungeon Raid is a classic pixel-style barrage shooting RPG game. It has refreshing and exciting barrage shooting battles. With a high degree of freedom, players can start adventures in diablo-style buildings and enjoy the growth of in-game character.

name: Myriad
summary: Myriad is one of the built-in games of the GP2X Wiz portable console.

name: My Array is Too Sacred to Be Useful!?
Mystery Trackers: The Four Aces
summary: The entire town of Brightfield was evacuated after a series of bizarre animal attacks. Now, strange creatures roam the streets, danger lurks around every corner and you’ve just landed smack in the middle of it all.

name: Mystery Trackers: The Four Aces - Collector's Edition
summary: The entire town of Brightfield was evacuated after a series of bizarre animal attacks. Now, strange creatures roam the streets, danger lurks around every corner and you’ve just landed smack in the middle of it all.

name: Mysperyence
summary:
Mysperyence is a coined word that combines the words mystery and experience, and is a VR Murder Mystery game that is played simultaneously by multiple players.

Players dive into the crime scene to "relive" the actions of the characters and gather information such as what the characters were doing at the crime scene and what conversations they were having.

If the players can find the murderer by discussing with each other based on this information, they win the game.

name: My Girlfriend is a Musician
summary: “My Girlfriend is a Musician” is a Music Tour Management Simulator and Yuri Dating Simulator. Play as an aspiring junior tour manager helming a series of concerts around Europe for an eccentric yet extremely entertaining Rockstar!

name: My Pets: Maze
summary: Unique game that brings the aesthetics of children's maze books to the digital world. Are you ready to draw?

name: My Pet Rock
summary: My Pet Rock is a collection of mini games inspired by early arcade games and modern endless runners. If you are looking for a fun, aesthetically pleasing and relatively casual game to play then My Pet Rock is for you. Come and customize your newest pet, while earning the highest scores around.

name: Mystery Coin
summary: Want to try to collect all the coins? Then your time has come. Mystery Coin looks like a simple game, but in reality it is not.

name: Mythic Defender
summary: In this VR game combining Tower Defense & Archery, dexterity and strategy will be your best allies to help the gods to protect their kingdom against mythological creatures! Grab your bow and join this epic fight. Will you be able to defeat all enemies and keep the treasure of the gods safe?!

name: My Friend Peppa Pig: Pirate Adventures
summary: It’s a pirate’s life for Peppa and you! Open the door to new places and faces, including Danny Dog’s party and Captain Hog’s hunt for treasure. And try over 30 more new interactions, from flying a kite to raising a pirate flag. Your adventure awaits!

name: My Kindergarten Learning Adventure
summary: An early education game for kids with tons of mini-games and movies! Features draggable interactive objects, solving puzzles, & memory matches. All with visual and sound effects to support your child's learning. Enjoy this memorable adventure in one of the most comprehensive Kindergarten prep games!

name: Mysterious Island: A Hidden Object Adventure
summary: A game in the genre of "hidden object" - look for supplies, fight with predators, explore the surroundings. Discover all the secrets of the Mysterious Island!

name: Mysterious Night: The First Night
summary: Puzzle and mystery genre, find objects to escape. The game evokes exploration and discovery of mysteries with a hint of gloom and curiosity. Mystic Night (first night) is a story about a boy named Uri and the mysteries surrounding him.

name: Mystery Solitaire: Grimm's Tales 5
summary: Help Little Red Riding Hood reach her grandmother's house and protect her from the evil gray wolf.

name: My Lady Sayo: Zettai Kunshu! Sayo-sama
summary: This is a novel game in which you serve Sayo and deepen your relationship with her as you respond to her reckless requests and endure her playful teasing.

name: My Coloring Book 2
summary: Did you know that coloring relaxes your brain, reduces stress, improves focus, motor skill and vision? My Coloring Book 2 will bring all those benefits to your Nintendo Switch! There are two types of drawings to choose from: 61 about land and 49 marine animals. Thanks to an amazing variety, My Coloring Book is suitable for all from children to adults. Save your work for later and show off your artistic sense and skill to family and friends.

name: My Melody Angel Book: Denshi Techou & Enjoy Game
summary: My Melody Angel Book: Denshi Techou & Enjoy Game is an Action game, developed and published by TDK Core, which was released in Japan in 2007.

name: My Puppy Fiancé
summary:
To avoid the arranged marriage, Mikoto lied to her father that she had a boyfriend.

If she doesn't introduce her boyfriend to her father by the promised day, she'll be forced into marriage.

"Are you sure you have your boyfriend?"

"Nope..."

"Do you have no brain?"

Train your boyfriend with a toxic butler?!

Talking to a stray pimp through tap and auto-play, turn him into your perfect boyfriend!

name: My First Date RPG 2
summary: In the "My First Date RPG" series, play as characters who experience a big part of growing up: going out on your first date!

name: My Gaming Club
summary: In the game My Gaming Club you can feel exactly what it's like to own a gaming club, because realism is one of the main features of the game. Assemble PC, buy furniture, food for your club and for your visitors. This game is not just a gaming club simulator, this game is a real life simulator

name: My Dragon Party
summary: Every few hundred years a group of friends gathers for a party where they eat, play games, share their stories, drink and have fun. What interesting stories can they tell us this time? Let's find out!

name: My Naughty Shotgun
summary: Shoot bloody demons and giant penises with your extremely Naughty naked shotgun in this fast paced doom-like FPS!

name: My Hero One's Justice 2: DLC Pack 9 - Midnight
summary: Play as Midnight in My Hero One's Justice 2! This pack also includes 10 color variations for Midnight's costume.

name: MythForce
summary: Inspired by beloved 80s cartoons, MythForce unites swords & sorcery with gripping 1st-person combat in a roguelite adventure fit for Saturday mornings. Brave the dungeon alone or join forces with friends to take on an ever-changing Castle of Evil!

name: Mystery At Woodbrook Hall: Hidden Object Game
summary: Danny and Jen looked up to the sky as the sun slowly began to set on the horizon. Their backs were to the grass beneath them, and they enjoyed the silence.

name: MyTP Skateboarding
summary: Welcome to the streets of Randertown - no crazy bling bling, simply amazing and real skateboard action! Grab your board and explore the huge playground fully packed with rails, ledges, stairs, skateparks, half- and quarter pipes, big airs and sheer endless run possibilities!

name: Mystic Maze
summary:
Enjoy an immersive traditional outdoor maze. Wander around a traditional outdoor maze in the full 3D! Enjoy the tweeting of the birds as you try and find the secret object hidden somewhere in the maze.
Simple touch controls in the corners of the screen allow you to navigate the maze.
Enjoy yourself as you loose your bearings inside the Mystic Maze!

name: My Universe: Green Adventure - Farmer Friends
summary:
Become an environmentally friendly farmer! Explore your farm's surroundings, clear your overgrown fields and find a new way to fertilize your crops. Roll up your sleeves and get ready to dig and water your crops regularly to reap the fruits of your labor. Be sure to follow the complete production cycle of a green farmer! Every day is an adventure thanks to the different quests.
Make some animal friends! During your adventure, you will be in charge of the entire farmyard, cows, hens, goats, sheep, ducks, and more. You'll have to renovate various buildings to home your new companions. Care for them, show them plenty of affection and have fun with them thanks to the many mini games.
Meet the villagers' needs! The further you progress in your adventure, the larger your choice of seeds will get. Flowers, fruits and vegetables, pay close attention to the villagers' orders to be sure to meet their needs. With a little creativity you will improve your recipes and create new flavors for your yogurts, jams, etc. It's up to you to show off your local production and your traditional recipes to the village's inhabitants!

name: My Hayami-Chan
summary: A tamagotchi-like game about having your own Anime girl.

name: MythBusters: The First Experiment
summary: MythBusters: The First Experiment is a free introduction to the first-person creative simulator based on the legendary Discovery show. Learn how to run crazy experiments and manage the production of episodes. Take the first steps to become a MythBuster!

name: My Hotel
summary: Restore a forgotten mansion, turn it into your own hotel and increase your reputation. From mopping the floor to hosting the most prestigious personalities. Do your best to beat the challenges, hire employees and earn more stars!

name: Mythos
summary: Mythos is a Hack & Slash RPG game that offers exciting experience that makes you want to play again and again with unique content, such as a differentiated job and Dungeon system in terrain that varies with entry. We invite you to take on a dynamic adventure on the planet ‘Uld’

name: My Furry Maid
summary: Welcome home, master! Would you like tea, coffee or a hot maid for dinner? Oh, wait, we've run out of tea and coffee, so...

name: My Student Loves Me!
summary: A short visual novel VR for adults where the story and play changes depending on your choices! You can become a tutor and fall in love with your student. Your student loves you and confesses her love to you. Let's make out as much as you want!

name: My Naughty Summer Vacation: Days in Countryside and Memories of Summer
summary: An 3D simulation RPG in which the main character returns to the countryside and enjoys his summer vacation. Let's spend a special summer in the countryside with heroines, by talking, go to various places with countryside, playing, and others, while making memories of the summer.

name: Mystery Solitaire: The Black Raven 3
summary: Solitaire based on the mystical poem "The Raven".

name: My Magic Florist: Deluxe Edition
summary:
My Magic Florist will take you to a world of magic, colors, and harmony. You'll be tasked to take care of your own enchanted flower shop. Earn money and make upgrades through wise investments!

Your magical fairy powers are a good start, but you'll need to get experience and hone your skills to truly succeed. You're the only boss, and in the end, it'll be up to you and your hard work. Can you make it?

name: My Dear Farm
summary:
Decorating with vegetables had never been as fun! Grow your crops with love and enjoy this sim farming-adventure! Set out into this horticultural adventure being your best farmer self. Change your appearance, hairstyle, and even your pet to your liking!

Grow your crops to grow your business! Once you're done harvesting the products of your hard labor, go into the marketplace to sell your wares and build your farming empire! Collect and decorate! My Dear Farm is filled to the brim with interesting furniture and decoration sets to unlock so your farm can look as stylish as you want it to be!

name: MyrnEscapes
summary: A single player fantasy based exploration game with audio-reactive elements set to the music of Myrn's Circles EP

name: Mysterious Island: A Race Against Time and Hot Lava
summary: On Mysterious Island, lead Will, Lily, and Tomas in search for awesome treasure and then help them escape before the volcano erupts. Embark on an incredible journey at the amusement park where they decide to take a hot air balloon ride even though there is a storm and the ride is closed. Take the ride of a lifetime to an uncharted island filled with hungry creatures, mind-bending puzzles, and hidden dangers.

name: My Cool Diner
summary: Seven interactive games teach players the value of money and other skills as they run an out-of-control diner. The edutainment title offers three levels of difficulty.

name: Mystery Dungeon
summary: This is a Roguelike adventure role-playing game which features classic Roguelike elements such as dungeon, questing, building and mining. In the deep cavern, there lies a mysterious dungeon. Adventurers from all over the world gather here for countless treasures and thrilling adventures. Greed, fear, courage and strategy, are all possessed by the immortal legends of heroes.

name: Mystery of Fortune 2
summary: Mystery of Fortune 2 is the eight episode of the Fortune Chronicle saga and the official sequel to Mystery of Fortune. Explore dungeons with your own army and try to make the most efficient corps.

name: My Name is Mayo 3
summary: Get ready to have your intellect enriched, your emotions manipulated and your mayonnaise expanded; as you unveil the stories and learn from mistakes. Our lives are too short not to be enhanced with meaningful stories like this one!

name: Mystery Trackers: The Four Aces & Mystery Trackers: Silent Hollow
MySims
summary: The Nintendo DS version of MySims takes place in a vacation resort with the player tasked with the job of luring tourists. This is accomplished by doing tasks for the locals who live in your town and after you're done with a certain task you earn stars. Players collect stars to unlock other parts of the city as well as new minigames and new items in stores. As more stars are collected, the town grows and mini games are unlocked.

name: MySims Agents
summary: In MySims Agents on the Nintendo DS, players are agents assigned by their agency to help the mayor stop a notorious thief from stealing an ancient treasure.
