When you open your eyes and realize you're now just a wandering soul, you're approached by three cute demon girls. You expect to be their next meal, but instead, they sweep you away to a quaint, little cafe where you're greeted by the cat you just rescued! Apparently the cat is the owner of the establishment, and as thanks for saving his life, he's offered you a position to work for him as a waiter. He promises to bring you back to your body, but only if you do a good job—so get cracking!

Luckily you'll have your cute coworkers to guide you, that is if they're not already planning some mischief of their own.

name: My 11 Heroes
summary:
My 11 Heroes, a number game.
Simple rule, click the same number, more than two, they will grow up, until there is no more same number in the chessboard.
Features,

name: Mythic Mountain
summary: An arcade-style snowboarding game where you play as mythical creatures escaping a crazed trapper (who really, really wants to sell you to black-market cryptozoologists).

name: My Land!
summary: My Land! is a strategy game where you mission is to expand your land and in same time to defend it.

name: My Meta Farm
summary:
My Meta Farm is a blockchain-based decentralized virtual reality platform where users can create, own, and monetize game experiences. It has the concept of a persistent, online, 3D universe that combines multiple different virtual spaces. My Meta Farm metaverse will allow users to work, play a game, and socialize together in these 3D spaces.

The metaverse will be driven by augmented reality, with each user controlling a character or avatar. For example, you might take a mixed reality meeting with a VR headset in your virtual office, finish work and relax in a blockchain-based game, and then manage your crypto portfolio and finances inside the metaverse.

name: My Harem
summary: This game is a classic memory game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts.

name: MyTP Snowboarding 3
summary: From sweet turns in the Backcountry, Slopestyle competitions, Big air jumps to Streetrail sessions, Bowl runs and crazy Halfpipe action - MyTP Snowboarding 3 has it all.

name: My Incubi Harem
summary: My Incubi Harem is a visual novel about how you became an incubi king and ended up with beautiful men in love with you. Featuring a lewd mentor, a hot singer, a queer dom activist, a cold-hearted nobleman, and a sensible daddy. This is the first episode of a game series made by Male Doll.

name: My Holiness the Gobliness
summary: You're a man who fainted on his journey, and was rescued in another world at your final hour by Anubis the Goblin Shaman to be treated at her temple.As her servant, you must take care of the everyday tasks for the lazy shaman.

name: Mythology Waifus Mahjong
summary: Will you be able to defeat all the strong girls? Fight against beautiful mythological warriors in this mythological-themed mix of classic mahjong and combat.

name: Mystery Trackers: Fall of Iron Rock - Collector's Edition
summary: You’ve been sent to Iron Rock to find your long-lost colleague. But your trip quickly takes a turn for the bizarre when you find the town patrolled by the new Mayor’s robots, trapping the residents inside! Do you have what it takes to help them and escape before it’s too late?

name: Mythlands: Dragon Flight
summary: The Ultimate Dragon Riding Experience

name: My Time
summary: Better tomato clock! More free room layout!

name: Mysterious Lab
summary: A Rouge like game which the player will explore an abandoned Lab. During which, player will fight with zombles and pick up supplyments to strengthen their weapons.

name: Mystery Case Files: The Last Resort - Collector's Edition
summary: A mission to find a group of missing skiers goes downhill fast when a town’s secrets hit the fresh mountain air!

name: My Grandparents' Christmas Mystery
summary: Grandma never showed up and Grandpa's tragic passing 3 days later left me in anger, confusion and sadness. I couldn't just let this go like it never happened, so I decided to go and find out what happened on my own. Will you survive a first-person psychological horror game and uncover the mystery?

name: Mystery Solitaire: Dreamcatcher 3
summary: Play solitaire and solve the mysteries of the world of dreams!

name: Myst Mobile
summary:
Journey to Myst Island and begin to unravel the mystery you have been thrust into. As you learn what happened on the island, you will find yourself playing a key role in an epic story whose ending has not yet been written.

The island is full of secrets – learn your surroundings and discover what you can interact with. Each puzzle you solve will bring you closer to exploring more of the island, and reveal methods to reach other stunning and surreal worlds called “Ages”.

With an in-app purchase to unlock the other Ages of Myst, you will see even greater challenges await you, and discover deeper connections and puzzles that Myst has to offer. Uncover a story of ruthless family betrayal, and make choices that will affect both you, and the world of Myst itself.

name: My Lovely Pets: Collector's Edition
summary: Search for interesting items in relaxing and beautiful places, play your favourite mini games, find cute Pets.

name: My Lovely Pets
summary: Discover the joy of hidden object games with "My Lovely Pets"! Explore over 100 adorable pets in stunning locations, solve mini-games, and uncover playful fuzzies hiding in unique spots. Relax, search for hidden treasures, and enjoy the cutest adventure!

name: My Hero One's Justice 2: Outlaw Suit Set
My Extraordinary Girlfriend
summary:
Life as a highschooler in the city is stressful enough, but your home also happens to be a hot spot for monsters and other supernatural occurrences. With gods, aliens, and monsters running around, you’re thankful you’re just an average guy… until you hear that the descendant of Hercules has been found. ‘Good for him,’ you say to yourself…

Things take a wild turn, however, when three girls suddenly transfer into your school and immediately begin asking for your hand in marriage! Isn’t it a bit too soon to think about stuff like that? Not for these three whimsical gals; the descendant of the goddess Athena, the daughter of a super villain, and an alien princess! You think this is all a joke, but these girls are persistent! ‘Average’ is no longer a word you can associate yourself with—not with all of the shenanigans you’re about to get tossed into!

name: Mystery no Tobira: Nazotoki no Jikan 2
My Lady Juliet
summary:
You may be a trust fund baby, but you work hard to achieve your dreams:
Making your mark, and maybe finding love along the way.
Sadly, your parents have other plans, surprising you with a fiance.

Are you bound by your parents' choice?
Or does the voice beyond your balcony offer something more?

name: My Forged Wedding: Party
summary: A remaster of My Forged Wedding.

name: My Wedding and 7 Rings
summary: Included in the "Love 365: Find Your Story" app.

name: My First Horse: Adventures on Seahorse Island
summary: Adventure awaits with Olivia and her trusty horse on a stunning island full of excitement and mystery. Join them on thrilling quests and explore beautiful landscapes. This horse game has something for everyone. Don't miss out on this immersive experience. Saddle up and join the adventure!

name: My Summer Jobs: Dialing for Dreams!
summary: My Summer Job: Dialing for Dreams! is a puzzle game where you guide a young girl Molly through the world of telemarketing. Test your skills in cold calling, product knowledge and time management to match the right product to each customer's desire and save enough money to make dreams come true!

name: Mythrera
summary: Mythrera is a top-down action RPG where you play as Sammyla in a magical world filled with monsters, treasure, and adventure. Explore the vast realm of Mythrera as you fight your way through hordes of enemies, collect powerful gear, and complete quests to gain experience and level up.

name: My Defense Story
summary: My Defense Story mixing Tower Defense and Roguelike together to provide a new game experience. In the game, you need to manage your troops, build your tower and defense from random enemies.

name: My Life in New York
summary: "My Life in New York" is a mobile simulation game where players step into the shoes of a character trying to build a new life in New York City. The game focuses on navigating daily challenges like managing a career, social life, and finances. Players can explore the city, decorate their apartment, and make decisions that impact their virtual life. It’s a casual, life-simulation experience with a focus on personal growth and success in the bustling urban environment of NYC.

name: Mystery Legends: Phantom of the Opera - Collector’s Edition
My Friend, the Catgirl
summary: A dating sim with catgirls. Check out the hot pics of your girl friend!

name: My Fake Goblin Wife
summary: You have the opportunity to become the husband of the Goblin Baroness. But what are your chances if this love is a sham?

name: My Alien Roommate
summary: When an alien boy named Enoch lands on your balcony one fateful Sunday evening, your life is changed forever. Can you keep your alien roommate a secret from the world?

name: My Ocean Project
summary: I made this experience after watching "My Octopus Teacher" on Netflix. I've always wanted to make a underwater environment for an exploration game but I never found a place to implement it. After watching the movie I just wanted to do it anyway without any gameplay elements at all.

name: My Magic 2048
summary:
My Magic 2048 is an addictive number game.
Join the numbers and get to the 2048 tile,or 4096 tile.
Swipe to move all tiles. When two tiles with the same number touch, they merge into a larger one. You can choose different type to enjoy. Adventure or time model for you explore.

name: My Computer Wants to Eat Me?
summary: Explore your dreams and collect game disks for your hungry computer.

name: My Girlfriend's Special Place
summary: One day, our hero is headed home from Akihabara when he's mistaken for a molester. The person accusing him is his childhood friend, Fuyuka Akiyoshi. "If you want me to forgive you, then become my butler!" Recently reunited, these two end up in an unusual relationship as their story begins...

name: My Next Life as a Villainess: All Routes Lead to Doom!
summary: My Next Life as a Villainess: All Routes Lead to Doom! ~comes to StoryMe!~ is a collaboration between ASMIK ACE and StoryMe, released in April 5, 2020 for Android and IOS platforms. The game officially received an English release for the world-wide version of the StoryMe app on Sept. 16, 2020. Each episode of the game was released alongside the animation broadcast. It has 19 episodes, with the first 12 being a retelling of the anime's story, and the last few being the respective 7 endings of the capture targets.

name: My Summer Adventure: Memories of Another Life - Day 1
summary: A strange incident turns the life of an ordinary young man upside down when, having fallen asleep on a regular train commute, he wakes up in another country... in a body of a Japanese student! An unforgettable summer adventure awaits, promising many fateful meetings and momentous occasions.

name: My Love Match
summary: Test your reaction and agility in this cute matching game, featuring two different and addictive love themed modes. Use angelic power-ups to help you along, and play through numerous levels as you try your hardest to master the game.

name: My Life Coach
summary: My Life Coach is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Ubisoft, which was cancelled before it was released.

name: My Gym Partner's a Monkey: Hall of the Wild
summary: An unknown prankster hid the lunchboxes of every student in school. Adam and Jake volunteer to find them all. However, Bull Sharkowski plans on getting in their way.

name: My Summertime Girlfriend
summary:
Your grades are plummeting, and it looks like you’re going to be held back a year… That is, until your teacher suggests you try attending summer school. You have nothing else to lose, so why not? You resign yourself to another boring summer, but it turns out the summer school is part of a beach resort full of beautiful girls who all seem excited to get to know you!

The program only runs for a month, but you quickly learn to live alongside your three rambunctious roommates and help them solve their problems. It’s not long before you realize that these girls are interested in more than just a study buddy… Can you handle the heat?

name: My 9 Swallows: Topstars League
summary: Collaboration between Otomate and Japan's professional baseball team Tokyo Yakult Swallows.

name: My Shops
summary: My Shops has you trying to manage an ever-increasing variety of shops located on a single avenue, instead of endlessly micromanaging a single store.

name: My Baseball League
summary:
Using a simple button press to bat and pitch your way through 50 opponents; your team will have to overcome the challenges of players eating too much before a match, staying up too late the night before, and getting distracted by their mobile phones.
Forget the glory of the World Series – this is baseball at its most simple!

name: My House
summary: My House is a mod for Doom II designed and released by Veddge as a tribute, reportedly to have been unearthed from an old floppy disk belonging to his deceased long-time friend Tom who started work in 1999 with some UDMF features added by Veddge.

name: My Cat-Grandma vs. Vampire
summary:
“I want my cat”, the most popular adventure action smartphone game is now here!In “I want my cat”, you will find the cunning old woman, silly vampire,different magical kitchen utensils and surprising random events. The most romantic thing is not raining cherry blossoms but raining coins and gems. Would you like to witness?
Long long time ago, in a magical forest, there was an old woman who lived happily with her beloved kitten. One day, the vampire took her kitten away. With her sleeves wrapped up, the angry old woman went after the vampire, and that’s how the story begin...

name: Mystery Solitaire: The Black Raven 4
summary: Gothic sequel to "Mystery Solitaire. The Black Raven". Breathtaking architecture and mysterious atmosphere.

name: My Life as a Cult Leader
summary: After you lose your job and apartment, you're left with nothing. Forced to spend the night on a cold park bench, you curse your fate, only for a beautiful woman calling herself Shima Itsuki to appear and ask you to be a cult leader...

name: My Little Pony: Mane Merge
summary: C’mon everypony, we must save Equestria! A darkness is creeping through the lands, causing chaos to the Earth Ponies of Maretime Bay, through to the Unicorns in Bridlewood, and even to the Pegasi soaring above the clouds in Zephyr Heights. Saddle up and help the Mane 5, Sunny, Izzy, Zipp, Pipp, & Hitch, as they work together to investigate what or who is behind this dark curse.

name: My Brother is a Superhero
summary: Luke is a comic-mad eleven-year-old who shares a treehouse with his geeky older brother, Zach. Luke's only mistake is to need a wee right at the wrong moment. While he's gone an alien gives his undeserving, never-read-a-comic-in-his-life brother superpowers, then tells him to save the universe. Luke is massively annoyed about this, but when Zach is kidnapped by his arch-nemesis, Luke and his friends only have five days to find him and save the world...

name: My Sweet Artificial Lover
summary:
You live in a world where androids are a little more than mindless drones that hand out papers in class, clean up at restaurants, and perform menial tasks around the house. However, there’s a company trying their hand at sentient androids, and what a coincidence that two beautiful girls have just transferred into your class.

Integrating with humanity is no easy feat, and you soon find yourself having to explain the most basic things to your new classmates. The more you spend time with them, the more they begin to fall for you… but how do you go about teaching androids about love and intimacy?!

name: My Little Pony: A Canterlot Wedding
summary: Join all your favourite ponies as they prepare for a Royal Wedding in the magical kingdom of Canterlot!

name: My Demon Wife
summary: Beautiful woman became evil, powerful and immortal. She captured you, and made you her husband and slave. You land in a creepy castle with mummies and other monsters running around.

name: My Dear Dad
summary: Xiaoqian's father dragged his exhausted body home, only to find that his house was engulfed in flames. In order to save his daughter, he rushed into the scene of fire, but fainted the moment he saw her. When he woke up again, he found himself in a strange place, and his daughter Xiaoqian was missing...

name: MyPopgoes
summary: MyPopgoes is an entirely hand-drawn teaser game for the Popgoes series. It was created in less than a month and features visuals from Sian Mewburn (Turntail, official FNaF artist) and Emil Macko (creator of Five Nights at Candy's).

name: My Baby Unicorn
summary: You got a gift - a super cute virtual unicorn baby! Become the best magical pony nanny! Hatch a colorful egg and take care of the cutest newborn unicorn with rainbow hair! Bathe, feed, potty train, dress up, sing to sleep and play fun games with your tiny virtual pet friend! Decorate the baby unicorn’s room with rainbow colors! Play My Baby Unicorn virtual pet care game for kids every day and watch your virtual pet pony grow!

name: Mystery Case Files: The Dalimar Legacy - Collector's Edition
summary: It's the opportunity of several lifetimes when the intrepid Master Detective finds themselves in the body of their greatest rival!

name: My Talking Unicorn Emily
summary:
Do you like to dress up? More clothes, more fun. Play talking unicorn games with a cute little virtual pony in this virtual pet and dress up game for kids! Dress up your unicorn in adorable costumes!
Then, while playing a talking unicorn game make sure the unicorn Emily is not hungry. Feed your unicorn pet with yummy foods: fruits, veggies, candies and snacks! And don’t forget to drink energy potion - don't waste time sleeping!
Your unicorn Emily likes to be super clean! Bathe her and enjoy unicorn funny reactions!
Play unicorn games with your talking unicorn Emily! Play coloring and decoration games with your virtual unicorn! Mini games bring coins and fun! Take good care of your magical pony pet and unlock new mini games every day!
Have fun playing My Talking Unicorn Emily!

name: My Demonic Romance
summary:
My Demonic Romance is a Visual Novel with a twist...
Sure you're playing a typically geeky guy with classes to attend, a job that sucks and a love life that's DOA.

But the difference is that when the cute, exciting and adventurous girl shows up, she's an actual demon, with horns, a pointed tail and a sex-drive to match!

As that guy you have to navigate your daily life while trying to keep your new demonic companion safe in a world that's completely new to her and not to mention handling the fact that she's not at all shy when it comes to her physical desires too!

You take on the role of Adam, a guy studying hard to get the grades he needs to succeed in life, working a part-time job to pay the bills, and all the time longing for some meaningful female companionship - who gets more than he bargained for when Lily, a succubus summoned from hell itself turns up in his life.

name: My Furry Girlfriend
summary: The solution to fix a failing relationship is quite simple: discuss your problems, go outside together, visit a family therapist, but most importantly - love your partner!

name: Mystic Warriors Battleground
summary: Mystic Warriors Battleground is an exciting fighting game where players take on the role of a skilled warrior who must battle through challenging levels to defeat their enemies. Along the way, players will develop their abilities and skills, allowing them to customize their fighter to suit their playstyle.

name: Mya Master Mind
summary: A reskin of Bulls and Cows.

name: My Mini Farm
summary:
Embark on a relaxing yet challenging journey of managing your own mini farm.
Grow organic plants, harvest your crops, take care of animals and sell products to fair buyers.
Hire, build and expand your holdings!
Can you turn your Mini Farm into an empire?

name: My Illegal Cafe
summary: A game where you end up accidentally running a clandestine cafe in a world filled with cute catgirls.

name: Mystery in the Office
summary: An immersive single-player text-based game that takes you to an eerily empty office, mysteriously locked from the outside. Investigate the interactive rooms, face challenges and obstacles to unlock the only available exit, and unravel the mystery of why the office was abandoned in a hurry.

name: My Best Friend Kouta
summary: In this slice of life game focused heavily on Netorare, Eisen introduces Evie, his delicate and gentle girlfriend, to his perverted best friend Kouta. As Kouta slowly burns Evie's mind, you in the role of Eisen can explore the city and uncover what's happening.

name: Mystillion
summary: Once. A certain village was destroyed by the hands of the devil. "Red Village Tragedy - " The only girl who survived the incident called that - Isla. Even though she was tormented by the memories of her past, she lived each day to the fullest.

name: My Hero: After the Fall
summary: This is a pixel tower defense game that combines light Rogue and grass cutting! Dozens of heroes for you to choose from, hundreds of blessings appear randomly, with the strongest team components to protect the crystal from monsters!

name: Mystic Totem
summary: Get the rings around the totem to the other side. Later hacked to create Move It (VT3xx).

name: My Secret Bistro: Cooking Game
summary:
Sweet fantasy of decorating my own restaurant!

- Unique Deco System! Design and run your own dream restaurant!

- Lots of customers can chill at your café you decorated with your own hand!

- Wanna make Starbucks-like café or Dunkin style retro canteen? Choose whatever you like!

name: My Pig Princess
summary:
An 18+ Visual Novel taking place in a kingdom where the pig girl Emelie is the princess!
You play as a human farmer in this lighthearted comedy adventure featuring plenty of adult content!​

name: Mystic Blast
summary: Mystic Blast is an exciting puzzle defense game that will test your skills and strategic thinking. In this game, you need to connect two or more matching tiles to clear them from the board and defend against waves of attacking enemies.

name: Mystical Stones
summary:
The universes needs a savior! Is it you?
A long time ago, long before our world was created, lived four goddesses.
In their temple hidden amid the clouds, in the company of their faithful companions, their role was to regulate the whole universe by directing sacred stones on a board. Each of their actions changed destinies.

name: My Merry May
summary: Kyosuke is a high school student who lives a normal student's life in a dormitory until one day he receives a strange device from abroad. Inside the device is a female replis, an artificial human being. Kyosuke decides to awaken her, but before her personality is fully loaded, a thunderstorm briefly cuts the energy in the dormitory, creating a bug in Leu's system. Instead of his own personal servant, Kyosuke now has to take care of a teenager with a childlike mind. The remaining cast of heroines include Hitoe Haruna, Yasusuke's childhood friend, Motomi Agatsuma, the girlfriend of Kyosuke's best friend, Ryo Hagimoto, 21-year old Tae Kizuki, and her friend, 13-year old high school student Misao Yuki.

name: My Devil Lovers
summary: You are the heroine! You take on the role of the heroine and experience romancing with handsome devils!

name: My Devil Lovers: Remake
summary: You’re a young photographer with a passion for capturing the perfect image. Just when your goals are out of focus, you come across an old black book...

name: Myth Landers
summary: Myth Landers is a tactical role-playing game about the ruthless confrontation between heroes and terrifying monsters. It all takes place in a dark fantasy cyber world, where ancient cultures' wisdom and futuristic technological power combine. Manage a party of warriors from bygone times. Use reliable armor and advanced weapons. Choose and develop unique skills to strengthen your heroes. And start a campaign in one of the distinctive locations, where mutated offspring of the disgusting Aspid, cyber-jianshi, mummy-troopers, and other dangerous enemies.

name: My Monstrous Roommate. (étude)
summary: There is a monster living in your apartment.

name: My Horse: Bonded Spirits
summary: Build a bond with your horse and gain its trust. Develop yours and the horse’s skills. Discover the surrounding open world. Complete tasks and take part in competitions. Rebuild a run-down stud farm!

name: Mystery Case Files: The Last Resort
summary: A ski resort high in the mountains hides a dark past!

name: My Motel
summary: Welcome to My Motel Simulator, the ultimate simulation game where you get to design and manage your own motel! Your goal is to create a successful and profitable motel by designing and decorating each room, attracting guests.

name: Mystic Mischief
summary: Fly as Mammon the chaotic thieving bird as he attempts to achieve the biggest heist of his life. Poop, caw, and steal your way through his adventures. Avoid the dangerous dragons as they try to keep you from stealing their treasures.

name: My Pizza Story
summary: Introducing My Pizza Story, the ultimate idle RPG management simulator game where you can Role-play as a cute Komo Chef and build your very own pizza palace!

name: Mystic Ring
summary: Test your skill against an endless barrage of slime! Using your Mystic Ring, isolate each slime with a continuous straight line, then cast your spell. Beware, any slime still left in a group will survive!

name: My Klutzy Cupid
summary: In the midst of leading an ordinary life, I began to feel the urge to find myself a girlfriend. Yet somehow, I couldn't bring myself to take the first step. But one day... "What's this...?" A single notebook had fallen right in front of me. "Hey, you! Yes, you! Why aren't you picking it up?"

name: My Strange Girlfriends
summary: This game is a classic memory game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts.

name: Mythical Agent
summary: Mythical Agent: a thrilling SRPG set in Diyu, the realm of the dead. You are Agent Urassik, a secret agent who must lead Unit 7, an anti-terrorist squad against demonic forces. Spend time with your crew and every choice will shape your destiny and the fate of the underworld in this epic adventure!

name: My Life of Repayment
summary: If you don't work, you will eat dirt! To pay off your loans, you will take on various jobs. Make pancakes, perform archery, and operate a space drone! Enjoy a changeable work experience in your busy life!

name: My Virtual Pet Louie the Pug
summary:
Welcome to virtual pet games pug life, y'all! My Virtual Pet Dog Louie the Pug is the most charming virtual dog out there, the new virtual pet royalty. Adopt this virtual puppy dog now and let him make your day every time you meet with him. Louie the Pug is not a talking dog. He's a virtual puppy dog that will stick his tongue out and be cool.

Your virtual dog needs to be taken care of – feed him, take him out to pee, bathe him, and play with him. Dog dress-up games are what Louie the Pug really enjoys, so play pet dog games with him and make him the most swag virtual dog out there!

name: My Child: Lebensborn Remastered
summary:
My Child Lebensborn is a story driven nurture game based on true events. Play as the adoptive parent of Karin or Klaus, and experience the struggles they go through along them.
In My Child Lebensborn Remastered, we are providing more opportunities for you to create more memories with your child, even at the face of tragedy.

name: Mystery Society 2: Hidden Puzzles
summary: Dive into a hidden object adventure with unique tasks, puzzles, and a riveting story. Join elite detectives in a secret organization, uncover hidden treasures, and solve crimes across the globe.

name: My Dear Hatchet Man
summary:
Realistically, nothing bad ever happens in the woods, right?
Put all your guards down, and enjoy your time with a friendly stranger, who might have had developed a thing for you!

name: Mystery Mansion
summary: Escape from the haunted house.

name: My Land
summary: My Land is a farming simulation game from the maker of My Planet, My Business Empire, and My Colony. You begin the game with a blank plot of land and 00. From there, it is up to you to make it your own. You can create a farm with crops and animals, or you can create a commerce area with side walks and pizza stands, or you can create a nature park with lakes and trails. The choice is yours!

name: My Friendly Little Island
summary: My Friendly Little Island is a cute game about personal growth and making friends. It starts out as a slow, simplistic adventure game. However, with every new skill you unlock, the game’s dynamics change more and more into a fast-paced platformer.

name: Myth
summary: Myth is a puzzle horror multiplayer game that guarantees an intense and headache-inducing experience with friends. Why the headache, you ask? Well, let's just say the puzzles are so mind-bendingly hard, they should come with a complimentary bottle of aspirin!

name: Mystery Solitaire: Cthulhu Mythos 2
summary: Feel the cold breath of Cthulhu! Explore the worlds of Lovecraft, collect all the special cards!

name: Myth
summary: Myth is a puzzle horror multiplayer game that guarantees an intense and headache-inducing experience with friends. Why the headache, you ask? Well, let's just say the puzzles are so mind-bendingly hard, they should come with a complimentary bottle of aspirin!

name: Mysterious Thief Emerald
summary:
Made for NaNoRenO Game Jam 2022.

They call her Mysterious Thief Emerald. Her life is anything but ordinary... and a certain keen-eyed detective seems determined to keep it that way!

name: My Time at Sandrock: Collector's Edition
summary: Pre-order the Collector's Edition of My Time at Sandrock, which includes the digital PC game, a &quotPensky&quot plush toy, a wooden workshop to assemble, a 40-page comic book &quotA Logan Story,&quot two wooden Standees of Logan and Nia, a Builder's License, and additional digital content!

name: Mystery Trackers: Fatal Lesson Collector's Edition
summary: It's no ordinary town... Can you stop a mad mayor and his destructive robots?

name: My Little Sister's Special Place
summary: Our hero used to go to Akiba a lot when he was younger. It wasn't to have fun, but for his little sister's sake. One day, his younger sister is gifted a Christmas trip, and they spend time together as if they're a couple. This is the delightful and touching love story of these two siblings.

name: My Racing Career
summary:
Start your engines and make your career as a world-class racing driver in one of the most established motorsport management games.

Launched in 2012, My Racing Career has grown into a deep, competitive racing sim with a passionate community. From open-wheel racing to stock cars, motorbikes to rally — your path is yours to create. Begin in Formula 4 and work your way up to the big leagues like Formula 1, IndyCar, or Formula E. Or take a different route through touring cars, GT, prototypes, MotoGP, superbikes, or rally series.

You control your future. Develop your driver and race strategy in a world where your decisions matter.

name: My Mistress Lu Bu
summary: You were born into the rough hands of the notorious group of bandits, the Yellow Turbans. After their downfall, you lead a small crew of bandits until you're defeated by the warlord Lu Bu. She spares you in exchange for your fealty, and thus begins your service to your mistress Lu Bu.​

name: My Name is Uncle Groucho You Win a Fat Cigar
summary: In this bizarre graphically-augmented text-adventure originally released in 1983 from the mind of Mel Croucher, Uncle Groucho is your guide in a wacky alternative Hollywood where cigars are currency and you are as likely to travel in a space shuttle as in a covered wagon.

name: My Furry Succubus
summary: You just found a mysterious old lamp in your uncle's garage. Nothing bad can happen if you rub it, right?...

name: Mystical Mixing: Arcane Edition
summary:
Enter a world of magic and wonder with Mystical Mixing.
Pour the potion into the cauldron, throw in the clover, bone and feather, stir and voila - you have a cute Mixie!

Combine other ingredients to create Mixies with different features: winged, horned, spotted, furry... the possibilities are endless.

name: My Therapist is a Futanari
summary: It feels like your life isn't going anywhere--like there's some kind of mental block. You take the first step towards making an improvement and set up an appointment with a therapist in your local area.

name: Mysterious Place
summary: Design: In this game, players will step into the world of a Mysterious Place. Navigate the enigmatic landscapes and make crucial decisions. With pixel graphics and high-quality animations, immerse yourself in a visually stunning and atmospheric experience. Available in Russian and English.

name: My Crimes
summary: Get rid of the crimes. Grab all the evidence. Probably get arrested anyway because you have dogshit lawyers. Don't stop punching the boxes, it's your only way out.

name: My Pocket Arcade
summary: A nostalgic ticket-redemption arcade featuring all of your favorite games. Win tickets and use them to buy awesome virtual prizes at the Prize Wall.

name: My Love for You is Evermore
summary:
My Love for You is Evermore is a mobile otome game that lets you create your dream love story! Fall in love your way with one or more of these bachelors: Your work rival, your boss, the accounting executive, or your celebrity client!?

And now... your celeb client's mysterious manager who's always wearing a kitsuke mask joins the ranks! What could he be hiding?

As you enter your name, you enter your story! All conversation and images are oriented towards YOU, so you can fully immerse. And you'll immerse even further when you receive texts and hear your love interest's voice on video call segments throughout the story.

name: My Mystic Secretary
summary: Otome game by Lumiere Entertainment.

name: Mystery Solitaire: The Black Raven 5
summary: These are dark and mysterious times. 200 not easy levels in the game "Mystery Solitaire. The Black Raven 5" is waiting for your mind.

name: My Lovely Pets 2: Collector's Edition
summary: "My lovely Pets 2" is an exciting game, which offers interesting ways to find funny and playful pets, as well as bright hidden objects, and a set of popular mini-games. Meet and make friends with these funny pets in beautiful game locations where they are always ready to hide and fool around.

name: My Pet Hooligan
summary: Rebel against the evil overlord Metazuckbot by wreaking havoc on Hooliland City. Fight each other, destroy stuff, skateboard like a pro-skater, graffiti the buildings, or just hang out with friends. Playing the way you want is what it means to be a Hooligan.

name: My Zombie World
summary: Welcome to My Zombie World, the hilarious and scary game that lets you create your own zombie empire and conquer the world! Use the best crazy strategy to infect all humans, evolve their brains, and build your unstoppable undead army.

name: My Eggs
summary: My Eggs - Side-view game with a physical world, where the player by controlling the direction of the wind moves objects in the game, as well as the main character, who must collect all the eggs and deliver to the destination.

name: Mystical Mixing: Complete Edition
summary:
Enter a world of magic and wonder with Mystical Mixing.
Pour the potion into the cauldron, throw in the clover, bone and feather, stir and voila - you have a cute Mixie!

Combine other ingredients to create Mixies with different features: winged, horned, spotted, furry... the possibilities are endless.

name: Mythos Quest
summary: Play as Aladdin, the brave young man with the flying carpet; Luca, the good witch from the forests of the west; Rumpelstiltskin, the dwarf with the golden touch; Valkyrie, the winged warrior from the Land Beyond; and Hades, the grumpy but good-hearted Lord of the Underworld. Known as “the Legendary Five,” these ragtag heroes are the only ones that can save Mythos. Their quest is to chase after the dark wizard Morgana and recover the Vita Stone, an ancient crystal that provides safety and harmony to whoever controls it. Without the Stone, the Kingdom will not be able to protect itself against the dark forces of the universe. Eager to prove themselves, the Legendary Five have risen to the challenge and will not rest until the Kingdom is saved.

name: My Mundane Life Is Threatened by the Tropes of an RPG!!!
summary:
You play as Natsuna, a girl who works at a nondescript office doing nondescript work.

Doesn't really matter, that's the boring part! But her daily mundane "life" of a monotonous cycle is interrupted by Slimes, Boss fights, Giant Crabs and more!

name: My Newborn Santa: Grow A Christmas Baby
summary: This Christmas, take care of Santa and help him grow into the jolly old man we all adore! Challenge yourself with addictive games & customize everything!

name: My Talking Cat Lily
summary: Your virtual pet is here! Play with talking cat Lily - purrfect virtual cat. What’s furry, playful and waiting to get your attention? It’s your new virtual pet! Start the adventure together with your talking cat Lily. Care for your virtual cat and make her the happiest feline ever! Love your talking pet like you’ve never loved any pet before! Download and play My Talking Cat Lily.

name: My Forced Yakuza Fiancée
summary: One day, you come to the aid of a distressed girl cornered by menacing criminals… However, little do you know, the stranger you saved is none other than Miyabi Kenzaki, the boss of a notorious yakuza clan!

name: Mystery Box: The Journey
summary: Welcome to the 4th chapter of the popular 'Mystery Box' puzzle game series! 10 new boxes full of enigmas to crack are waiting for you on this journey through lost worlds.

name: Mystery Cat
summary: Mystery Cat is a linear visual novel about a cat lost in a subterranean utopia

name: My Supermarket
summary: Manage your own supermarket, attend multiple types of customers and make the most profit you can. Order products, refill shelves, play with your friends in co-op mode, go after thieves, order some staff and grow your empire as much as you can.

name: My QLDC Level
summary: A short Super Mario World ROM hack in which the main purpose is to navigate the world map, while avoiding obstacles and solving puzzles. It won the 1st place in the Questionable Level Design Contest 2023 (QLDC 2023).

name: Mystic Messenger: Valentine's Day DLC
summary: Valentines-themed After Story for each love interest (excluding Ray and V) that came bundled with update 1.6.7.

name: Mystic Messenger: Christmas Special 2016 DLC
summary: Two extra Christmas-themed days of gameplay that culminate in eight new endings. Released along with update 1.6.0.

name: My Horse Club: On the Trail of the Mysterious Appaloosa
summary: A Game For Horse Lovers With A Sense Of Adventure. Discover the secret of the mysterious Appaloosa while horseback riding, western style in gorgeous surroundings.

name: Mystic Messenger: April Fool's 2017 DLC
summary: One extra April Fool's-themed day of gameplay that culminate in three new endings. Released along with update 1.7.0 in celebration of Zen's birthday.

name: My Summer Adventure: Memories of Another Life
summary: A strange incident turns the life of an ordinary young man upside down when, having fallen asleep on a regular train commute, he wakes up in another country... in a body of a Japanese student! An unforgettable summer adventure awaits, promising many fateful meetings and momentous occasions.

name: Myriad Mayhem
summary: Myriad Mayhem is a challenging horde survival game where you create builds with abilities with excluding talents in talent-trees, to survive and protect your peoples castle from a myriad of monsters, before they overwhelm you.

name: My Littlest Skeleton
summary: My Littlest Skeleton is a cosy and relaxing simulation where you care for your very own little Skeleton chum! Pull your unique Skeleton back from the depths of the Nether Region. Attend to their needs, maintain their furnishings, choose from a variety of environments for your Skeleton to call home.

name: My Earth
summary: My Earth is a 3D Sokoban game. In an environment where glaciers are melting due to global warming, the main character, a baby penguin, is separated from the group. The baby penguins find their way back to the colony.

name: My Father Lied
summary: My Father Lied is a first person point and click mystery game that tells the story of Huda, who finds herself following an unfathomable secret regarding her father’s 20 years disappearance.

name: My Cozy Home
summary: My Cozy Home is a relaxing house building game where you get to build the house you always dreamed of. The game offers a huge library of items to create a bedroom or a kitchen or a gaming room or anything you can dream of. Choice is yours.

name: My Unusual Feline Friend
summary: From another dimension, a strange and very cute catgirl visits you. She is very curious how sex works in this dimension and she has chosen you to teach her all about it!

name: My Stomach Hurts and Things Will Never Get Better and I Want to Puke
summary: A short game about stress eating.

name: My Fishing Boat
summary: Explore many seas fishing and discovering treasures... and other surprises!

name: Mystery Lover: Nonexistent Summer
summary: Wei who's in the supernatural club must solve the missing virtual idol incident with his girlfriend Bansha.

name: Mystery Box: Escape The Room
summary: Welcome to the 3rd chapter of the "Mystery Box" series. You're trapped inside dark rooms and must solve intriguing enigmas to open boxes and escape. Can you make it?

name: My Sacred Place
summary: My Sacred Place is an action strategy RPG for the MSX in which you have to protect your village's garden from the clutches of the fearsome Garks.

name: My Hero One's Justice 2: Cheerleader Costumes Bundle
My Kingdom for the Princess II
summary: The official sequel to the addictive, award-winning strategy, time management, simulation game "My Kingdom for the Princess" It's the right time to prove yourself worthy of being a knight once again!

name: Mystery Box: Evolution
summary: Enjoy the 3rd chapter of the 'Mystery Box' puzzle game series! Unlock 57 boxes by solving tons of intriguing riddles that will put your brain to work

name: My Cat Club: Collect Kittens
summary: Collect adorable cats and take cute photos of them in this relaxing cat collection game. Decorate your apartment in your favorite style to make the perfect cozy home for your cats, then take pictures to share on the in-game social media page and watch your follower count rise! A simple game that is perfect for relaxing - start your own cat club now!

name: My First Craft Survival
summary: When I woke up, I found myself on an uninhabited island. And I had nothing with me! Anyway, the first priority is to find food to avoid starvation. At night, mysterious creatures attack, so I need to craft equipment and build a base to defend myself! In the end, there's a boss waiting for me!

name: Myth of the Moirai
summary: Fight off the horde and collect loot as you make your way through a dynamically created world and find a way to end the scourge of evil in this land.

name: Mystic Messenger: Rika's Behind Story
summary: DLC released along with V's After Ending centered around Rika's tortured childhood and what went into making her the way she is. Consists of eight episodes and no chatrooms.

name: My New Classmate is a Dragon?!
summary:
From average guy to wizard-in-training—your life gets flipped upside down after you save the life of a stranger on your way home, and now you’re the master of a dragon girl who has sworn eternal loyalty to you! Things don’t slow down there though, as you soon find out you’re actually a wizard, and you’ve been invited to Deagon Academy to hone your budding magic skills.

You may be new to the world of magic, but with three beautiful classmates cheering you on, how could you fail? The true question is, which one of these girls gets a ‘pass’ from you?

name: Mystic Messenger: Ray's After Ending
summary: DLC that can be played regardless of progress in Ray's route. Takes place two weeks after Ray's good ending.

name: Mystic Messenger: Bad Jumin & After
summary: DLC that unlocks after completing Jumin's Bad Story Ending 2. This DLC takes place two months after his bad story ending.

name: My Hunting Adventure Time
summary: My Hunting Adventure Time Remake is an adult visual novel that is currently in its developmental stages but is very playable. The main story will undergo updates over time. Our goal is to present our players a story and gameplay that exceeds other visual novels.

name: My Camp of Memories: Episode 1
summary: Visual novel in the genre of romance and adventure. You are eighteen years old, and you have just entered the last stage of education. However, strange fragments of memories, notes and a series of events say that it will not work out to study calmly. The path you take is entirely in your hands.

name: My Favorite Monster
summary: My Favorite Monster was developed by Cute Company, a division of Schoolscape, and released in the United States by Simon & Schuster Interactive.

name: Mystery Crypt
summary: Mystery Crypt is a brand new Halloween game that involves scares and logic. The mind game is arranged in a sort of puzzle that gets your brain working without getting bored. The action takes place on a graveyard, filled with tons of white bones on a dark Halloween night. The bones were left from previous players who did not have enough brains to win the game. Your job, as a player, is to save the unfortunate souls and bring the dead players back to life by connecting their broken bones on the graveyard.

name: My Little Garden
summary:
Plant, water and fertilize the plants, help them flourish and make them happy.
Use garden tools, summon supernatural rains, warm sunrays or magical smoke.

name: Mystical Riddles: Ship From Beyond - Collector's Edition
summary: All hands on deck! A strange, oily fog has enveloped the waterfront of the port town of Quietcape, where local fishermen go, never to return again... Can you solve this mystery?

name: My Little Career
summary: My Little Career is a visual novel for adults only. The story of a young girl who moved from a distant suburb to the big city to become a photo model, but everything is not so easy, the world of big business is much more complicated than she expected, but she will stop at nothing.

name: Myths of Rules
summary: This is a text-based adventure puzzle game, where you must struggle to survive in a world filled with ghosts and urban legends. While collecting clues, you'll uncover the truth behind the world and find the way out. The game features a wealth of levels, unconventional rules, and a touch of horror.

name: Mystery Solitaire: Grimm's Tales 9
summary: Fairytale heroes in a fairytale world! Amazing locations and interesting levels solitaire based on the Grimm brothers fairy tales.

name: My Neighbour is a Bunny Demon
summary: A Visual Novel thriller about surviving the machinations of a supernatural seductress. Entangled by a whirlwind romance, you find yourself thrust into a web of paranormal plots and perils.

name: My Lovey-Dovey Demon
summary: A cute love story between a young man and an affectionate, adoring, utterly insatiable demon girl set in the Japanese countryside.

name: My Mine
summary: So, you're a gold digger? Collect jewels in your own mine!

name: My Lovely Dog Adventure
summary: Explore the world as a little Corgi! You wander mysterious and different landscapes in search of your beloved friend, collecting shiny chrystals on the way.

name: Mystery of Dust
summary: A sudden mechanical rebellion. An ordinary girl who has gained power. Faced with a "world-class" crisis. Is there a secret behind the rebellion? Is the power gained safe? Can a few people's journey save the world? Find out in the tower defense RPG, Mystery of the Dust!

name: Mystic Gate
summary: Take the role of a wanderer and his robotic companion as they travel beyond the gate and attempt to master its secrets! Dash, dodge and take aim at hordes of enemies through procedurally generated dungeons that make every run feel unique. Presented in top-down pixel art style, Mystic Gate is a twin stick shooter that combines RPG elements with bullet hell action! Can you survive, upgrade and overcome the terrors of the gate to realize your ultimate dream?

name: My Little Pony: Equestria Girls - Friendship Games: Motocross
summary: Join Equestria Girls in Motocross Friendship Games contest. Grab your motorcycle and race to the finish line in Equestria' s biggest sports event!

name: My Little Blood Cult: Let's Summon Demons
summary: Embark on a demonic fishing adventure in My Little Blood Cult! Combine skill with luck to master a unique fishing mechanic and collect demons, creatures, and more to fill out your oddities cabinet and become the most powerful cult.

name: My Virgin Roommate
summary: You are a freshman, in love with your roommate. Live through five days at Virginia College and take away her innocence. Mia is waiting for you.

name: My Legend of Immortal Cultivation
summary: Immortal cultivation hanging game, with a rich system, experience the world of immortal cultivation

name: My Father's House
summary: My Father's House is a first-person indie survival horror game. The father’s old mansion becomes a maze of nightmares when the secrets of the past are released. Survive, save resources, solve puzzles and stay in the shadows. Ingenuity and tactics are your only way to escape.

name: My Neighbour Mr.Ghost
summary: Exploratory action-adventure game. Shoot the ghosts in the trapped school and escape! Can you escape from mysterious events?

name: Myth or Reality: Mystery of the Lake - Collector's Edition
summary: Follow the footsteps of the Loch Ness monster and reveal the secret of the legendary Loch Ness Lake! Better be careful to avoid being another appetizer for Nessie…

name: Myriad Hotel
summary: A silly hotel-management visual novel. Impress clients, earn money, and resolve issues for your staff to keep the hotel from going under.

name: MyDream Universe: Build Solar
summary:
MyDream Universe is a sandbox space simulation game. Start from a small asteroid absorbing other asteroids to form a solar system. Roaming sandbox universe and discover wandering planets or solars, your solar system can earn GP and mass. GP is important to build your system. It is very easy to earn, simply roaming the universe and near other planets you will receive a GP.
Mass is everything in the universe. Biggest mass planet alway can destroy other smaller mass planets. So, find smaller mass planets and absorb them, and away from heavy mass planet is the survival rule in the universe.
Also mass is available on everywhere, roaming the universe. It is easy to find asteroids, absorb them to develop your planets.
This game is mainly focus on develop and growth the solar system. Absorbing mass is slow and long term. Once your sun has enough mass, it can be transform to neutron star or blackhole.
In order to let you freely build your dream solar system, we provide a 100 save area. So you can build up to 100 different solar system.

name: My Daddy, My Christmas
summary: My Daddy, My Christmas is an adorable game about being a good Daddy, and trying hard to get back with his daughter for Christmas!

name: My First Grade Fantasy Adventure
summary: An early education game for kids with tons of mini-games and movies! Features draggable interactive objects, solving puzzles, & memory matches. All with visual and sound effects to support your child's learning. Enjoy this memorable adventure in one of the most comprehensive First Grade prep games!

name: My Pet Hooligan: Undies Pack
summary: Socks and Undies is where function means fashion. Feel the breeze on your skivvies. Make your enemies blush and allies cheer.

name: My Pet Hooligan: Ninja Pack
summary: Make your hooligan a ninja... a loud awkward ninja with a flamethrower and grenade launcher... but still a ninja!

name: My Pet Hooligan: Season 0 - Founder Pass
summary: Plant your flag as one of the earliest players of My Pet Hooligan with exclusive early access cosmetics.

name: My Pet Hooligan: Anime Girl Pack
summary: Get senpai to finally notice you. Head to the streets as a school girl and wreak havoc on your enemies.

name: My Pet Hooligan: Clownin Around Pack
summary: We're just here to clown around. Everyone's a bozo at heart.

name: My new neighbor is a Futa
summary: A visual novel about a young woman who was not very happy in her marriage, but her whole life changed when a new neighbor moved in next door

name: My Lovely Empress
summary: My Lovely Empress is a empire management sim inspired by Asian mythology. As the Emperor of the Crimson Empire, you will build relations with neighboring rulers, balance internal factions, and ensure the prosperity of your people, all before you reap their souls to resurrect your beloved empress.

name: My Type!
summary:
How fast can you type?
In "My Type!" your typing skills are put to the ultimate test. Write words to remove them before they fill up the board. Some words like "Explode" might have special effects, giving you an extra tool to bring you out of a tricky situation.
"My type" is the perfect game to improve your typing skills and learn how to text faster in a fun and engaging way. It's available in multiple languages to help as many people as possible have fun and improve.

name: My Flower
summary: Homebrew Net Yaroze game for PlayStation 1.

name: My Life with a Lonely Beauty
summary: Experience a heartwarming journey in Japan as you, a rebellious high school student, flee your suffocating life and find refuge in the arms of Haruka Ichinose, a beautiful and troubled woman reeling from life's disappointments. Amidst fun-filled escapades and awkward moments, you'll witness yourself forming an unconventional family with Komari Yuuki, a diligent childhood friend torn between duty and empathy, and Akira Himuro, a cynical and rebellious classmate harboring secret feelings. As the four of you navigate your interconnected lives, will your presence mend their fractured souls or lead to unforeseen complications?

name: My Little Karaoke: Singing is Magic
summary: My Little Karaoke: Singing is Magic is an unofficial My Little Pony karaoke game for Windows, Mac and Linux. The game features music from the Friendship is Magic series, alongside various fanmade songs from the community.

name: My Ex-future Family: Premium Edition
summary:
This version contains two additional features:
1) Cheats — you may control changeable parameters of character and girls with legal tool. It helps to open all pathes and scenes.
2) Events — when you play MEFF you would have your favourite scenes. This feature helps you to repeat all sex events from the game per one click.
3) Walkthrough (in game folder)

name: My Douchey Boss Has a Gentle Twin Brother?!
summary: Kyle's new boss, Vincent, is mischievous and eccentric. One day, Kyle bumps into his boss after work and is surprised when his superior acts kind. Later, he finds out he'd actually met his boss' twin brother, Vernon. The brothers are estranged, but what happens when they fall for the same person?

name: My Furry Protogen 2
summary: After every night comes a new dawn, full of hope and light. As the adventure of our heroes continues, let's see what lies ahead!

name: My Little Pony: Super Luna Game DX
summary: My Little Pony: Super Luna Game DX is a Super Mario World rom hack made for the 2022 Pony Dev Jam on the MLP Forums. The game is based on the Luna Game creepypasta series of games and heavily features the character Princess Luna.

name: My Recycling Center
summary: Operate, configure and expand your own recycling center in this first-person simulator! Work fast and sort the trash. Use the compactors to destroy the bulky waste. Earn satisfaction and cash to buy new containers and unlock new trash types.

name: My Pet World
summary: Make your favorite animals better again! The animals, your best friends, are sick and they need your care. With the help of enthusiastic veterinarians, you can solve real medical files. After your diagnosis, you give the animals the right treatment. Then you nurse the animals until they are strong enough to go home again. The fate of your favorite animals is in your hands. In brief: * More than 20 different animal species to take care of. * Diagnose, treat and monitor the animals as they recover. * 30 challenging medical records written by real vets. * You become a better vet and get more and more tools at your disposal. * Fully Dutch speaking

name: My Dear Brother Jeff
summary:
My Dear Brother Jeff is a Horror experience based on a certain point of view of the story/Creepypasta named Jeff the Killer.

Immerse yourself as Liu, the brother of Jeff, the psychotic killer, face the tragedy of an entire family and discovers the terrible truth that hides behind this horrifiying event...

name: Mythstal: Shadow of the Sun
summary: Experience new life breathed into a tried-and-true formula. Mythstal: Shadow of the Sun is a fast-paced, turn-based RPG with a focus on quick thinking and fluid team building. Revive the world around you to grow your arsenal, your team, and your skills, in a frantic race against a fading world.

name: Myth or Reality: Mystery of the Lake DLC
summary: Learn more details about the suspicious Loch Ness Hotel to prove or disprove a well-known myth and find out what's really going on there.

name: My Talking Dog 2
summary: Help your talking friend create a perfect world of his own – customize his fashion style, hair, the interior design of his home and play incredibly cute mini games with him meanwhile. Besides just playing with your virtual pet Charlie II, you have to feed him, bathe him, brush his teeth, take him to the rest room, take care of him when having a cold and help him fall asleep. This talking dog deserves royal treatment and you are the one who can do it better than anyone else! You'll also be the one he will grow up with as his best friend!

name: My Hero One's Justice 2: Ultimate Edition
summary:
The Ultimate Edition includes:
• MY HERO ONE'S JUSTICE 2
• Season Pass
• Season Pass 2
• In-game item: Ribbit Ribbit Set

MY HERO ONE'S JUSTICE 2, the over-the-top follow-up to the smash hit 3D arena fighter MY HERO ONE'S JUSTICE, makes its heroic debut! Make full use of characters' Quirks as you clash head-to-head in epic battles across huge arenas!

name: Mysterious Mayan Madness
summary: Mysterious Mayan Madness is a 20 map megawad (2 of which being an intro and a credits map) created as the fifteenth edition of the Pineapple Under the Sea speedmapping series and our first event of 2022. Hailing as a spiritual successor to Clandestine Castle Crashing, each map was made with an 8 hour time limit with the requirements that mappers make a jungle temple with a minimum of 4 traps of various types and 6 secrets within. After escaping the famous PUSS dev hell, these jungle temples are here to perplex and stun you as you inspect every single brick for a soulsphere.

name: Mystery Channel
summary: Slapdash and frankly unintelligible halloween anthology game. Made for a 9-day contest on saltworld.net

name: My Next Life as a Villainess: All Routes Lead to Doom! - Pirates of the Disturbance: Day One Edition
My Chabudai
summary: Xbox Live indie game by konoha

name: My Little Guessy
summary: Guess the episode from a random My Little Pony screencap, featuring frames from Friendship is Magic, Make Your Mark and Tell Your Tail.

name: Mystery Solitaire: Cthulhu Mythos 3
summary: Do you hear that call? It's Cthulhu inviting you to play a new solitaire game!

name: Mystic Land: The search for Maphaldo
summary: An old-school RPG game inspired by Wizardry 7, Might and Magic and Eye of the Beholder series. 2d grid-based movement, strategic turn-based combat and lots of places to visit and puzzles to solve.

name: My Slow Life with the Princess Knight and Her Devoted Handmaiden
summary: Garland used to be a formidable adventurer... But then he was betrayed and left for dead. Now he has a reputation as the Dragon Survivor and no one left in the world he can rely on. When he brings two beautiful servants into his life to tend his wounds, will he learn to open his heart again?

name: My Pleasure: Season 3
summary: Welcome to the third and final season of My Pleasure, a choice-driven adult Visual Novel, full of hot women, mystery, and sex! This VN is packed with high-quality graphics, a rich story, humor, and hot close-up animations!

name: My Daily Pets
summary: "My Daily Pets" is a game where you care for alien pets and uncover their secrets. Feed them, play, train, and dance. Investigate their origins, document findings, and bond with these adorable extraterrestrial companions!

name: My Boss Leidi
summary: A short 18+ kinetic novel about an exhausted college student and his boss.

name: Myrcella the Meandering Mage
summary: “Myrcella the Meandering Mage” is comedic fantasy point-and-click adventure game and yuri dating sim. Follow Myrcella as she travels around the towns of the beautiful Kingdom of Falkenhorn, solves the townsfolks’ problems using her magic and charms the local ladies too! Adventure and romance await!

name: Myworld is Yourworld
summary: Medium sized brick/metal map with a Shub boss fight at the end.

name: Myst
summary: This handheld version of Myst is a reworked re-release of the original game. It is similar in content to Real MYST as it contains Rime Age, the fifth age with additional content that was added in that release.

name: Myst
summary: This version of Myst is an expanded version of the original Nintendo DS release.

name: Mythical Concept Starnaut
summary: "STARNAUT" is an easy-to-learn, hard-to-master "survivor-like" game from the creators of El Shaddai: Ascension of the Metatron, that emphasizes massive Nitro Jumps and Dashes, evading with verticality, synergizing extremely powerful weapons, deep and considered lore, satire, and of course, the strongest force in the universe....love!

name: Mystic Valley Battleground
summary: Valley Battlefield is a casual adventure game where you explore various monsters or events to gain equipment and skills. By strategically upgrading equipment and matching skills, improving one's own attributes, defeating a powerful boss to achieve ultimate victory!

name: My Academy's Special Place
summary: Our hero's homeroom teacher is also his big sister, Yaeka. She's popular with the students, but at home, she's a slobbish drunk. There's Maika, an exchange student and Akiba nerd. She's always asking him to go to Akiba with her. But Maika is told to return home. Two love stories are about to begin!

name: My Little Pony: Party of One
summary: Who throws better parties than Pinkie Pie? Having just finished one celebration, Pinkie Pie sets off to invite all of her favorite ponies to a brand new party, but suddenly every pony seems to be quite busy. What’s going on? Join the investigation as Pinkie Pie visits her My Little Pony friends looking for clues.

name: My Friendly Neighborhood: Neighborhorde
summary: Something scary is happening with everyone's favorite Saturday morning puppet show... Fend off puppets and solve puzzles in this survival horror adventure.

name: Mycelium Guardians
summary: Isometric strategy game, you command a collective of fungi in a post-apocalyptic Earth. Utilize mycelium to build structures, manage resources, and mitigate environmental threats. Your choices shape the balance between life and desolation. Engage in strategy to be Earth's final line of defense

name: Mycelium Heaven
summary: It's a cozy yet challenging puzzle game about a mushroom that devours zombies. You'll expand, grow and consume your way through the forest using your wit and reason.

name: Mystical Mixing: Wand and Frog Edition
My Daughter is a Cultist! SE
summary: A Short horror experience.

name: My Sexy Anthro: Fluttertime!
summary: My Sexy Anthro: Fluttertime! is a pornographic My Little Pony visual novel developed by Fatelogic on Newgrounds in 2013. The game prominently features the Equestria Girls variation of Fluttershy.

name: My Brother; The Parasite
summary: A story about a corpse, a complicated sibling relationship, and the things we forget. Made in Twine. Written, coded, and illustrated in three weeks for the Interactive Fiction Competition.

name: My Soul Trapped in a WIN98 PC
summary: My Soul Trapped in a WIN98 PC (ST98.WAD) is a January 2015 techbase map designed for Boom-compatible source ports by Lucas Hernandez (Lukasxd). Most of the level's textures are graphics from Windows 98 and 1990s Internet programs, and it uses the music track "Earthlight" from the game Einhänder.

name: My Rental Girlfriend Next
summary:
As a shy high school student, dating isn’t exactly your thing. But luckily, you’ve been able to take advantage of a rental girlfriend service to at least enjoy artificial relationships. You seemed quite satisfied with the status quo and are especially fond of a certain girl named Sumire who you’ve taken on many dates.

One day, you happened to witness the Rental Girlfriend championship and are in awe of the beauty of contestants such as Celina. Your brought back out of your trance when a striking girl next to you begins talking to you. Her name is Jerry and she claims she will be the next Rental Girlfriend star.

It seems she thinks that it is some kind of simple modeling contest, so you decide to explain that it’s much more than that. However, instead of losing interest, you’ve only gotten her more invested and she demands you become her coach to become the next star!

name: Mystery Trackers: Darkwater Bay - Collector's Edition
summary:
Elephant Games presents the latest exhilarating installment of the Mystery Trackers series!

This is a Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure game, meaning a specific genre of story-driven, point & click adventures. Throughout the game, players are tasked to find a list of objects hidden within a particular scene, and to occasionally complete various mini-games/puzzles.

The Collector's Editions includes:
• Dive deeper and explore aquatic lore in the bonus game!
• Find hidden fish, morphing objects, and restore the missing puzzle pieces.
• If you need a helping hand, consult the comprehensive strategy guide.
• Enjoy unlocking a myriad of fun achievements.
• Includes a secret room, concept art, wallpapers, soundtrack, and more!

name: Mystery at Grand Fir Village
summary: Enter a colorful town where new stories evolve every day. What clues will you find in this mystery life-sim? Will you make new friends? Be the local trouble-maker? Spend a rainy day at your treehouse?

name: My Friend Aki
summary: A horror-tinged puzzle and exploration game set in an abandoned mall. Improvise tools, uncover secrets, and stumble upon something strange and bright in the darkness.

name: My Eyes Deceive
summary:
my eyes deceive is a first-person psychological horror experience set in a basement, or shelter, if you will. Set over the course of roughly a week, you play as a young girl who has been living there all her life.

The outside world is infected with a deadly disease. Society is in chaos. Fortunately, your papa is protecting you by keeping you in his shelter. He's very insistent on you taking your disease-preventive pills every day. Why do the pills make you tired? When will you be able to leave? Can we be deceived by our own perception?

name: Myths & Fairy Tales Bundle
summary:
This bundle includes:
The Myth Seekers: The Legacy of Vulkan - Face off against the legacy of ancient gods!
Endless Fables: Shadow Within - Dreams aren't what they seem.
Eventide 2: Sorcerer's Mirror - Discover the magic of slavdom!

name: MycoRelic
summary: MycoRelic is a cooperative third person action-RPG set on an island inhabited by tribal robots. Raid derelict foundries and ancient temples to upgrade your body, gaining forgotten powers. Wield elemental magic to trigger powerful reactions or fight with melee and ranged weapons in dynamic combat.

name: My Little Pony AR
summary: My Little Pony AR is a cancelled mobile game based around the My Little Pony series that was in development in early 2017. The game was being developed by Climax Studios.

name: My Next Life as a Bird
summary: "My Next Life as a Bird" is a speedrun platformer game. Players can customize various mechanics using "Bird Coins," evade incoming magical projectiles, and aim to reach the finish line as quickly as possible, creating their own fastest completion journey.

name: My Singing Monsters: Beat Hereafter Skin Pack
summary: Unlock the Beat Hereafter Island Skin available on Bone Island. Alongside the cosmetic makeover to Bone Island, you'll receive a variety of boosts to Bone Island.

name: My Train Arrives: Sea and Mountains
summary: In this extension you will build a railway net on a large map with a mountain range and several rivers. If you like long train trips, this map is for you.An exciting journey in picturesque mountain scenery along a sea shore is waiting for you.

name: My Trailer Park Life
summary: My Trailer Park Life is a single-player, permadeath, open world, urban survival, life simulator. Play the character who lives in an RV, where your choices shape the story. Manage your wellbeing, work to earn money, buy food and supplies, or steal to survive. Enjoy the beauty of the ordinary.

name: My Time at Sandrock: Builders Beach and Ball Clothing Pack
My Time at Sandrock: Cute Critter Furniture Pack
summary: Contains 10 cute pieces of furniture, inspired in design by animals.

name: My Time at Sandrock: Pet Pack - Lil Gecko
summary: Travel to the desert community of Sandrock and take on the role of a fledgling Builder. Use your trusty toolset to gather resources, construct machines, and turn your run-down workshop into a well-oiled production facility to save the town from the jaws of economic ruin!

name: My Time at Sandrock: Far East Furniture Pack
summary: Contains 10 elegant pieces of Oriental-style furniture.

name: My Time at Sandrock: Interior Decorator Pack
summary: Contains 8 floor designs, 8 wallpapers, and 4 roof designs to build your perfect home.

name: My Time at Sandrock: Builder's Beach and Ball Clothing Pack
summary: Includes swimsuits and ball attire for your builder; each set comes in 4 different colors that you can mix and match. A set includes a top, a bottom, headwear, shoes, and 3 accessories.

name: My Time at Sandrock: Deluxe Edition
summary: Celebrate the ultimate My Time at Sandrock experience with the exclusive Bundle!

name: Mystery Lover 2: Forgotten Truth
summary: In River City, there is an ordinary milk tea shop, but with one peculiar thing about it - almost every day there is a huge line in front of it. Is it just due to its popularity? Or is someone specifically hiring people to stand in that line? And if the second is true, then what is the reason for this - is someone playing some dirty game against the owner of the tea shop, or is there even greater conspiracy behind all this?

name: My Time at Sandrock: Super Furniture Pack
summary: This content requires the base game My Time at Sandrock on Steam in order to play.

name: Mysterious Legend
summary: This is a very adventurous exploration game.

name: My Night Sun All Games
summary:
A Bundle containing all My Night Sun Games games.
Includes: 3 Xbox games and 3 Windows games.

name: My Sister is Wanted
summary: A mouse lost in time and the crimes of their family

name: My Suika: Watermelon Game
summary: A fun watermelon merge puzzle game! Combine various matching fruits to help Kyo gather watermelons!

name: Mythic Dreams
summary: A simple retro computer game about exploring dreams, featuring a soundtrack by the ambient musician physi.

name: My Dream Setup: Pets
summary: Does your pet also live in your room? With the Pets DLC you can add animals, toys and accessories to your room. Choose your furry friend from the 16 breeds of dogs and cats featured in the DLC. In addition to dogs and cats, you can choose from fish, parrots, hamsters and even a lizard.

name: My Crazy New Fake Love Life
summary:
You live in the shadow of your twin brother, the golden boy of your family. Though you’re perfectly content with that, when your brother gets into an accident and ends up in the hospital with amnesia, your parents have you step in to take his place at his elitist school.

Pretending to be your brother until he regains his memories, you find yourself now balancing complex relationships with three beautiful girls.

Can you successfully fool everyone and succeed with your entire family depending on you?

name: My Tsundere Femboy
summary: My Tsundere Femboy is a short erotic kinetic visual novel where you play as the typical depiction of a gooner protagonist, a wanker and a loser, who's about to get involved in an exciting adventure with her landlady's effeminate son.

name: Mystery Box VR: Escape The Room
summary: The VR version of the third chapter of the Mystery Box series. Can you crack crazy puzzles to open incredible boxes and escape the room you're trapped in?

name: My Girls’ Secrets
summary: This is a "casual" game with beautiful painting style, go through the level and explore the mysterious world, in this world will meet all kinds of girls, in the face of their challenges you should make choices to make them succeed as your girlfriend.

name: MythWars & Puzzles
summary: Welcome to MythWars & Puzzles. Immerse yourself in the fantasy world with magic and lore. You will take on the role of a mighty Lord that have been chosen to join an unprecedented war against the evil gods. It is time to construct your magical city, train a massive army and recruit legendary heroes. This very unique and attractive RPG game uses the classic match-3 puzzle to drive the power of the gods into your army as they charge into the enemies fearlessly, and get rid of all the evil.

name: Myth of Future Dimension
summary: A real-time strategy game that abandons complicated operations and pursues lightheartedness.Tells a story that............ is not easy to summarize or describe......Experience the cultivation of armaments with a "high degree of freedom".

name: My Time at Sandrock: Summer Heat Collection 1
summary: Travel to the desert community of Sandrock and take on the role of a fledgling Builder. Use your trusty toolset to gather resources, construct machines, and turn your run-down workshop into a well-oiled production facility to save the town from the jaws of economic ruin!

name: My Time at Sandrock: Summer Heat Collection 2
summary: Travel to the desert community of Sandrock and take on the role of a fledgling Builder. Use your trusty toolset to gather resources, construct machines, and turn your run-down workshop into a well-oiled production facility to save the town from the jaws of economic ruin!

name: My Time at Sandrock: Summer Heat Collection 3
summary: Travel to the desert community of Sandrock and take on the role of a fledgling Builder. Use your trusty toolset to gather resources, construct machines, and turn your run-down workshop into a well-oiled production facility to save the town from the jaws of economic ruin!

name: My Time at Sandrock: Starlight Collection 3
summary: A starlight costume collection with outfits for Nia, Unsuur, Amirah, and Owen in 4 colors for each character. Each outfit contains a hat, top, bottoms, shoes, and 3 additional accessories.

name: My Time at Sandrock: Starlight Collection 2
summary: A starlight costume collection with outfits for Fang, Catori, Ernest, and Mi-an in 4 colors for each character. Each outfit contains a hat, top, bottoms, shoes, and 3 additional accessories.

name: My Time at Sandrock: Starlight Collection 1
summary: A starlight costume collection with outfits for Logan, Grace, Elsie, and Qi in 4 colors for each character. Each outfit contains a hat, top, bottoms, shoes, and 3 additional accessories.

name: Mydhia Online
summary:
Welcome to the world of Mydhia Online, an MMORPG that brings back the nostalgia of the golden era of RPGs, inspired by classics like Final Fantasy and Chrono Trigger. With 16-bit pixelated graphics, the game captures the same retro vibe as hits like Stardew Valley.

Get ready for real-time combat against hundreds of enemies in a complex and engaging storyline. But remember, Mydhia Online isn't just about solo adventures. Socialization is the key to success in this game, with party, guild, and EXP-sharing systems among friends.

So, join us, Wanderer, and dive yourself into the vast universe of Mydhia.

name: My House and I Got Transported To Another World
summary: Asmongold got transported to another world by an evil AI version of himself! Battle your way through this unknown world to find your way back home!

name: My Valiant Purpose
summary: Created by long-time "American Dad!" animator Shane Curry, "My Valiant Purpose" is a story-driven experience about a rabbit named Gum following his dream. Fully narrated and with voice acting, the gameplay is inspired by 8-bit Mascot Platformers.

name: My Faithful and Loyal Wife Would Never Cheat on Me
summary: Join Karl, a forum moderator, and his wife, Stacey, in a tale of suspicion and unexpected turns. Stacey's new boss, Tyrone Bullman, adds complexity to their lives. Explore trust, love, and the unexpected in My Faithful and Loyal Wife Would Never Cheat on Me.

name: Mystic Strife
summary: Mystic Strife is a fast-paced chaotic party fighting game for up to eight friends. Choose one of six characters with unique abilities and prepare yourself for a simple yet surprisingly deep platforming deathmatch!

name: My Anima Boy
summary: A short visual novel depicting the struggles and romantic entanglements of a composer attempting to write lyrics for the first time in his life. It's a BL (Boys' Love) story.

name: My Pet Hooligan: Mall Santa Pack
summary: Tis the Season to destroy all those Hooligans on your on the naughty list.

name: My Pet Hooligan: Ugly Christmas Sweater Pack
summary: Bring on the Mistletoe & Mayhem! Ugly Christmas Sweaters are here to eliminate your enemies in style!

name: My Office Adventures
summary:
Interactive casual SOL porn game where you help revive your father's dying business with your groundbreaking idea. Along with the ride, you are joined by many cute girls and hot milfs.
Will you be able to handle them all? Time to find out!

name: My Universe Collection
summary:
In this bundle, find 3 games from the My Universes series, including:

My Universe : My Baby - a realistic baby simulation. Time to become a parent! Take care of your newborn boy or girl, keep them happy and help them learn new skills.

My Universe : Interior Designer - become the most renowned interior designer in town and create your dream home..
