My Universe : School Teacher - become the best teacher in town! Play as a young teacher with a mission: bringing your new school back to the top!

name: My Devilish Contract
summary: You follow the story of a boy who lacks self-confidence. He can't even muster up the courage to ask a girl out. One day, he happens to find a book in the attic. He decides to open the dark and suspicious book and inside, he finds a spell that can "grant any wish." He reads the spell out loud and a puff of black smoke spews from the book. Out of the smoke, a demon appears.

name: My Little Animal Boy
summary: A sweet yoai story between humans turned into animals.

name: Myrm Emblem
summary: An FE8 hack with every playable myrmidon from across the series

name: My Cute Fuhrer
summary: A small satiric anti-war game with a cute Fuhrer as a lead character. Will you be able to melt her heart?

name: My Dreams
summary: My Dreams is a Yume Nikki fangame inspired by the creator's dreams. You play as Vinno and explore a surreal dream world.

name: Mystical Ninja Starring Goemon
summary:
Mystical Ninja Starring Goemon is a colorized port of Ganbare Goemon: Sarawareta Ebisumaru!, released as part of Konami GB Collection Vol. 3 for the Game Boy Color in Europe. This version marks the game's first release in English, since the original Game Boy version was exclusive to Japan.

Gameplay is similar to Ganbare Goemon! Karakuri Douchuu which was released on the Famicom. Only Goemon is playable, and the game consists of him rescuing Ebisumaru; Sasuke and Yae do not make appearances.

name: My Bakery Empire: Bake With Style
summary: Give Lizzie a new look with cute, brand-new clothes, hairstyles, and accessories!

name: My Bakery Empire: Bake With Taste
summary: Make your cakes look special with new colorful decorations and compete in VIP competitions to win big prizes!

name: My Time at Etheria
summary:
After waking up from a bizarre dream, you find yourself lost in the middle of the woods. Unfamiliar with your surroundings, you decided to make your way out of the forest...

Travel across the unfamiliar world, and prepare yourself for the troubles ahead. Will you find your way back home?

This game is based on old-school RPG game titles with a single linear story.

name: My Love for You is Evermore: Manager's Route
summary: DLC for Manager's route that includes twelve chapters and five new CGs.

name: My Grandparent's House
summary: My Grandparent's House is a first-person survival horror experience where you must play as a ten year old boy exploring a horrifying house and unraveling the mystery that lies within. Every game intends to be unique, as puzzle solutions, item placement and a part of the house are randomized. Unlock ten story-driven documents and six unique endings.

name: My Friend the Spider
summary: A small "horror" narrative game about isolation and depression.

name: My Little Pony: Magic Garden
summary: My Little Pony: Magic Garden is a cancelled mobile game based on My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic. Currently only concept art for the game exists online.

name: My Life: Farm Vet
summary: They need you on the farm – examine and treat lots of animals!

name: My Moorhen
summary: A pet simulator inspired by Tamagotchi. The player is tasked with caring for a young Crazy Chicken, having to feed and play with it in order to keep it healthy and happy.

name: My Golf
summary: Welcome to MY GOLF! The latest state-of-the-­art golf simulation for your ATARI 2600. It's amazingly real with rivers, sand traps, ponds, trees, roughs and out of bounds. Play alone or join a friend into a relaxing game of MY GOLF. But don't be fooled, you need skill, strategy and great concentration.

name: Mystic Academy: Escape Room
summary: Today is the day of your final exam to become a wizard. Within this enchanting escape room, you'll navigate a wizardry school, unravel puzzles, master new spells, and put your magical skills to the ultimate test. Will you emerge triumphant?

name: Mystery Case Files: A Crime in Reflection - Collector's Edition
summary: Just when you thought it was safe to take a vacation, the Crown calls you back into action! While burglary cases aren’t the Master Detective’s typical area of investigation, the police are stumped when a royal coronation scepter is stolen from one of the most secure museums in the world in the latest of a series of similar incidents, and they’re turning to you for help. The thieves have proven to be careless but crafty, somehow able to get in and out of the most secure locations in seconds and disappear into thin air! But what starts as a simple series of heists quickly spirals out of control when the criminals awaken something that will put them, the Master Detective, and even the world itself in grave danger! Can you unlock the bloody secrets the thieves discovered and save the day? There’s only one way to find out, Detective! Crack the case in this all-new Hidden-Object Puzzle Adventure!

name: Mysterious Island
summary:
The storm appeared suddenly, tossing Robin's ship against sharp cliffs.

Shipwrecked and lucky to be alive, he finds himself on the beach of a mysterious island inhabited by strange friends...and enemies. Now, to find a way home, he must explore, make allies and master the mysteries of his new surroundings. Mysterious Island offers a unique mix of adventure, role-playing and real-time strategy, with control of up to 5 characters. Danger lurks around every corner, as well as adventure. Are you ready to discover if the last of the dragons really lives somewhere in the islands?

name: My Superstar Boyfriend
summary: A boys love mobile game.

name: Mystery at the Movie Club
summary: Mystery at the Movie Club lets you follow the thrilling love during the summer camp, find a good ending to your love story! You're the one to decide how your destiny will unfold. Choose your love!

name: My Bakery Empire: Complete Edition
summary: Enjoy this yummy baking story and help Lizzie fulfill her dream!

name: My Confounding Cat is Criminally Cute!
summary: A cute, wholesome yaoi / boys love visual novel about a grumpy wizard and... a black cat? Wait, what?

name: MyGF: Another
summary: A brand new game in the world of 'My GF Doesn't Know What I'm Into!' Discover new sides to the cast and enjoy the story from different perspectives.

name: My Sweet Floating in the Void
summary: The game is a first-person puzzle adventure, with wacky and old-fashioned graphics, which will transport the player into a dreamlike, psychedelic world composed of an experimental game system that will challenge and test even the most experienced puzzle gamers in the industry.

name: My Little Universe: Xmas Character Pack
summary: Make your experience more festive with 4 new characters!

name: My Evil Clones
summary: My evil clones is a dynamic shooter-puzzle game where players combat armed aggressive clones. Face diverse enemies, use agility and strategy to survive, and prevent a global catastrophe.

name: My Interstellar Inn
summary: From the romantic star period, to the first class star show, to all kinds of strange foreign star show, from the time of the star to the sky. Various types of new businesses such as alcoholic beverages,Operate a restaurant, seeds, cultivated animals, wine, love, customer openings, exhibitions, etc.

name: My IShowSpeed
summary: Here you can go all the way from scratch, pump your muscles, become a professional soccer player, earn a fortune, and much more! You and your Speedy will never get bored, because there are tons of mini-games and fun activities in the game!

name: My Free Farm
summary: You’ve never seen a farm like this! You can breed massive monster fruits, raise super animals, and organize cow races. Tend to your fields and sell your farm-fresh product. Experience the most expansive farm game of all time!

name: My Breast Friend Sally
summary: An erotic/ comedy visual novel, centered around a day in the life of a busty cow-girl who has a severe crush on her younger male caretaker. Experience a fully voiced story a point and click exploration of the farm, and many unlockables

name: My Little Universe: Demodium
summary: Explore Demodium planet with new dungeons, challenges, and a new character!

name: My Truck Game
summary: Physics based, off road truck and bus simulation.

name: My Melody & Kuromi no Machigai Sagashi
summary: My Melody & Kuromi no Machigai Sagashi is a browser based game that was hosted on the Yahoo Japan website during a collaboration between Sanrio and Yahoo in 2012.

name: My Little Pony Hair Salon
summary: Get ready to have some fun in the Ponyville, ladies! Four of your favorite ponies feature this brand new hair salon game for girls on DressUpWho.com and you’re invite to join Applejack in and help her impress her colourful clients with her amazing hairstyling skills. Rainbow Dash, Fluttershy and Twilight Sparkle are going to be your clients of the day and you and Applejack need to make sure they leave your beauty place with a huge smile on their face and looking jaw-dropping. Ready? Now get ‘My Little Pony Hair Salon’ game started and see that crazy are looks you can put together for the three ponies looking for a change. Use your mouse to guide Applejack in the hairstyling process and once you’re done with each of your clients… dress them up in super cool outfits and matching accessories. Have fun, ladies!

name: My Music Oasis
summary: myMO (my Music Oasis) is an immersive multiplayer game built for a community of DJs, Musicians, and Music Fans to share beats while raving in a virtual world that features player customizable Dance Clubs, DJ Controlled Lights & Awesome Visual Effects.

name: My Uncle's Story
summary:
Tired of life you can only think of getting out and making it all stop.

Thus, one day you found an adventuring magazine with survival tips and decided to run from it all. One day after work, determined to full fill this dream, you set out to build your new home in the middle of the Forest.

With only an handful of tools in your bag and an old truck, you begin building your house, log by log.

What could possibly go wrong...

name: Mysterious prophecy
summary: This is a parkour game that is not just about running, but about climbing, jumping, and crossing all obstacles, constantly running forward.

name: My Last Appointment
summary: The doctor said today was my last appointment, I'm healthy. Time to go home, what could go wrong?

name: My Adventure Book
summary: Join the amazing adventure! Explore a magical world, solve puzzles, find objects and help local creatures. You will complete this game in 5 minutes!

name: Mystia
summary:
The first 100-yen RPG series in the game market!

Let's become the main character Meena and go on an adventure! It is an RPG that depicts Meena, a magical swordsman living in a border village, growing up through adventure. We will go around the fields and dungeons to defeat monsters and explore tools and treasures while advancing the story. With a save function and a memo function that automatically saves even if the game is interrupted.

name: MyMustache
summary: "My Mustache" is a narrative game that tells a story about childhood.

name: My Liege
summary: My Liege is a medieval RPG that plays like a choose your own adventure visual novel. Unlike most medieval stories however, the house you are Lord of is the smallest and least influential of the noble houses. It is up to you to make the best of tough situations if your house is to maintain its place in the noble hierarchy.

name: My Life As An Alchemist
summary: The first survivor-like game without any enemies! Choose up to three potions to craft per wave, swiftly gather the required ingredients within a limited time, then craft the best potions to enhance your stats in various ways! Research and unlock new elements to expand your alchemical arsenal!

name: My Shadow
summary: Explore the enigmatic world of My Shadow, a 2.5D Horror Puzzle Platformer where reality blurs. As night descends, illusions materialize, luring you into the intricate depths of your own mind. Unravel the mysteries where the boundaries of reality haze and imagination takes control.

name: My Cute Roommate Irene
summary: Are you feeling stressed? Don't worry. Serene is here to help you

name: My Life as a Cat
summary:
"My life as a cat" is a relaxing, slow-paced visual novel about longing for something different than the modern society and searching back to nature. It has AI-generated oil paintings to illustrate the fully voiced and texted story as you progress through it according to your choices.

Will you have what it takes to survive out in the wilderness, or will you steer towards a not-so-favorable ending?

name: My Friend Pedro: Arena
summary: Use acrobatics, reflexes and a sh*t tone of bullets to gain the highest score in one of the six available levels! This game has all the exciting bits from the original 'My Friend Pedro', but put in the new context of Arena-mode, a mode which will put your survival instinct to the test! How long will you survive?

name: My Grandpa's Haunted House
summary: My Grandpa's Haunted House is a 2D top-down survival horror game based on the story of a girl named Emily who has returned to her grandpa's house from abroad only to find out that her grandpa passed away and his spirit got trapped in the house by a Demon.

name: My Singing Monsters: Thumpies
summary: Thump to the rhythm and bounce to the beat with these cute, fuzzy (and kinda gross) musical monsters! Full of toe-tapping mischief and off-beat melodies, Thumpies is a unique rhythm-based game where you keep the beat alive by tapping in time with Thumpies as they bounce and tumble to the musical score. The original inspiration for the hit mobile game My Singing Monsters, Thumpies is now remastered and re-imagined!

name: My Drug Cartel
summary: My Drug Cartel is a drug plantation management game with basebuilding and combat elements. Expand your plantation, hire workers, research new drugs and construct buildings. But be ready to face a heavy response by law enforcement by hiring guards, buying weapons and ammunition and building defences.

name: My Bestie is a Femboy Streamer
summary: Your bestie is a Streamer. You've asked him before, but he always remains elusive on the matter...

name: My Pretty Closet
summary: Embark on a forest stroll with your grandfather, only to awaken alone in a eerie cabin. Unveil buried memories, revealing parental secrets. Confront inner demons of depression and anxiety and seek for answers and peace in this unsettling yet serene psychological horror game.

name: Mythic Trials
summary: Mythic Trials is a competitive Hack'n'Slash in which every player will create their unique skill build. It includes hundreds of Solo trials, Battle Royale PvP, Diablo-like item loots, daily World Bosses, rankings, draft tournaments, and dozens of different skills and is playable on mobile.

name: My Corp Cargo Simulator
summary: In this game, we manage a cargo company in a small town. We can deliver cargo to customers within the city by walking, cycling, motorcycle or car. In this business start-up simulation game, you must make serious decisions and work hard to grow your cargo company.

name: My Pleasure: Season 1
summary: My Pleasure is a choice-driven adult Visual Novel, full of hot women, mystery, and sex! This VN is packed with high-quality graphics, a rich story, humor, and hot close-up animations!

name: My Little Pony: A Zephyr Heights Mystery
summary: Take friendship to new heights and tame the chaotic magic that’s turning the world upside down, in a mystery adventure for one or two ponies!

name: My Sexy Neighbor
summary: My Sexy Neighbor is an immersive real-time visual novel for adults that transports players into the tense and emotionally rich world of neighborhood dynamics and mysterious relationships

name: My Thai Boyfriend
summary: This is an LVG, a GALGAME, a visual novel, a funny and hilarious game. It's a story about love choices of a Thai Ladyboy.

name: My Destiny Girls
summary: Xiao Bao opened his eyes, he was surrounded by six women. He embarked on an immersive journey of love with them. Amongst them were a gaming enthusiast, a sultry dancer, a childhood crush, a sexy doctor, an innocent schoolgirl, and a wealthy businesswoman. Who would be his true love?

name: Mystic Pillars: Remastered
summary: Mystic Pillars is a blend of intriguing puzzles and an immersive storyline set in Ancient India. The game is a reimagination of the Indian traditional board game - "Ali Guli Mane" or the Internationally known variant "Mancala".

name: Myoka: First Person View
summary: Myoka is a Open World first person view simulator. Fly quadcopters, drive cars, motorcycles, bikes, and more! New updates, 4x a year, will include brand new spaces and vehicles to control.

name: My Hidden Pets: Find My Duck
summary: Step into the unique world of duck searching. Bring a friend and see how many ducks you can find in the latest adventure of the My Hidden Pets series

name: My Protogen Engineer
summary: You've almost died, you lost your body. Gladly, you were saved by your old friend Xena, a genius engineer who lives on a desolate planet. Now it's time to recover and find a new goal in your life!

name: Mystified Cat
summary: Move the cat through the moving platforms to catch the fish.

name: My Talking Angela 2+
summary: This is a port of My Talking Angela 2 exclusively for Apple Arcade that removes all the ads and microtransactions.

name: Mystia2
summary:
"mystia2" consists of three chapters, and the party changes for each chapter. The first part and the second part 2 apps together are about 500KB, and you can enjoy the world view of "mystia" more deeply in a large volume scenario.

It is a variety of storylines such as 32 kinds of magic, more than 100 kinds of monsters, and field dungeons on 20 maps, but also emphasizes operability. With an automatic save system that automatically saves even if the game is interrupted, and a memo system that allows you to remember where to go next, RPG beginners are also safe. In addition, we have introduced a treasure collection system, so you can enjoy treasure hunting in a vast map along with the progress of the story.

"mystia2" is a fantasy RPG set on the continent of Mystia, one year after the previous work "mystia".

In this work, which consists of all three chapters, the party changes for each chapter.
A large volume of scenarios around the "King's Sword" left by the gods and the "Masty Stone" that manipulates the gods
You can enjoy the world view of "mystia" drawn with gentle colors more deeply.

Like the previous work, it is equipped with convenient functions such as a memo function and an automatic save system. There are also plenty of rushing elements such as the treasure collection system and "from the beginning as it is strong" that comes out after clearing.

Let's use a wide variety of magic and challenge ourselves to fight against monsters who block our way.

name: Mystery Box 5: Elements
summary: Explore a new series of intricate boxes filled with alluring enigmas and brain-teasing challenges that will leave you a lasting impression

name: My Head On Your Body
summary: A short psychological horror story about a girl, a murder, and a missing head.

name: My Succubus Kukula
summary: "My Succubus Kukula" is a cute pixel clicking game. Kukula, the succubus, suddenly barges into your house, and if you don't sign a contract with her, she'll kill you! ^o^, Save me!! Life and death are both in your hands, so be careful not to anger Kukula.

name: My Love With The GirlsGroup
summary: Under Seoul lights, as a substitute driver, you take an order from a mysterious girl. Facing you is the popular girl group, Little Angel. Smartly posing as their manager, you become an overnight music industry icon! Love's scent and career prospects beckon - how will you decide?

name: My House
summary: Build your house according to your desires in My House! Let your creativity express itself in a chill atmosphere!

name: Mythical Party
summary: Mythical Party Is a online multiplayer party game that is played with 3-6 players. Each round one adventurer will be chosen as the boss and will have the option of choosing between 3 Mtyixals. Mtyixals are unique bosses with unique abilities inspired by different mythologies around the world.

name: Myth of Empires: Musical Instruments Pack
summary: This musical instruments pack includes 10 traditional instruments, including the dizi, guqin, se, pan flute, pipa, sheng, suona, xun, konghou, and chime bells. Players can play these as they wish, or even upload custom MIDI tracks to play.

name: Mysterious Mystery, EP 1: The Duo Dilemma
summary: Mysterious Mystery is a fully voiced mystery visual novel centered around the detective duo, Justin and Dakota. Solve multiple cases using Dakota's evidence gathering abilities and Justin's expert interrogation. Discover outlandish cases, meet unique characters, and become world class detectives.

name: My Space Bar
summary: Manage your own space station bar! Customize your station, hire staff, improve your menu, decorate, and add attractions like arcades and dance clubs!

name: My Exit
summary: Everyone is on the train heading home. You are waiting for the train to arrive at a certain station. Will you make it home safely?

name: My Valentine is a Femboy
summary: A day before Valentine's Day a special someone just happens to fall into your lap.

name: Mystery Combat Man 3
summary: The Mystery Combat Squad returns for another action-packed adventure. Mystery Combat Man 3 is a mod about action, adventure, betrayal, and self-discovery. Fight alongside the Mystery Combat Squad to defeat the forces of evil that threaten the land. Just remember, the fate of the world rests on your shoulders.

name: My Little Cemetery
summary: Become the groundskeeper of a neglected graveyard. Find friends amongst the deceased, learn their stories, and give them a peaceful afterlife. Experience the juxtaposition of death in a cute and cozy atmosphere.

name: Mysterious Planet
summary: Mysterious Planet - A fascinating 3D puzzle game for logic and thinking! Your ship is forced to land on a mysterious planet due to lack of fuel. And now a mysterious and fascinating world filled with puzzles opens up before you!

name: MyPopgoes
summary:
Popgoes is an official Five Nights at Freddy's spinoff series, produced by Scott Cawthon and developed by fans as part of the "Fazbear Fanverse Initiative".

MyPopgoes is a short and simple resource management minigame, where you take care of an extremely needy weasel named Popgoes. Housed in an adorable plastic LCD toy, your new pixelated best friend will need pizza, fizzy drinks, and only the best entertainment provided by Freddy Fazbear himself. And if Popgoes doesn't receive what he desperately needs, he passes out. Or maybe he straight up dies. Up to your imagination.

name: My Time At Portia: Player Costume Package
summary: This content requires the base game My Time at Portia on Steam in order to play.In this pack you will receive 4 alternative outfits for both the male and female playing characters.

name: Mystical Tactics
summary: Mystical Tactics is a turn-based tactical-RPG roguelike in which you control a squad of adventurers in a mystical world. Train your heroes in fast-paced tactical battles, equip them with powerful items and lead them to repel the Dark Lord and his legions.

name: MyTavern
summary: Design and create your own tavern. Make the space comfortable for guest to stay and rest the night away.

name: Mycelium
summary: Mycelium is a mind-boggling turn-based RPG game with action elements, set inside an ancient infamous cave system with the same name. It tells a story about a diverse cast of characters exploring their inner selves and the cave.

name: Mystic Guardians Slide
summary: Enjoy the mystical guardians slide puzzle journey. Get ready for a unique experience

name: My Boyfriend is a Martian
summary: Meet Katy, your average small-town gal. After a grueling day at work, she's just trying to make it back home. Little does she know, the universe has some surprises in store for her during her long journey. Get ready for an adventure that's out of this world!

name: Mystic Labyrinth
summary: Mystic Labyrinth is a top-down 2D bullet-hell rogue-lite game. Choose from multiple starting classes and use swords, spears, axes and magic to conquer the many themed floors of the labyrinth.

name: My Neighbor Enide
summary:
Allie hasn't had the easiest life, but she makes the best of it. There's still plenty to appreciate, like living down by the beach, having a dad that loves you, and being across the street from the best neighbor on the block.

My Neighbor Enide is a short light horror-themed RPG game. This game is dialogue heavy, and plays out more like a visual novel with light RPG elements.

The game takes about 40 minutes to 1 hour to complete. There are two endings: One normal ending and one true ending.

name: My Favorite Notification
summary: A 5 minute Visual Novel made in Bitsy, about a Discord call between two trans friends.

name: Mystery Escape
summary: Dive into an adventure, alone, with your friends or play with random people. Solve various puzzles and overcome all the traps. There are currently 5 different rooms in which you can prove yourself. More and more rooms will be added in permanent updates. I hope to see you on the other side.

name: My High School Life Simulator
summary: My High School Life Simulator is a high school life simulator game, in which you will experience a brand new high school girls game which doing some tough tasks in a virtual school life simulator. After that schoolgirl goes to the kitchen to make breakfast for your virtual family in this high school girls game.

name: My Dream Setup: Bathroom DLC
summary: Do you want to create your dream Bathroom? With the Bathroom DLC it's now possible. You can create any bathroom you want. Any size, any color combination, any budget, shared or separate - it's all up to you.

name: My Dream Setup: Kitchen DLC
summary: Do you want to create your dream Kitchen? With the Kitchen DLC it's now possible. You can create any kitchen you want. Any size, any color combination, any budget, separate or combined with a living room - it's all up to you.

name: My Lewd OS
summary: My Lewd OS: You've just downloaded the FREE-TO-PLAY UwU-OS, the world's lewdest hacking operating system! To encourage the best hackers, UwU-OS realized that the best encouragement is consequences. As you become a hacking master & your skills grow, so too does your photo collection!

name: My Futa Girlfriend
summary: There are Futa-girls with a twist here! Let's get weird.

name: My Hot Neighbor Kayla
summary: Kayla here !Are you feeling stressed? Don't worry.I'm here to help you relax and brighten up your day with a classic puzzle game!

name: Myth of Empires: Dongzhou Map
summary: Dongzhou is a new map released alongside Myth of Empires V1.0. It features a day/night cycle and a wealth of unique landforms including volcanoes, islands, sandy shores, ice floes, blooming forests, and bamboo forests, giving players a whole new world to explore.

name: My High School Games Girl Life
summary: Let’s start your role as a high school girl and become a bright student of a high school girl simulator. Wake up early in the morning and get ready for my high school. High school girl games have a variety of missions that will give you the joy of a high school simulator. Make new friends in high school teams and become popular in anime school games. Enter the high school then go to the admin branch to get your student card in high school games. Attend math class and attend quizzes in new high school girl life games. Introduce yourself in front of your class fellow in a free virtual girl simulator.

name: Mysteries of the Manor
summary: In an old mansion rife with secrets, a pretend Taoist unwittingly encounters real ghosts. Unknown to him are their whereabouts, the victim, or his own fate. He must unravel the conspiracy through time loops.

name: Mythic Crusade
summary: Explore, gain resources, expand your town, recruit armies, fight infidels, find new spells, learn skills, and find powerful artifacts. Create your unique build and reclaim the Mythic Holy Land.

name: My Recycling Center: Container Truck Expansion
summary: Start the container skip or dump truck! Load the filled containers with the animated crane and drive them to the waste processing plant. Get through the animated gate to the weigh station and see how much is loaded. Then unload the trash in the designated areas.

name: My Peterinary
summary:
Time management in a veterinary clinic.

Hurry to heal all the pets! Cater to a variety of animals and discover them all. They need various treatments that will test your skill and speed.

name: Mystical Riddles: Ghostly Park Collector's Edition
summary: What is the price of eternal life? Stop the atrocious ritual! Don't let evil prevail! The soul hunter will spare no one. Can you master the willpower to win?

name: My Hamster Pet
summary: your virtual hamster friend

name: My Fair Cat: Snow
summary: Dive into a feel-good adventure of love, laughter, and cat companionship. For anyone who has ever smiled at the thought of making a cat's day!

name: My Little RPG Shop
summary: A 3D simulation maganement game

name: Mystery of Munroe Manor
summary: Two years after returning from an expedition in Africa, Lord Munroe is still being absent from public life. You are the famous sleuth Basil Byron and your task is to find the whereabouts of the missing adventurer.

name: My Young Boyfriend Part 1
summary: In this interactive Romance Otome Game, the one in control of the romantic story is you! You have multiple option as to how the story will go.

name: My Secret Ocean Boyfriend
summary: When your swim club is threatened with dissolution, it's up to you to find new members. Luckily, you manage to recruit three handsome men for your cause.

name: My Starry Princess
summary: Senior life at Mori Academy transforms in a flash when you trade places with a look-alike space princess. Can you handle a curriculum of magic and alchemy while living with three popular alien princes? Fake it till you make it, Princess!

name: My Elemental Prince
summary: It’s a lazy afternoon at your high school, so after class you take a nap at your desk and when you wake up, you feel strange because the dream you just had ended abruptly. A sudden wave knocks you over and when you get up again, you’re not where you used to be. That odd occurrence has transported you to another world, a land belonging to elemental spirits. Soon you’re confronted with a couple of spirits that are not too happy to see a human in their domain. Who will be the unlucky (or lucky) one to look after you?

name: My Elemental Prince: Remake
summary: A spirited adventure of destiny and love await you!

name: My Charming Butlers
summary: Your uneventful city life is taking its toll—until a chance encounter leaves you as the proprietress of Calico Manor. Within this historic building are centuries of untold secrets waiting to be discovered, along with a trio of butlers sworn to help you… Although it doesn't take long to realize the true mystery lies within your heart...

name: Mythical Hearts
summary: Life hits rock-bottom when you lose your job and apartment in one day! But after a series of events lead you to three handsome, mystical strangers, it almost seems like fate. You're shocked to discover these aren't ordinary guys -- they're a griffin, phoenix, and unicorn in disguise, and they need your help!

name: My Mystic Dragons
summary: A barista and aspiring writer, you lead a simple, quiet life with your kind grandfather as your only real family. The only unusual thing about you is the strange dragon-shaped birthmark you’ve always had on your back.

name: My Strange Plane is a Thing Body Moves Through
summary: Walk among weird objects in a weird place and hear them talk (maybe) about life

name: Mysteries of the Heart: The Psychic Detective Case Files
summary: This is a mystery/suspense ADV, so you must use your detective skills to solve puzzles and crimes. It employs a 'voices of the heart' system where you can tell what a character is thinking. You'll have to collect clues to solve the crimes, which quickly escalating from simple theft.

name: My Sweet Home Dungeon
summary:
Who Dares to Disturb the Peace of Dungeon?
The Great Battle to Protect the Dungeon Begins Now!

name: My Cat Town
summary: Are you a cat lover? Have you always wanted a cat as a pet? Then this game will beyour best companion. Come & explore the cat playhouse. Cuddle, pet & play with them all day long.

name: My Hospital Town
summary: Do you know the superhero that wears a white cape? Yes, you are right those are our doctors! Ever dreamt of saving someone's life? Then Tizi Town Hospital is the right place that gives you the joy of role-playing a doctor and saving your people's life.

name: My Tizi Town: Grandparents Home
summary: Fun pretend play app with exciting kids' games where they can bond with their grandparents and have loads of fun and family time.

name: My Pretend Summer Waterpark
summary: Do you love going to the Waterpark with Family and Friends? Then you will LOVE My Pretend Waterpark - Kids Summer Splash Pad with Friends and Family! Go swimming at this fun Water Theme Park with family and friends!

name: My Tizi Town: Daycare
summary: Do you like cute little babies? Do you think you can handle the adorable toddlers? Then this app is perfect to test your baby caring skills. Take care of kinder and preschool-aged kids in the Tizi Town - Daycare. Feed them, play with them, give them baths, and more, in this fun kids game!

name: My Pretend Halloween Town
summary: Do you love my pretend preschool, pretend hospital, and pretend airport? Do you love pretend games, and playing with characters in various scenes and cities?

name: My Pretend Family
summary: Come home and play with us in my Pretend Home & Family in a fun, imaginative Dollhouse filled with interactive rooms to explore!

name: My Pretend Fairytale Land
summary:
Explore over 8 Venues Total including the Castle Entry! Find the key, and enter the Castle to explore more rooms!

My Pretend Fairytale includes a Ballroom, Gardens, Kids Bedroom, the Royal Family Suite, Kitchen, Rooftop Garden with Fireworks, and Swimming Pool!

Check out all areas, and find the secret rooftop area and watch a huge display of fireworks!

name: My Hero Kitty
summary:
Have you ever dreamed of becoming a hero who defeats villains?
Villains have invaded the peaceful cat world.
Go on an adventure to protect the cat world with small, cute but powerful hero cats!

name: Mystic Duel: Heroes Realm
summary: Don't let the cards fool you, Mystic Duel isn't your typical card game! Discover a unique card control system and assemble the strongest deck of Heroes in the Mystic Arenas. Duel other players in short and intense PvP battles, where predicting your opponent is as important as your choice of heroes.

name: Mystery Combat Man 4: The End of Time
summary: The conclusion to the multi-award-winning Mystery Combat Man Franchise, MCM4 strives to be the best sequel to the worst mod ever made! The Mystery Combat Squad returns to an absurdist world of action and intrigue. Following the events of MCM3, a mysterious disruptor has broken into the time bank, setting off a catastrophic chain of events that threatens the timeline of the planet of the Earth. Who could have done this, and why? Whoever he his, he must be tracked down and brought to justice at any cost, and it's all down to the Mystery Combat Man to hunt him down across the space-time continuum. Will he succeed? It's all up to you, the player, in... Mystery Combat Man 4: The End of Time!

name: My Animal School Romance
summary: When scientists found a way to anthropomorphize animals, the world changed forever. Now dubbed “anthros,” these new creations live alongside humans—but a strict caste system keeps the two groups apart.

name: My Drama
summary: Every choice you make matters, and it can change the course of your romance! Dozens of interesting dramas are waiting for you!

name: My Police Girlfriend
summary: You thought it was just another day doing your daily rounds as a policeman until the Chief orders you to go undercover… as a woman! Luckily, you’ve got two gorgeous officers to help you out all along the way… But as you continue your investigation, you meet a beautiful model who needs your help! Do you have what it takes to complete this investigation?

name: My Pure Boyfriend
summary:
Several months have passed since I've started working the school and being called "The Tamer of Love."

I am still in training. The masochistic charming pure students love me for some reason.

name: My Royal Guardian
summary: A hole opens in the sky, followed by a massive earthquake that ruined the earth. The Egyptian gods appears in front of you, the heroine, and tells you that you must stop Anubis, the King of the Underworld, in order to save the world. Which god will you pick to assist you to defeat Anubis?

name: My Strange Girlfriend
summary: As a recent high school graduate, you decide to take a summer job to earn a little money before college begins.

name: My Ninja Romance
summary: Your ordinary life is suddenly changed completely. Wrapped up in the war between Kōga and Iga.

name: My Ambitious Girlfriend
summary: The lucky recipient of a scholarship to one of the most distinguished and high-class schools, you have the opportunity to study with celebrity students. But what they can’t know about is your poor family, and the struggles you’ve been through.

name: My Musical Romance
summary: You are going to revive the musical company that gave you the dreams of becoming an actress…but of course it's not going to be easy!

name: My Cat Girlfriend
summary: In a quiet Japanese town lies a magical place resplendent with nature, and hidden among the town's human residents are people you never could have imagined were real…

name: My Traditional Princes
summary: This story focuses on the celebrity school Saionji Academy, which is renowned as a famous Japanese traditional arts school.

name: My Arahitogami Romance
summary: They tell you that they will grant any one wish of yours. Now your long awaited desire to have a romantic relationship with your superior at work, Hikaru Abe, can come true!

name: My Angel Romance
summary: One day while you are walking through town, you happen to spot a curious power stone in the window of a random goods shop. You brought to a mysterious world on your way home after getting a hold of a power stone. Handsome angels appear in front of you in this strange world where your life is being targeted! They tell you that they want your help to defeat the traitor Arch Angel Lucifer!

name: My Strange Lover
summary: After moving, you, the heroine, is job searching. After a reality agency introduced a strange share house, you decided to stop by. There you meet the strange four residents.

name: My Curry BoyFriend
summary: "Lucky...I want a boyfriend!!" You, the heroine, go to school and help out at your parents' curry shop. Because of this, unfortunately, you have no time to go out with your friends and meet new people.

name: My Forbidden Lover
summary: A Mafia known also as Borujano controls a certain city. You are a member of Borujano and your life is being targeted by a rival Mafia organization. The leaders of Borujano believe this is because of information leaked by a spy. Thus, they order everyone to pair up with a partner to uncover the spy.

name: My Lovely Cat
summary: You weren’t sure about where you should work. That’s when you happen across a job ad for a cat café. You set foot inside the cat café to find hot guys with cat ears?! A slightly heartrending and slightly sweet love story with the kitty cats is about to begin

name: My Sweet Pianist
summary: You were always working hard wishing to become a professional pianist. One day, you were feeling blue from your practice not going well. That is when a truck hits you. When you woke up, you were in the 1700s. And then appeared the legendary composers: Beethoven, Schumann, Liszt and Chopin. When you were confused and startled, you hear about the assassination of Mozart. Can the protagonist and the 5 composers solve the assassination of Mozart? And can she go back to her era?

name: My Twin Romance
summary: You have been living a hard life all this while trying to find a job. One day, you were stopped by some delinquents on the road at night and was saved by a mysterious black-haired young man. With his offer, you attended a celebrities’ party.

name: My Forbidden Romance
summary:
The protagonist lives a life with her husband in which they only go through the motions of being husband and wife.
Her daily life is bland and unhappy.
One day, the protagonist has a one night stand with a man she meets at a nearby bar.

name: My Drama Club Romance
summary: You are the sole member of your school’s drama club and labeled as a weirdo by the rest of the school. However, you have a reason to continue to be a part of the club: you want to protect your childhood friend’s dreams and the place that she belongs.

name: My Kemono Girlfriend
summary: In this game, you will be sharing a home with two sisters from abroad, the cold and refined Allison and the fun-loving and wild Erin.

name: My Buddy Fisk
summary: A pet simulator with Fisk's mascot, Buddy.

name: Mythia
summary: A sci-fi mystery interactive fiction game. Figure out what your mysterious dream means; discover the truth of MYTHIA.

name: My Talking Girl
summary: My Talking Pretty Girl repeated every word you say. When girls are unhappy, play with girls. When the girl is hungry, give the girl feeding. When the girl is sleepy, let the girl sleep.

name: My Talking Pretty Girl
summary: My Talking Pretty Girl repeated every word you say, let her become your close friends! Enjoy the girl to bring you the laughter and happiness! Play addictively cute mini-games and collect coins to get cool items for my talking pretty girl. You can dress up your girl, change clothes for her and change her room.

name: My Little Life
summary: A desktop companion that lives on the bottom of your screen. Expand and decorate their home to keep them happy. Help them live their best life while you focus on yours.

name: My Horse Stories
summary: Get ready to make unforgettable memories and experience the beauty of the countryside like never before!

name: My Time at Portia: Housewarming Gift Set
My Adaptation In(to) Human
summary: It's a visual novel horror game that's published on Steam.

name: My Diamond Baby
summary:
It is a long-established “escape game” that has gained popularity due to its difficulty level and the perfection of its endings.

It has been played more than 6 million times in total.

The objective of the game is for players to find items, make full use of them, solve the riddle, and escape from a closed room.

The basic controls are click-only (keyboard is used to input some passwords), and the game is suitable for players of all ages and genders.

In addition to Japanese, the game is also available in Korean and English.

name: Mystery of the Sleeping Castle
summary: The Mystery of the Sleeping Castle is a narrative detective game in the style of Case of the Golden Idol and Return of the Obra Dinn, but pinker, more fairytale, and EVERYBODY LIVES! (well, mostly) Make your way through the castle, observe clues and make deductions to solve puzzles, identify the residents, and ultimately release the castle from slumber

name: My Universe Discovery Collection 2
summary: Discover the My Universe range of games with this 4 game bundle including : - My Universe - Puppies & Kittens - My Universe - Pet Clinic Cats & Dogs - My Universe - My Baby Dragon - My Universe - Green Adventure : Farmers Friends

name: My Hobby: Needlework Galore
summary: Everything you need to create beautiful needlework creations! Simply select a spool of colored thread, find the corresponding number, and watch your fantastic needlework come to life in glorious textured detail with no wasted time gathering supplies and threading needles!

name: Myth Matrix
summary: A Turn-based strategic card battle game. Collect cards, develop your unique deck and strategy, and have a fun PvP match with players all over the world!

name: MyRummy
summary: Long-lasting fun for the whole family

name: My Time at Sandrock: Monster Whisperer
summary: Embark on an exciting adventure in Sandrock! Utilize professional tools to discover and capture a diverse array of adorable monsters, forming special bonds with each one. Your pet adventure begins now!

name: Mysterious Voyage: Set sail
summary: Here, you can freely sail your ship, explore the endless ocean, and find hidden islands and treasures!

name: My Girlfriend is... Centaur
summary: Step into an extraordinary romance despite physiological disparities. Can you navigate a relationship with a centaur girl and overcome the challenges together?

name: My Young Boyfriend Part 2
summary:
Popular Otome romance simulation game My Young Boyfriend Part 2
In this interactive story choice game, the one in control of the romantic story is you!
You have multiple option as to how the story will go.
Become immersed in an enchanted game of your choice.

name: My Cute, Pure Boyfriend
summary:
In this interactive story choice game, the one in control of the romantic story is you!
You have multiple option as to how the story will go.
Become immersed in an enchanted game of your choice.

name: My Love 2
summary: You choose the plot here. No crystals and tickets! Choices are equally important as they don’t cost crystals.

name: My Cute, Pure Boyfriend 2
summary:
In this interactive romance otome game, you are the one in control of the romantic story!

You have several options on how the story will unfold.
Immerse yourself in an enchanted game of your choice.

name: Myles Wright: Ace Attorney
summary: 23 years after the events of Spirit of Justice, a new defense attorney steps up to the plate. Myles Wright, the son of Phoenix Wright, has finally achieved his dream of continuing his father's legacy. With his attorney badge proudly pinned on his lapel, he jumps on the first cases he can get. Unfortunately, his eagerness comes back to haunt him as he's thrown into a series of events that turn his world inside-out. With a serial killer hot on his trail, can Myles live up to his father's namesake? Or will he fall, just like Phoenix Wright did 8 years ago?

name: My Bath Tub Companion
summary: My Bath Tub Companion is a free experience, to induce a calm & peaceful (and mildly horny) feeling. You'll feel satisfied sitting back, feel yourself relax as you watch her relax. Relaxation is the key to a blissful bath tub experience. Calm music & a beautiful girl to look at.

name: Mythfall
summary: Mythfall is a free 2d browser "bullet hell" game developed by UnitOfTime.

name: Mystic Gals
summary: In this adventure you play as one of three heroines. Where you must Battle, Survive, and Collect Creatures to aid you in battles. All for a chance at taking arms against an evil sorceress known as "The Great Creator". Do you have what it takes bring her evil to an end?

name: Mythmatch
summary: A Greek mythology community sim about bringing people together by putting things together.

name: Mystopia
summary: Mystopia is a relaxing sandbox game about building your own worlds and crafting magical potions. Discover blocks inspired by witchcraft, use potions for mystifying effects and build your dream worlds! The only limit is your imagination!

name: Myror i Brallan
summary: Myror i Brallan [Ants in the Pants] is a Swedish children's game based on the children's TV programme of the same name. The game was published in 2001 by Young Genious.

name: My Girlfriends
summary: This is a simulated love game, players through dating to enhance intimacy with girls. To upgrade your relationship with a girl.

name: My Femboy Roommate
summary: In this choice-based visual novel, you move into a new house with a new roommate who you come to find is a... Femboy!? Now that you are living under the same roof, build your relationship with him to achieve different endings and branching paths, with unique scenes and outcomes.

name: My Time at Sandrock: Online
summary: This update brings cross-platform multiplayer to My Time at Sandrock.

name: My Alien Buddy for The Playroom
My Brick Breaker
summary: Mobile brick breaker arcade game. No ads. One-time in-app purchase.

name: My Monsters
summary:
My Monsters is a VR action-adventure game that stands out for its 100% hand-painted art, immersing players in a world of fantasy and surrealism. The game's deep narrative explores humanity's greatest inner monsters, such as anxiety, fear, and loneliness. The player is transported to the dream-like world of Onirium, where they meet Moti, a frightened little monster with no memory.

In My Monsters, you are not alone; team up with your inner monster, Moti, and face various enemies, solve complex puzzles, and overcome challenges side by side. This unique partnership mechanic allows players to deeply connect with Moti, using empathy and courage to overcome obstacles and discover fragments of a meaningful dreamlike tale. Each stage of the game reveals new aspects of this collaborative relationship, culminating in moments of self-discovery and profound understanding.

name: Myar Aranath: Rellict of Kallidar
summary: Armies of Ahroma attacked Myar and exploited the country. But after the victory in the first war, parts of the country were freed and affiliated to the newly established realm of Fallas. But many regions are still left in the hands of the enemy. Recently rumors were coming up, saying that the Black Citadel of Narathzul was rebuilt, even bigger and more powerful than ever before.

name: Myths are 100% True
summary: An absurd platformer where you play as Hlev; master of aggressive photography. In the long year of 20XY, a sudden boom of myths has given Hlev the opportunity to photograph all the myths he wants to make his web videos. Inspired by obscure stuff from the 2000's. Go find the secrets, bre.

name: My Buddy Did Something Weird And Now I Have Feelings For Him??!?!?
summary:
Can one little thing change the way you feel about someone?

Everything points to 'yes' when Vale and Lawrence's Quality Bro Time becomes a little too cozy…And gay panic ensues.

name: My Virtual Pet
summary: Adopt a cute and friendly virtual pet

name: Mystery Detective Adventure
summary: Mystical events haunt locals.

name: My Little Universe + God of Light Remastered Bundle
summary: Discover, Create, Illuminate

name: My Assassin Bodyguard
summary:
You grew up as a part of the Time Vessel Association. One day, your friend goes against the group and is killed, making you realize how insane the Association actually is. They never cared, and never will. You want out of it, so you decide to leave everything behind and run away.

Little do you know, they send a famous assassin after you. Can you make it out alive and maybe seduce the infamous Toji Fushiguro along the way?

name: My Ghost Pet is Zhong Kui
summary: A real-time turn based MMORPG with auto chess,Unlimited learning skills, free combination,Exquisite pixel style image

name: My Immortal Sect is Very Powerful
summary: "My Immortal Sect is Very Powerful" is a fairy-themed simulation management game focusing on equipment trading.

name: Mycelium
summary: Enter the post-extinction world of Mycelium. With humans extinct, take control of a new, sentient species of fungi-Spores. Grow your Spore community, grant them powerful abilities, and battle against evolved insects in this Action Roguelite, Pet-Simulator game!

name: My Dog!
summary: MY DOG! is a puzzle game where you have to collect puzzles in the form of pictures and memes with the antics and misadventures of a cute dog (My Dog!)

name: My Days With Mia
summary: Explore 'My Days With Mia,' a visual novel of romance and choice in a vibrant college setting. Connect deeply with Mia through an interactive story, full voice acting, and rich artwork. Experience the thrill and intimacy of college love.

name: My Poodle's Diary
summary: Step into the gentle world of "My Poodle's Diary," where the life of a black standard poodle named “Calm” unfolds through a series of short stories.

name: My Fantasy Hostess Club
summary: Manage a cabaret where you get paid to talk and eat with customers. How you talk and respond determines the fate of your club. Advertise on the newspaper, do fashion runways, or hang out with the cute hostesses and develop their social skills.

name: My Friend Toby
summary: How long will you survive before Toby catches you?

name: Mystery Science Theater 3000 Presents: Detective
summary: A rewrite of Matt Barringer's incredibly bad game "Detective", this game was ported to Inform and subjected to treatment with Mystery Science Theater 3000 sarcasm.

name: Myth & Mirage
summary: Hack and slash your way through the Tombs of Oasis. Extracting with your loot will require all the skill your team can muster as you mow down vicious monsters, face deadly traps and slaughter other players! Carefully craft your build and customize your character with unique items and skill trees.

name: My Maid Girls
summary: Neko girls are ready to serve! They are ready to wash your clothes, shine your shoes, clean your house, even give you a massage if you need it...(^ ∇ ^ *)

name: Mystic Valley
summary: 2D action adventure and puzzle game heavily inspired by the first Legend of Zelda game.

name: My New Memories: The Beginning
summary: My New Memories: The Beginning tells you the story of My New Memories before you reunited with Anna and started a family. Find out how the MC turned out to be the man you know from the main game - The loving and caring husband and the protective and wonderful father!

name: My Wet Leto Comic: A Day of Green
summary: An anecdote adventure game for the MWLC.Play as the heroine, Green, and have fun experiencing that day when you were a student while constantly making all sorts of trouble (?).

name: My Lovely Daughter: ReBorn
summary: Just like your homunculi, we’re breathing new life into My Lovely Daughter! Featuring brand new artwork and support for 4K resolution, this gothic fantasy is darker than ever!

name: My Dear Love
summary: Heartful and wholesome stat-raiser otome game with a cooking mini game! Help take care of Katsuya, the adorable little nephew of your crush!

name: Myst of Guatemala
summary: Experience this first-person horror game in a tiny Guatemalan home. As a journalist, you investigate a mysterious villa after your long-lost friend Eddie calls. Grim halls, monsters, and rusty mailbox blood await. The four chapters include spooky stories, jump scares, and difficult riddles.

name: My Hobby: Needlework Galore - Tiny Home
summary: Tiny and cozy Houses, Fantastic and beautiful now here, try to relax with calming Embroidery process DLC includes 20 artworks from Small to Large

name: My Hobby: Needlework Galore - Household
summary: A sweet home requires care. You will find the coziest embroidery patterns here with relaxing Embroidery process DLC includes 20 artworks from Small to Large

name: Mystery Boxes
summary: Mystery Boxes are strange, ancient artifacts that transform numbers according to their individual rules. Your goal is to figure out these rules and use them to trigger a specific transformation that will unlock the box.

name: My Hobby: Needlework Galore - Vintage
summary: Open Vintage world with relaxing Embroidery process DLC includes 20 artworks from Small to Large

name: Mystical Crash in Magical Middle Ages: Adventure of Valkyrie
summary:
A guy named Dimon, the main character of this game, inexplicably got into the magical Middle Ages and was forced to disguise himself as a valkyrie - a warrior girl Diana). What awaits him, will he be able to understand what happened, return home or stay in the magical world. Is he still he, or maybe she, or something else?

What adventures are waiting for the character? All or almost all actions and their consequences depend on the player.

name: My Lovely Series
summary: What would you do to save your loved ones? Befriend, nurture, and murder new companions and lovers alike to gain mastery over the most sinister magics and mend your broken heart!

name: Mystery Trackers: Darkwater Bay
summary:
Elephant Games presents the latest exhilarating installment of the Mystery Trackers series!

When a renowned scientist goes missing from the Poseidon research vessel, you're sent to investigate. You quickly uncover that there's much more to this expedition than simple research. A powerful and dangerous artifact awaits beneath the waves, and the Mystery Trackers aren't the only ones after it! Can you uncover the artifact's history and keep it from falling into the wrong hands? Find out in this thrilling hidden-object puzzle adventure game!

name: My First Date RPG: Oriana - Story Two
My Two First Loves
summary: My Two First Loves is the first and only book of the My Two First Loves series.

name: My First Date RPG: Elliot - Story Two
My First Date RPG: Oriana - Story Three
My First Date RPG: Elliot - Story Three
My Party Needs an Alchemist
summary: Gather herbs and brew powerful potions as you travel a magical world and forge a party of intriguing companions to defeat the demon lord in this cozy fantasy adventure game!

name: MySims: Cozy Bundle
summary: Two adorable adventures!

name: My Dancin' Computer
summary:
We are sitting at the computer and everything seems to be going smoothly, but then Virusnya appears! A character who does not have access to administrator rights wants to infect our computer. We can stop this by using my protective dome to protect our files from Virusny's attacks, then charging up Sultan, the Anti-Virus, to defeat that prankster!

This and more will be available in the new game "My Dancin' Computer". This is a rhythm-based game based on "Game & Wario: Pirates" with interesting characters, catchy music, custom OS, and much more.

name: My Time at Evershine
summary: Be the Governor of a brand-new settlement on the fringes of the Free Cities, facing the almighty Duvos Empire. Recruit settlers, build infrastructure, tame the wilds, and lead your people to become a new cornerstone for the Alliance in this adventure-packed simulation RPG!

name: Mysterious House
summary: a mysterious house waits you!

name: Mystic Explorer
summary: Mystic Explorer is a treasure rogue game. Players will play the role of treasure hunter in search of treasure chests in the siege of monsters, defeat the ever stronger enemies, and bring back your own archive treasures.

name: My Strongest Girlfriend
summary: "My Strongest Girlfriend" is a super-popular card competition game. Here, you will meet hundreds of beautiful girlfriends with unique personalities and characteristics. They will accompany you on this journey full of fantasy and surprises. adventure journey.

name: My College Picture with Them
summary: My College Picture with Them is a short galgame game produced by Tsukino Shosha, which showcases the relaxed college life through the stories of two female protagonists and resolves the conflict between the" playing house style "within the student union and the club.

name: My Special Summer Vacation 2
summary: Boku has been sent to live with his aunt over the course of his summer vacation. The small town where she lives may be out in the sticks, but it still has a number of interesting characters to meet and play with, and plenty of activities for a young man to enjoy!

name: Mysteries of Perception
summary:
Mysteries of Perception is a detective game where you will see the same scene through the eyes of different characters. Uncover their secrets by analyzing all the clues. Switch perspectives and learn everything about the artifacts of the Distant and the deaths in their wake. Glory to the Stars!

Mysteries of Perception is a 2D investigative game structured like a choral narrative where you can jump from one character's perspective to another during the investigation. To gather more clues and progress in your investigation, it will be necessary to collect information from all viewpoints and confront them to reach plausible conclusions. Confirm your theories by consulting the stars. Jump from a past to a future perspective and discover every facet of the mysterious deaths that will be presented to you.

Dive into this dystopian universe with desaturated colors and solve the mysteries that govern the world. Perhaps you will uncover the mystery of your own death...

name: My Happy Village in the Kingdom
summary: Welcome to your village in the kingdom, manage resources, complete tasks and events in real-time, get gold and materials from dungeons, win a new castle, steal items from magic characters, increase affinity and work on your popularity. And more in the Medieval Clicker. The magic dragon awaits you.

name: My Monster
summary: An adults-only visual novel about Samuel Hart, an anxious man finally making the big leap: moving in with his soon-to-be-not-so-long-distance-anymore boyfriend—the big and friendly Sullivan, a monster who wears his heart on his sleeve. With Samuel settling in, and Sullivan off work for a few days, the two make the most out of their first few days of cohabitation. Follow the couple as they hit up the town, go shopping, visit the city, relax under the stars, and more!

name: My Direct Damag 7 Trillion
summary: A strategic pixel-style dungeon-crawling game where you can purchase hundreds of different weapons and armors in the shop, mix and match freely to create the best battle strategy for you, enhance your output capability, defeat bosses, and strive towards the astonishing goal of 70 trillion output.

name: Mystic Mansion
summary: Unravel the mystery of the ruined mansion as you meet a cast of cute oddball characters and help them get their rooms back in shape!

name: My Arms Are Longer Now
summary: You are a yucky long-armed thief. Snake through levels, retract like a vacuum cord, or put on a sock to seduce a lonely guard - whatever it takes to pull off the perfect heist!

name: Mythical Love
summary:
Welcome to Mythic High, the highschool of mythical creatures where we can have great moments together with species and sex equality.
You can choose to be one of them and build your relationship to learn more about different kinds of love. So young and colourful. BUT sometimes, when something goes overboard, everything could collapse apart, including love. So choose wisely.

name: MyTeardrop
summary: Take care of your awesome little Teardrop. You could also just feed her lemons for her entire life! All that matters is that you're now Teardrop's best friend.

name: MysteryScrolls
summary: Are you ready to become a medieval cryptex scroll master?

name: Mystical Sovereign Z
summary: Mystical Sovereign Z is a sci-fi/fantasy hybrid strategy game. Experience real time battles and turn based strategy with various RPG elements and choices to be made along the way.

name: Mystina Online
summary: Mystina Online is a massively multiplayer online role-playing game (MMORPG) set in a unique fantasy world where four races—Humans, Beasts, Sylphs, and the Fallen—coexist. In this world, players engage in quests, battles, and treasure hunting, while also collecting heroes to aid them on their journey. One of the game's core features is its summoning system, allowing players to call upon heroes from different eras, using them as companions in battle.

name: My Little Pony: Adventures in Equestria - Deck-Building Game
summary: A recreation of the board game "My Little Pony: Adventures in Equestria - Deck-Building Game" made in Tabletop Simulator.

name: Mytho Duel
summary: It's an adaptation of the classic card game "Triple Triad" for an interactive in-menu experience. This game offers engaging and strategic gameplay, allowing players to challenge their own strategic planning skills.

name: My First Quantum Translocator
summary: Help Quantum Translocator Guy through multiple rooms of puzzles in this platformer, where you can manipulate physics to surpass any obstacle in your way.

name: My Last Friday
summary: My Last Friday is a first-person horror-adventure game with a disturbing atmosphere, clever puzzles, body horror, and tense combat. Explore a twisted world, confront terrifying enemies, and endure the nightmarish challenges ahead.

name: My Pirate Husbandos
summary:
Having nearly drowned at sea you find yourself an outsider among the handsome pirate crew who rescued you. They sail by day, do depraved things at night, and you can't keep your mind from thinking about them.

Set sail into the sexy and dangerous story of My Pirate Husbandos.

name: My Lego Network
summary: My LEGO Network (or MLN for short) was a Flash and ASP.NET-based social networking site built specifically for children by the LEGO Group. It integrates standard social networking with a gaming function, where players can advance through the Ranks and exchange virtual prizes. The game also allows interactions with other players and computer-controlled Networkers through pre-written mail messages and integrates with the showcasing systems of LEGO.com.

name: My Raising Diary
summary:
At a particular research establishment, a study has been taking place in order to create a synthetic life form that will have more superior abilities than a human. The study had finally yielded results, but...

The protagonist who is working there ends up being forced by the other researchers on the same team as her to raise the synthetic life form.

Since she was young, she has been called a genius, and has no memories of being treated like a child, so even though it's a study, the protagonist, who hasn't really known a parent's love, feels uneasy about raising a child...

name: My Little Sister Callie
summary: My Little Sister Callie is a visual novel about a brother helping his little sister to adapt to life outside of a refugee camp. How far will you go to bring her home?

name: Myrmica
summary: Myrmica is an investigation and puzzle adventure viewed from an isometric perspective. Explore a petrol station while chased by a time anomaly. Manipulate the routines of 5 unique characters to achieve your goal, create your situations trapped in a time loop, and uncover the truth of Complex B13B.

name: My Sudoku
summary: Beginners, casual players and experts will find an enjoyable challenge in My Sudoku. Solve puzzles at your own pace in a pleasant and relaxing atmosphere.
