name: Myth of Empires: Hellenic Civilization Pack
summary: As the first new civilization DLC for Myth of Empires, the Hellenic Civilization Pack contains 12 new armor sets, 15 special weapons, a full set of new building recipes, 1 warship, 6 musical instruments, and 5 building platforms, adding a whole new dimension to the game!

name: MythWalker
summary: Turn any dog walk or errand run into an adventure! MythWalker is a mobile geolocation fantasy RPG that explores Earth’s parallel world, Mytherra. An ethereal mystical being guides players through an overworld traversal system, using real locations to tell the stories of Earth’s myths and legends. Now, Mytherra faces an unknown threat that endangers both worlds. A powerful mysterious being, reaches out for help, recruiting you – the Mythwalker, to uncover the truth, explore the connection between the worlds, and lead Mytherra’s heroes in their defense. Will you answer the call and save both planets?

name: Mythic Merchants
summary: Craft magical gear in a bustling workshop! Upgrade your tools, automate processes, and hire goblin interns as you travel through time. Meet quirky heroes like Tony the chronomancer, Mino the strong minotaur, Rana the alchemist frog, and Vulf the tech-savvy wolf. Will you become a Mythic Merchant?

name: My Daughter In Family Ai
summary: As the one who has been entrusted with their young child by FengHuang, you are going to be the father/mother of the Daughter. With different method and attitude of parenting, you will lead her walk to many more possible endings.

name: MyVegas Slots
summary: Bring the Las Vegas casino experience to your phone with real slot machines, new features, and record-breaking jackpots! Play for fun, win big, and compete in the World Tournament of Slots (WTOS)—our most exciting global event yet, hosted in the Bahamas.

name: My Caligula
summary: My Caligula follows the Roman Emperor Caligula and his sisters as they navigate college life in the modern day. In this visual novel your choices will determine if you live or die as well as your love interest.

name: MyLittlePool
summary: It is a neglected swimming pool simulator that runs at the bottom of the screen and can be enjoyed comfortably.

name: My Time at Sandrock: Love Chronicles
summary: The "Love Chronicles" DLC brings a wealth of romantic content to "My Time at Sandrock." This exciting expansion allows you to delve into deeper romantic stories with four beloved characters: Logan, Fang, Nia and Mi-an. Immerse yourself in captivating new storylines and romantic chronicles, all brought to life with emotionally rich voice interactions. Discover these unique quests, making your romantic journey even more vibrant and colorful!

name: My First Gran Turismo
summary:
My First Gran Turismo is a free-to-play, beginner-friendly introduction to the world of racing, crafted to bring the excitement of Gran Turismo to new players. Whether you’re a parent introducing your family to racing or a longtime fan revisiting the series, My First GT captures the essence of those unforgettable first laps in a streamlined, approachable experience.

In My First Gran Turismo, players can unlock achievements by completing a variety of fun and engaging challenges that introduce essential racing techniques, such as cornering, braking, and acceleration. As you progress at each level, you will encounter increasingly intricate tracks and vehicles, each designed to build confidence and refine your driving skills, from basic to more advanced techniques, all in pursuit of mastering the craft of racing.

-Find your Line as you unlock various achievements and set record times across an array of challenges, including three Race Events, Time Trials and License Tests.

-Feel the exhilaration of driving 18 unique cars through a variety of scenarios that sharpen your racing craft on three iconic Gran Turismo circuits: Kyoto Driving Park, Deep Forest Raceway, and Trial Mountain Circuit.

name: MyRobot
summary:
Adventure Character Simulator with optional AI features featuring your own robot that you can build and explore with.

Developed by sgthale, StillKill, and algernonvanpeel

name: Mystical Maritime Adventure
summary: Here, you can freely sail your ship, explore the endless ocean, and find hidden islands and treasures!

name: Myths of the World: Love Beyond
summary: Your husband has been kidnapped by a vengeful witch. To save him, you'll need to uncover the secrets of a nearby town before she can destroy it. Can you find the true story of the witch's betrayal? How is the town's Master tied in to all of this? Find the clues to save your love before you become another victim of the witch's wrath!

name: My Plushy Shift
summary: In My Plushy Shift, your Task is to collect around the Office. Sounds simple enough, though things get difficult as you start hallucinating about toys and - walking Plushies. Collect around all Rooms while struggling through the Plushy Hallucinations.

name: Myself;Yourself: Sorezore no Finale
summary: The game features four new scenarios with Nanaka and Asami getting separate scenarios, and there are two duel scenarios with Syuri and Aoi in one, and Hinako and Yuzuki in the other. Several new characters are also introduced.

name: My Dark Eden
summary: Dark Eden is a short visual novel, where, after accepting a job to investigate the remote mountains, you will meet two peculiar semi-humans along with a big old secret.

name: My Life: Zoo Vet
summary: Take care of sick zoo animals!

name: My Lovely Cat: Remastered
summary: Get ready for a purrfectly sweet romance set in a cat café!

name: My Black Cat
summary: A mysterious black cat who can speak the language of humans. The lone girl he met one day. “I'm Aki Fujita. From now on I'm your master!” With his newly-bestowed name “Don-kichi”, from that day forth the pair began their life together. The master, strong-willed but with an easily wounded heart. The black cat, who strove to protect her from sorrow. The black cat, whose every thought was of his master. The black cat, who would always be at her side.

name: My Reading Tutor
summary: A fun & effective way to help children conquer early reading with exercises, activities & interactive books! Exercises, activities & interactive books to practice: Phonics, Fluency, Vocabulary & Comprehension. Based on award winning My Virtual Tutor Series University Developed & Tested in 50 schools with 2500 students 14 Complete Story Books to read Teaches 8 Phonics and Reading Concepts Parent Mode tracks child’s progress Individualized Instruction

name: My House
summary: 3D Action Shooter, Tower Defence Game. Kill monsters. Buy items for defence. Save Your House.

name: My Café Manager Simulator
summary: Unleash your inner entrepreneur! Balance renovation, product selection, customer service, and outdoor ambiance to build the ultimate café experience and keep your customers coming back for more.

name: Mystereet: Yasogami Kaoru no Chousen!
summary: An upcoming remastered version of Mystereet: Yasogami Kaoru no Chousen! made by MAGES. for Windows, Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4 and Xbox Series X/S.

name: My Hero One's Justice: Deku Shoot Style
MyPopgoes: New and Improved!
summary: myPopgoes has been reprogrammed from scratch, with countless fixes, optimisations, and brand new features! New and Improved! is out NOW as a free update to the game on Steam.

name: MyPawnShop
summary:
Have you always dreamed of running your own pawn shop? Now it's possible with MyPawnShop!

You can buy and sell hundreds of items of many different types. Musical instruments, weapons, art objects and much more!

Become rich by negotiating with your customers when buying and selling.

Clean and repair your items to earn even more money, with different tools at your disposal (found at different vendors in the game).

Manage your store as you wish with different storage units available as well as your storage reserve to temporarily store your items to be repaired or cleaned.

name: My Bed, Your Grave
summary: Lethia holds forever against her chest.

name: Mystic Rest Stop
summary: Welcome to your new summer job. Arthur Brooks, a 22 year old, starts a night job at Moon Gas Station. As he settles in, he experiences strange events that unsettle him. The urban legends about the gas station seem to come to life. Dealing with customers at night is deeply unsettling.

name: My Dad is a Hero
summary: 'My Dad is a Hero' is an action RPG adventure where players alternate between two protagonists. The game is structured into three acts, with its core focus on diverse and conceptually unique boss battles.

name: My Chemical Romance: Sweet Revenge!!!
summary: One of two flash games created for mychemicalromance.com to promote their second album, "Three Cheers for Sweet Revenge". The game follows a Saint tasked with resurrecting the Demolition Lovers (the protagonists of the first two MCR albums). The first three levels involve flying around collecting keys and avoiding ghosts bouncing around the screen. The Demo Man is then taken through the hospital catacombs where the Saint must fly through barriers and avoid fire. Upon exiting the catacombs, the Saint is tasked with collecting electricity for the defibrillator paddles to revive the Demo Man. Similar to the first three levels, the Saint flies around the room collecting bolts of electricity while avoiding viruses. Once resurrected, the Demo Man tells the Saint to go back to get his wife. The player repeats the actions of taken to save the Demo Man, this time with an increased amount of ghosts as well as the gunman from the introduction of the game. After venturing through the catacombs and avoiding the last batch of enemies to collect enough power to resurrect the Demo Woman, the Demolition Lovers finally have Revenge. This game is also still playable on Albino Blacksheep.

name: My Chemical Romance: Helena
summary: One of two flash games created for mychemicalromance.com to promote their second album, "Three Cheers for Sweet Revenge". Modeled after the single "Helena", the game consisted of four levels, the first three of which are top-down shooters. The goal of these levels is to defeat the enemies in red and activate the four pall bearers. Each level has the same layout with an increasing number of enemies and alternating color scheme. The fourth and final level of the game involves a hearse chase and shootout while avoiding obstacles on the road. While the game has been removed from the official website, it can still be played on Albino Blacksheep.

name: Mystic Kingdoms
summary:
Welcome to a world of
magical power. Seek
yours.

Become a seeker, a skilled adventurer who travels a mysterious and varied world seeking mystic energy called numina. Fly to wellsprings of this power. Dive in to join allies and face off against rivals in team-based arena battles to claim your share.

Mystic Kingdoms has something for you. It’s easy and fast to play, offering depth that’s satisfying to master. The world of Mystic Kingdoms also offers an array of unique settings that are home to equally exceptional characters and their tales.

name: My Slime Garden
summary: Raise, nurture, and breed adorable slimes in a relaxing adventure where each slime is unique! Mix traits to create new slime companions and explore endless islands filled with secrets and surprises. Your perfect slime squad is waiting—how far can they go?

name: My Cozy Room
summary: Design and decorate your dream space in this relaxing sandbox game! Choose from multiple room layouts, arrange over 500 furniture pieces and decorations, and craft the perfect cozy atmosphere that matches your style.

name: Mystery Box 4-in-1 Bundle
summary: Mind bending puzzle games bundle!

name: Mythic Battlegrounds: Demonic Siege
summary: A turn-based strategy game where your tactical decisions are key to surviving relentless waves of enemy attacks. While battles unfold automatically, your choices before the clash, such as resource management, unit training, and skill selection, are critical to securing victory.

name: My Hero Academia: Final Battle Challenge
summary: My Hero Academia has opened a 'Piloting Deku' online minigame to commemorate the Final Battle of the series and the release of Volume 37.

name: My Make Believe Treasure Isle
summary:
More make believe fun and learning is here from the publishers of My Make Believe Castle. Bursting with never-ending creative play, My Make Believe Treasure Isle uses the power of a child's imagination to propel learning adventures on a treasure island. Problem solving and logical reasoning skills are reinforced through a series of challenging activities.

"At last, software where the child programs the computer and not the reverse... a software toy that puts children's imagination in charge".

Dr. Seymour Papert MIT Media Lab Cambridge, MA

name: My Make Believe Castle
summary: An iconic environment and child-friendly, real time animation lets pre-readers, grades Pre-K to grade 2, bring to life a friendly dragon, princess, good and bad knights and horses as they play and learn in their own musical, castle play world. Children control the actions, mood and speech of a delightful cast of castle inhabitants. The near endless variations mean hours of ever-changing creative play. Each room of the castle features a fun, skill-building activity. Develops creativity, problem-solving, critical-thinking skills, sequential planning and memory.

name: My Virtual Friend
summary: My Virtual Friend is a desktop pet/idler game where a cute girl accompanies you whilst you navigate your computer. She's interested in what you're doing and will do her best to cheer you up! Play with her, unlock new backgrounds, and customize your outfits. Just don't make her mad...

name: My Sweet! Housemate
summary: My Sweet Housemate is an interactive visual novel style game that puts you into the shoes of a homeless adult struggling to find affordable housing in America. You're hit with a stroke of good - or maybe bad - luck when you finally find a totally not suspicious rental listing for a room in an apartment. The only catch is that your new landlord, Seung-min, seems to have something off about him.

name: Mythical Whalers
summary: Set sail in a fantasy roguelike, exploring ever-shifting seas. Face monstrous leviathans, trade with cunning factions, and shape a diverse, evolving crew of mythical races. Each decision leaves its mark — forge your legend or be lost to the depths!

name: My Joyful Aquarium
summary:
My Joyful Aquarium is a cozy game about creating your own fish aquarium and breeding fish.
Create your own aquarium and breed fish - from the most basic species to the very elaborate and demanding ones.

name: My Cat: Virtual Pet Simulator
summary: Meet your new virtual fluffy friend in simulation games. Just look into these honest cats eyes. They are melting your heart already, right? Now you can listen to its happy pleasant purr-purr engine all day long. Play with your little kitten, give it the most delicious yummies, take it for a walk and have fun every day. Our cat game is made for joy. Love your cat and it will love you back

name: My Dragon: Virtual Pet Game
summary: Meet your new virtual friend that looks and behaves like a real dragon. Just look at those majestic eyes and listen to its joyful roar. It will fill your heart with warmth and brighten your day. Play with your dragon, feed it yummy treats, take it on adventures, and enjoy endless fun. Show your dragon love, and it will return it tenfold. Take your dragon wherever you go; it's always by your side.

name: My Shark
summary: Ever wanted a shark as your best tamagotchi virtual pet? It is possible with My Shark pet games! Swim into a world of fun, adopt your very own fintastic friend, and raise a pet. Let the adventure begin.

name: My Real Desire
summary: Its a visual novel +18, hosted in itch.io and most popular, this game ia finish and the MC is cold and calculist but he Discover a love on your on harem and protect all girls , because he a mafia member but not care anymore, he loves new family and Discover dark secrets of your creation

name: Mystery of Gevaudan
summary: Based on French legends, the horror game Mystery of Gévaudan invites you to immerse yourself in a magical adventure. Armed with your phone's camera, solve puzzles and survive by avoiding (or killing) creepy monsters to uncover a dark mystery.

name: Mythic Mire
summary: A surreal RPG-adventure set in a world between dreams and nightmares. Explore strange environments with your trusty digital Pixie companions.

name: My Gambian Boyfriend
summary: A mature visual novel exploring the relationships between elderly English women and young Gambian men, blending humor and drama while examining desire and humanity.

name: My Dictator Stalin Can't Be This Cute?!
summary: You are Vladimir Lenin, a ditzy Russian revolutionary, politician and political theorist. You’ve had a crush on your childhood friend Stalin ever since you were a little kid. Your crush invites you over for popsicles at her place. It’s your chance. What will you do?

name: My Hero's One Justice 2: Itsuka Kendo Cheerleader Costume
My Chandroid Sweetheart
summary: Explore a cute futuristic metroidvania world and solve challenging puzzles with your robot girlfriend. Along the way, gather useful upgrades, encounter quirky characters, and restore power to the city!

name: Mystal Haven
summary: Mystal Haven is a laid-back, open-world creature-collecting game with 4-player split-screen and online multiplayer.

name: Myrmidon
summary: Invite a friend online and embark on a puzzle-platformer adventure exploring the bond between an animator and his puppet. Work together to clear obstacles across the sprawling sets of a stop-motion animation workshop and find out to what lengths the power of imagination can take you.

name: Myulk
summary: Myulk is a combined adventure and farming management game.

name: Mythic Realms
summary: Bring the adventure to your living room in Mythic Realms’ mixed-reality fantasy adventure. Test your skills and gather loot to build up your very own VR kingdom. Mythical creatures and epic boss fights await in this RPG roguelite.

name: Myst 30th Anniversary Collection
summary: To celebrate the 30th Anniversary of Myst, Cyan offered a historical anthology of the complete series up until its 30th anniversary. With this bundle, players get the original 7 Myst games together, in addition to the latest remake of Myst.

name: My Woods
summary: A girl enters nature to wonder about her problems, and meets with another girl. This girl is strage... Odd. Why is she here?

name: My Little Puppy
summary: "There is a saying that when you depart from this world, the dog who went ahead will warmly welcome you." While spending time in dog heaven, Bong-gu the Welsh Corgi suddenly catches his dad's scent. Now, he embarks on a journey to meet his dad. Will Bong-gu be able to see his dad again?

name: My Mario Game
summary: Surrealistic Mario game based on janky indie fangames from the 2000s.

name: My Life as a Teenage Robot: Techno Tennis
MySims Kingdom
summary: MySims Kingdom sets you on an adventure to help King Roland and his subjects revitalize the Kingdom. Throughout the quest, you will join up with friends, discover fascinating lands, take on challenges, and build amazing contraptions. Almost everything is customizable, allowing every creation within your world to have a signature look.

name: My Final Cursed Days
summary: My Final Cursed Days is a fantasy mix of dungeon-crawling RPG and time-management life-sim made for the Game Boy! Navigate a strange dungeon in the first-person. Fight monsters, find magic artifacts, make choices, chat with villagers! You only have so much time left after all.

name: My Final Cursed Days - Cursed Transformation Version
summary: This DLC version of My Final Cursed Days is the original version of the game, complete with all of its adult content, including transformation hijinks, additional character customization areas, and all other 18+ content not included in the general audience version of the game!

name: Myriad Death
summary:
High Difficulty Pixel Roguelike Action Raspberry Mash will feature Hololive English -Myth-'s Mori Calliope!!

"MYRIAD DEATH" is a fan-made action and shooting game in which hololive English -Myth- member "Mori Calliope" and her master "Death-sensei" reclaim the stolen underworld.

Defeat the enemies that stand in your way using various weapons that drop randomly from treasure chests in the dungeon!

name: My Furry Protogen 3
summary: The choice has been made, and now there is no turning back - they must find and stop him. The final chapter in the adventure of our heroes.

name: Mysteries Mix 2: Whispers of Hollow Town
Mystery of Myths: Heart of Athens - Collector's Edition
summary: Step into a world where ancient legends come alive and danger lurks in every shadow. Uncover the truth behind a deadly cult and save Athens from ancient horrors!

name: Mystical Riddles: Haunted Portraits - Collector's Edition
summary: Can you solve the riddle of the disappearing visitors before you lose yourself in the gallery’s macabre beauty?

name: Myth or Reality: Snowbound Secrets - Collector's Edition
summary: Unlock the secrets of Blue Roche! Are the legends of monsters real, or just figments of the local's imagination? It's time to find the truth!

name: Mysteries of the Forbidden Forest
summary: Mysteries of the Forbidden Forest is a pixel art game inspired by the greatest platformer classics of the '90s. Join our protagonist on a perilous journey with a single goal: to uncover the secrets hidden within the mysterious castle.

name: Mythical Ruins
summary: Discover a mysterious world without annoying quests in "Mythical Ruins". Fight a variety of enemies, explore different biomes and level up your skills in this epic Soulslike adventure. Venture into the hardcore area for the ultimate challenge!

name: My Dear Sheep
summary: Feed your dear sheep, and live a happy life.

name: My Journey
summary: This is a Interactive Live-Action Game. You will travel back in time to become a noble Highness and experience the local customs and practices of ancient times. A series of your choices will influence the development trajectory of this world.

name: My Wife
summary: Meet your new digital companion - an ultra-cute desktop mascot that brings life to your screen! Place her anywhere on your desktop and enjoy immersive interactions and heartwarming moments.

name: My Hidden Dreams
summary: Immerse yourself in a world of cute and eerie dreams! Find, deconstruct, and assemble the thoughts and desires of the characters. Go through all the stages of personal development by helping the sleepers find answers.

name: Myst
summary: An enhanced port of Myst for PlayStation Portable, including the Rime Age from realMyst and higher-resolution widescreen visuals.

name: My Sweet Angel
summary: A clicker game where the player earns Angel Points (AP) by either tapping the screen or through the generation of the protagonist's girlfriend's multiple transformations. Angel Points can also be earned when the game is closed through generation. Completing achievements unlocks bonus story events, and upgrades are purchaseable to make progression faster.

name: Myth: Twice Born Edition
summary: Myth: Twice Born Edition, this is a full on remaster of Myth: The Fallen Lords (through its ports to Myth II: Soublighter), Myth II: Soulblighter, and Myth II: Chimera. Some of the HD assets will also cover third party plugins, but they will not be as uniform as the rest.

name: My Xiuxian World
summary: This is an action role-playing game and you can customize your character, control with a mouse and keyboard, and defeat enemies. The story begins on Lingshi Island, defeat the enemy and then challenge the Black Sword sect all the way to ascend to immortality.

name: My Little Pony: Adventures in Ponyville
summary: Join Twilight Sparkle, Pinkie Pie, and Applejack in the Adventures in Ponyville game! Help your pony earn the cutie mark by winning Friendship Sparkles!

name: My Boss Is Scaring Me
summary: Oliver, coming from a small town to London, seeks to improve his life and help his mother, who had an accident months ago. At the new newspaper, he discovers his creative and investigative potential, diving into a complex story. There, he grows closer to his enigmatic boss. Is he trustworthy?

name: My Cheetah Friend
summary: Adult-Only Stat Raising Management Dating Sim where you take care of an furry alcoholic carnivore.

name: My Day Challenge
summary: A short, atmospheric horror experience about daily life.

name: My Dear Delirium
summary: Within this fully voice-acted Visual Novel, meet Elliot, and the vortex of conflicting truths he has become trapped in. Reach each ending to discover reality for yourself.

name: My Lewd Adventure
summary: Explore the cursed city of Cumtown, where lust and adventure collide. As Dylan, an adventurer, complete tasks, make choices, and unlock steamy 18+ scenes. Can you break the curse or embrace it? Two endings, fantasy, and desire await!

name: My Little MILF
summary: My Little MILF is an erotic game in the genre of "Arkanoid", in which you will have to break the cubes and gradually discover really beautiful and hot images.

name: Mystery Solitaire: The Black Raven 6
summary: The grim world of The Raven. 200 interesting levels. All this in the game "Mystery Solitaire. The Black Raven 6".

name: Mystical Mushrooms
summary: In Mystical Mushrooms you play as Cyne, a pink mushroom girl. You explore the hidden world Bhokniva which is infected with a mysterious disease. Its not deadly, but the people don't act normal anymore.

name: Mystic Tower Legends
summary: Mystic Tower Legends is an Eastern fantasy-themed, turn-based tower defense game created with the game editing tool 『CliCli』. Recruit legendary heroes from various mythologies, empower them, and strategize to defeat your foes!

name: Mythos Interactive Game Collection
summary: Mythos Interactive Game Collection is a diverse anthology of 9 indie games, each offering unique gameplay experiences across various genres. From thrilling action to mind-bending puzzles, this collection showcases the creative spirit of Mythos Interactive.

name: My Wife Sucked a Futanari's Toes
summary: Your wife needs to be dominated; she yearns for it. Yet, you simply can't fill the void; the necessity in her heart.

name: Mycopunk
summary: A ragtag squad of robot rejects is hired by the SAXON corporation and given one last shot at profitable glory (and avoiding the scrap heap). They are the New Atlas Hazard Crew, a ramshackle squad of exterminators sent to uncover the mysteries behind a planet-wide fungal catastrophe.

name: Mythscroll
summary: Mythscroll is a fantasy RPG where every choice, encounter, and stat check shapes your journey. Explore the world, equip powerful weapons, master spells, and survive dynamic text-driven adventures, with D&D-inspired character building, turn-based combat, and branching outcomes.

name: Mystic Pathways
summary: Embark on a magical journey with Mystic Pathways, a puzzle game that challenges your logic and creativity. Manipulate enchanted trails on a beautifully designed hexagonal board to guide mystical fairies in collecting magical crystals and activating sacred altars.

name: My Summer Drive
summary: Craft your ride and master the endless journey.

name: My Card Is Better Than Your Card!
summary: Become the coolest kid of the playground in this playful roguelike deckbuilder. Craft every card yourself with adorable stickers and wow your rivals in tug-of-war card battles full of wonder!

name: Mysterious Pet Monpay Chicory
summary: A pet-raising simulation that raises mysterious pet!

name: Mycopsychosis
summary: Mycopsychosis is a horror ARG heavily inspired by Alex Kirster's popular youtube analog horror series called "Mandela catalogue".

name: Mystery House
summary: Mystery House is a chilling 3D horror-adventure. Explore a decaying mansion, solve cryptic puzzles, and uncover a deadly secret. Switch between first- and third-person as you navigate a haunting world where every choice could be your last.

name: My Heaven's Dale
summary: A cozy ranch simulator game where you can travel to the moon.

name: Mycelium: The Silent Contract
summary: You arrive. You gather. You extract. Join an endless cycle of hunting for Mycelium in a haunted procedurally generated forest. Work alone or with up to 4 contractors, solve the mysteries, and avoid dangers. And most importantly - don't get lost!

name: Mystery Box VR: Hidden Secrets
summary: A VR escape room game where you have to solve intriguing riddles to open boxes and discover nice stories about popular inventions!

name: Mystic Cleaver
summary: Wield a long cleaver in a deadly world filled with zombie hordes. Master perfect timing and combo attacks to survive. The game features a unique faded art style, blending cold weapon combat and intense action. Each slash is polished for a smooth and impactful gaming experience.

name: Mythos: Book One
summary: An "adult" murder mystery urban fantasy comedy visual novel! Lisa Harrison (your ex-girlfriend) is dead, and you have a feeling there's more to it than meets the eye. As you search for answers surrounding Lisa's death, you discover a hidden magical world lurks within modern-day Baltimore.

name: Mystical Riddles: Ship From Beyond DLC
summary: The fog is gathering over the coastal town and you need to do everything you can to dispel it. Do you have the courage to outwit a desperate villain?

name: My Step Sisters
summary: My step sisters - erotic visual novel, which accommodates all the secret dreams of every guy. In the game you can improve your communication, flirting skills and get to know female nature better.

name: My Own Murder
summary: After yet another night of brooding over his wife's murder, Detective Edgar receives a mysterious letter. A music star asks to investigate her own murder. Interrogate the suspects, search for clues and find out what happened. Will you be able to unravel the truth from the lies?

name: My Sleeper
summary: Build your car from scratch and customize it with a wide range of performance parts. Participate in thrilling races, work to earn money, and face survival challenges. Repair, assemble, and upgrade your parts to excel on the track and thrive in the game.

name: MySims Party
summary: Up to 4 players can test their wits, quickness and skill in 40 mini-games, each hosted by a different MySim. Each of your friends and you can select a custom team of 4 characters to play the huge variety MySims Party has to offer. Outwit friends by selecting the right team who will carry the day in contests based on strength, endurance, speed and luck. Pick carefully though, the wrong team will give your friends the edge over you. Bragging rights only belong to those who choose wisely and play flawlessly. Real People. Real fun. With the MySims.

name: My Lord Is Hiring
summary: A job interview simulator set in a medieval fantasy world. Hire, reject, and fire townspeople while maintaining your economy. Train and gear up your units to defend your kingdom from invading monsters. Complete quests, craft tools, and try not to get too attached—this world is dangerous!

name: Mystic Stickerbook
summary:
Say goodbye to a stressful life
Come to the forest and become a cheerful little witch! Caution! Touching a guest’s belly without permission is strictly forbidden! To get close to your guests,you must first craft magical stickers they love and build a bond of trust and friendship!

name: Myths of the World: Under the Surface - Collector's Edition
Mythbreak
summary: Mythbreak is a free-to-play PvP arena brawler featuring fast-paced asymmetrical gameplay. Dive into the action as one of three heroes working together to take down a fearsome boss - or unleash havoc by becoming the boss itself.

name: My Esports Club
summary: Build and Manage Your Professional Esports Team – Rise to Glory! Start from scratch and lead your team to the top! Recruit players, devise strategies, and face challenges like financial crises and player departures. Will you achieve championship glory, or find true love?

name: My Mom's Bestfriend!
summary: "My Mom's Bestfriend!" is a visual novel that follows the story of a young college student returning to his hometown after finishing the semester. The protagonist is excited to reunite with his mother and catch up on all the missed moments. However, a surprising twist awaits as the protagonist's childhood crush, Hanna, who is also his mother's best friend, makes an unexpected visit.​

name: My Mates
summary: It's a mix of a visual novel, RPG, and mini-games. You'll dive into student life, with all its challenges and new acquaintances. Your choices will determine not only your academic success but also the relationships you build.

name: Mystic Tesserae
summary: 2.5D Falling sand game. Collect Rare Items and discover new Elements. Use Elements to make Powerful Spells. Build and Destroy at your will.

name: My Friend was Dehydrated
summary: Find your way through a rave while your friend is rapidly losing moisture. You got twenty seconds left and a face to remember.

name: Myst
summary:
Few are chosen. Fewer succeed.

You stumble upon a battered old book and find yourself transported to the island of Myst. As you explore the surreal landscape, you quickly learn that something has gone wrong. Terribly wrong.

An ancient betrayal must be unveiled. Secret books concealed on the island of Myst lead the way to incredible worlds born of a master storyteller’s imagination. Yet one by one, they’re being destroyed through the treachery of his sons. But which one?

Only your wits and imagination will serve to untangle the web of lies and deceit that shrouds the worlds of Myst.

This version of Myst features the original point-and-click gameplay style and is as close to the original 1993 version of Myst as you can get.

name: My Time With Dee Dee volume 0
summary: My Time With Dee Dee is a series of short visual novels staring the mascot of DigitallyDownloaded.net, Danica, or Dee Dee. This is a very short introduction, to give you a first look at Dee Dee, and how she came to meet you, the protagonist.

name: My Desktop Sister
summary: My Desktop Sister is a computer desktop companion. Experience the love and kindness from My Desktop Sister.

name: Mythic Isle
summary: "Create your mini fantasy island in the corner of your Windows desktop! Tired from work or study? Just click casually and watch adorable pets farm, mine, and build automatically for you~ From a deserted isle to a thriving paradise - all thanks to these little creatures with superpowers!"

name: My Money Grows On Trees
summary: Click. Water. Grow. Harvest. Explore. Upgrade. Profit. An incremental clicker farming game about growing your own farm full of money trees! Ever wondered what it'd be like if money grew on trees?

name: My Lil Afterlife
summary: Become the new ruler of the afterlife. Summon spooky friends to reside in your unearthly realm and decorate it however you like with items you can craft, buy and find. Unravel the mysteries of the afterlife by taking on the reapers tower using spine-tingling spells to smite your enemies.

name: My Wife is a Spy?!
summary: In this otome isekai visual novel you're thrown into an arranged marriage with the cold Duke of the North. Explore political tension, shifting loyalties, and two routes: romance or rebellion. Support your husband or betray him like a true villainess and take control of your fate.

name: Mysteries of FangClaw
summary: An immersive horror-adventure game. Betrayed by a trusted friend, Baxter finds himself trapped in an abandoned gold mine. Set traps, gather creature samples, and make life-or-death decisions to survive. Can you face the horrors lurking in the darkness of the night?

name: My Last 20
summary: Your goal on this mission is to survive for 20 seconds on the space anomaly zone avoiding asteroids, cows [MOOOOW] and all kind of stuff and extract as many Space Tokens as possible and adquire unique and crazy astronauts (spoiler, there is a wiener).

name: Mystic Merchant
summary: Quirky store management game where you run a shop for adventurers. Start small and turn your humble store into a bustling marketplace. Adapt to a dynamic economy, setting prices, hire staff, acquire market permits and expand your shop.

name: MythicZon
summary: "MythicZon: a captivating 3D game merging survival, zombie combat & resource management. Navigate a world overrun by zombies, survive their onslaughts, upgrade weapons & fortify your base. Ready to face the horror? "

name: My Little Cafe Nightmare
summary: Brew otherworldly coffee for ghostly patrons in a dark, cozy first-person café. Upgrade your shop, manage supplies, and turn a haunted café into a sanctuary amidst nightmares.

name: My Camp of Memories
summary: A visual novel in the romance and adventure genre. Awaken in the Honeycombs, a camp where memory is erased and secrets hum in the night. Forge bonds, defy the Union, and uncover your past. Will you be a pawn or ignite freedom as war looms?

name: My Shelter
summary: This is a placement game located at the bottom of the screen that won't interfere with your daily study and work. Research technologies, grow crops, automate tasks, explore maps, utilize various machines to craft items, and defend against monsters. With just you and a dog, conquer the apocalypse!

name: My Tiny Room
summary: A zen puzzle game about placing furniture in a small, cozy space. Keep it clutter-free and create a peaceful retreat.

name: Mystery of the Malign
summary: Investigate. Interrogate. Descend into a world of intrigue to untangle the Mystery of the Malign.

name: Mystic Jumper
summary: A clumsy wizard miscasts a spell, turning himself into random objects! Now stuck at the bottom of his own tower, he must triple-jump his way to the top to fix his mistake. Master precise platforming, avoid traps, and use unique object physics in this retro pixel-art adventure!

name: My Sleeping Girlfriend
summary: Your girlfriend’s sleepwalking is getting worse each night. Find her and bring her back to bed safely.

name: My Silly Science Summer in the Past
summary: A visual novel for girls: Experience a fun time travel adventure and make friends with some quirky girls at a science camp. Will you solve the mysteries and find your way back to your time? Your choices make your own story! Full with challenging puzzle games, and unique endings.

name: My Life with You
summary: My Life with You is a gentle, text-light narrative experience in which you follow the daily journey of a young single mother navigating life’s challenges—caring for her child, searching for work, and managing household responsibilities while living with her grandmother. The game focuses on the emotional bond between mother and child, balancing struggles and growth at a self-paced rhythm, free from timers or pressure.

name: My Fair Damnation
summary: You are a nurse trapped in a decaying hospital, surrounded by grotesque patients you must care for… for your own sake. Step into this psychological horror, uncover the reason for your punishment, and survive the darkness born from within yourself. But above all… stay away from him.

name: Mystic Brews
summary: Welcome to Mystic Brews, a small clicking game about growing your skills as a potion brewer. Here you will be able to gather herbs, refine it and brew your potions. Unlock new upgrades to your skills and brew even more potions!

name: My Favorite Coworker
summary: A virtual pet device in the corner of your screen! Feed and play with your pet while you work or play for dopamine boosts that makes even mundane tasks a little more fun!

name: My Friend Pedro x Shotgun Cop Man Bundle
My Tiny Landscape
summary: My Tiny Landscape is a minimalist colorful landscape builder. Bring procedural archipelagos back to life by placing biomes and regrowing a vibrant landscape tile by tile. Strategize to leverage placement rules and maximize your score, or simply enjoy a relaxing peaceful experience.

name: Mythic Manor
summary: Mythic Manor is a free interactive visual novel game that offers stimulating new experiences set in an explorable modern fantasy world. Delve deep into your fantasies and experience the day-to-day life of sharing a manor with six gorgeous “mythic girls”.

name: My Dear Can't Speak
summary: The player takes on the role of Kikkawa Kaede, who, after years of effort, achieves their lifelong dream—only to be overwhelmed by emptiness and numbness. One day, drowning in alcohol, they find a mysterious girl at the train station...

name: Mycocosm
summary: MYCOCOSM is a casual arcade shooter and resource manager where you take the role of a newly sprouted seedling. Fight off waves of soil-borne enemies using antimicrobial chemicals, and trade for precious nutrients with wandering fungal spores - but beware their deceitful dealings.

name: My Cozy Room All in one
My Lovely Family Deluxe Bundle
summary:
Description
Experience the darker side of love in the My Lovely Family Deluxe Bundle, brought to you by the dark minds at Game Changer Studio and proudly published by the sinister enclave of Neon Doctrine.

name: My Ranch
summary: This is an open-world farm game that includes planting, raising, building, survival, fishing, and other gameplay elements. In this game, you need to manage your resources wisely to expand your farm.

name: My Pet Fan
summary: An Inanimate Insanity fan-made virtual pet and simulation game where you take care of the character 'Fan' from the series.

name: My Husband is a Stranger
summary: A psychological/drama/romance visual novel about a sweet marriage that slowly rots into a nightmare. Over the course of seven days, try to navigate a rocky relationship with your husband and unravel the mysteries surrounding this man... who might not be the man you married.

name: My Little Foundation: Containment is Magic
summary: A mod for SCP Containment Breach that replaces SCP and setting with a darker version of My Little Pony : Friendship is Magic

name: My Hero Academia: All's Justice
summary: SMASH through My Hero Academia’s final story arc and triumph over your foes in spectacular 3v3 battles! Follow the trials of Deku and other characters in the Final War between Heroes and Villains!

name: My Little Work: Garage
summary: Clients are waiting to get their cars fixed! They need new tires, fuel, an oil change, a thorough wash, an awesome paint job, a new front or maybe just a cool accessory? Help them out and earn money to buy new parts for your own dream racing car and race together with up to 4 players on the device.

name: Mystery Hotel: Hidden Objects
summary: Solve the riddle of the mysterious murder at the Hotel Noir

name: Myst House
summary: After your car breaks down near your late grandfather’s abandoned house, you step inside in search of help. But your search quickly descends into a nightmare — the house is no longer empty, and a violent madman is on the loose.

name: My Wife Threw Out My Card Collection (So I Bought a Dump to Find Them All)
summary: One trash run — and it was all gone. Now it’s just you, a cart, and a thousand tons of garbage. But you’ll keep digging through every pile, searching for rare cards and nostalgic treasure. In this cozy trash-cleaning simulator.

name: My tubi
summary: My Tubi is the only virtual pet simulator where you can take care and evolve real youtubers like elrubiusOMG, Fernanfloo, byViruZz and Paula Gonu.

name: My Farm Is Running!
summary: Experience farm life like never before – where the crops are the ones doing the harvesting... of their freedom! Chase down your escaping produce in a madcap, silly dash to save your livelihood.

name: Mythswayer
summary: Embark on an epic fantasy adventure in Mythswayer, a turn-based rogue-lite where every run is a new challenge through magical tomes filled with danger, secrets, and powerful discoveries.

name: My Splitting Image
summary: A psychological horror where you play a man who can no longer even recognize his own reflection, tormented and at the same time welcomed by a mysterious figure with a book embedded in his face.

name: My Pet Femboy
summary: My Pet Femboy is a simple pet simulator UwU

name: Mystic Fishing: A Fantasy Fishing RPG
summary: Travel through over 10 different biomes, catching over 90 different kinds of fish. Collect different rods, level up, and try to fill your Fish Encyclopedia. Experience a story-rich narrative filled with a fun and unique cast while exploring a Lovecraftian-ridden sea.

name: Mycubium
summary: Mycubium is a first-person 3D puzzle platformer where you grow bridges using mushrooms in a minimalist cubic world. Explore and solve spatial puzzles across shifting landscapes filled with secrets, platforming challenges, and evolving mechanics. Build your path as the day fades to night.

name: Mystic Pathways: Crystal Quest
summary: Get ready to walk magical... and very confusing paths!

name: Mystery of Myths: Mystery of the Fjords - Collector's Edition
summary: Uncover Norse secrets and mystical realms in this hidden object game. The collector's edition features an exclusive bonus chapter to uncover even deeper secrets, concept art, and more.

name: My Vet Clinic: Pet Doctor Days
summary: Welcome to an anime world of care and fluffy patients!

name: My Femboy Roommate: Special Weekend
summary: You take your roommate turned boyfriend, Robin, to a fancy resort for your one year anniversary. Explore and enjoy everything the high-end resort has to offer while bonding and getting closer to Robin. Will you make the most of this special weekend?

name: Mystery Tales: Dealer's Choices - Collector's Edition
My Pet Flesh Monster
summary: The cosmic horrors are at your doorstep! Will you adopt an adorable little creature for yourself? Pick the cutest monster out of 4 horrifying creatures, take care for your Pet Flesh Monster, feed them, take them to competitions and teach them new tricks! Watch out, don't neglect your cosmic pet...

name: My Recycling Center: Resources Trading Expansion
summary: Convert trash into valuable resources by using the new recycling machines. Store away the finished pallets with the forklift and sell them at the commodities exchange when prices are up.

name: My Recycling Center: Car Scrapyard Expansion
summary: Join the scrapping business and part-out the cars environmentally friendly. Use the hydraulic hoist to lift the car. Take out the battery, catalytic converter, rims and tires. Then use the material handler excavator and throw the body into the crusher.

name: My Rusty Submarine: New Waters
summary: Grab a friend for a deep sea dive. Repair your submarine and try to get as far as possible with this old and rusty, but charming submarine!

name: Myth of Slayer
summary: One day, mysterious portals appeared in every corner of the world, and many strange monsters that should not exist in reality came out of those portals, killing every living thing in their way. Some people were awakened to become slayers, and they fought to drive those monsters away successfully. But that was not the end, but the beginning of everything. You will play as an MC in a world three years after the invasion. What will happen to your story and your fate? Only you can decide.

name: My_Dear
summary: During the five-night levels in the game, you need to closely monitor the surveillance cameras, operate the gates and all available tools to fend off the attacks of the monsters, and gradually experience the entire storyline through the various plot developments and gameplay in each level

name: My Bookshop Dreams
summary: A cozy bookshop management sim where you run, customize, and expand your dream bookstore. Restock shelves, host author events, play mini-games, and collect literary works as you grow your reputation across cities—and maybe even planets.

name: Mystery Case Files: The Riddle of Mrs. Bishop - Collector's Edition
summary:
This is a special Collector's Edition release full of exclusive extras you won’t find in the standard version.

The Collector’s Edition includes:
- Team up with Angelica to seek the powerful artifact of an ancient civilization, but keep your eye on her ulterior motives!
- Replay mini-games and HOPs, earn Achievements, collect all the robotic Watchers, and find secret puzzle pieces for a bonus downloadable Jigsaw!
- Enjoy exclusive puzzles, screensavers, wallpapers, soundtrack, and concept art!
- Robots can be useful, but they can't help you navigate like the Strategy Guide can!

name: Mystery Case Files: The Riddle of Mrs. Bishop
summary: GrandMA Studios presents the first case in a new era for the Master Detective with Mystery Case Files: The Riddle of Mrs. Bishop!

name: Mystery of the Sky Temple
summary:
Xania, a mysterious woman, washes up on the beach with her memory blank. She meets Sky Ninja, who also has memory issues, but he recognizes her. The two embark on a journey to recover their memories, while also avoiding people who are trying to kill Xania for betrayal!

Enjoy an array of serious and silly characters and quests. Discover streamer and game developer cameos! Discover the deep lore of the world, as well as the punny humor. Dozens of unique healing items, character abilities, and more!

name: Mycopsychosys: Remastered
summary: Emergency Alert! New security protocols have been activated. Remain indoors. Do not open your doors under any circumstance. Isolation is safety. Isolation is truth. Or is it?

name: My Fishing Desktop
summary: Unwind with this cozy idle fishing game. Cast your line, collect unique fish, and customize your character with fun hats. Add relaxing ambient sounds like rain or jungle vibes to set the mood. Perfect for relaxing in the background while you work or chill.

name: Mycroft Holmes Simulator
summary: Become Sherlock Holmes' more intelligent, more languorous older brother in this short point and click experience from the world of 'The Beekeeper's Picnic'.

name: My Dear Emma
summary: Build, repair, plant, and secure your daily income while exploring beautiful landscapes and local wildlife. Become part of Emma´s story, a young biologist & nature photographer who has decided to start a new life far from the big city. A narrative life-simulation adventure to relax, feel and enjoy.

name: My Pet Store
summary: Build a cozy pet store and turn it into a favorite spot for pets and their owners! Manage your shop, discover new animals and products, grow at your own pace, and enjoy the process of care and progress!

name: Mysteries of Old Tokyo
summary: Step into the Imperial Capital, where knowledge is your weapon. Research and explore 40+ real-life Tokyo locations, past and present. Encounter a cast of wandering spirits, interrogate their stories, and separate the truth from their lies.

name: Mystiques: Haunted Antiques
summary: Mystiques is an adventure mystery game about the four worst women you've ever met running a failing antique store. Also, it is haunted.

name: Mystical Riddles: Ghostly Park DLC
summary: What is the price of eternal life? Stop the atrocious ritual! Possessed spirits never sleep. Will you be able to stop them?

name: My Tiny Island
summary: Survival, simplified.

name: My Town: Home
summary: The only limit in My Town is your imagination. Play any life story in the family house in town in this the amazing doll house game!

name: Myopia
summary: myopia is a ruthless platformer with explosive movement and a striking, vhs-infused, 1-bit visual style. embark on a journey into a world long abandoned and venture through increasingly hostile environments.

name: Mythical Mayhem
summary: Mythical Mayhem is a fantasy strategy deck building game. Put your deck building skills to the test across a single player campaign plus additional scenarios and custom games.

name: Mythical Mayhem: Twisting Sands Expansion
summary: Brave the desert sands in this content expansion for the fantasy deckbuilding game Mythical Mayhem.

name: Mythical Mayhem: Judgment Night Expansion
summary: A small content expansion for the fantasy deckbuilding game Mythical Mayhem.

name: Myosotis
summary: You've died at the hands of your (now ex) boyfriend, Ethan. Filled with a mix of sorrow, confusion, and rage, you decide to spend your afterlife haunting him in the hope of getting an answer from your murderer. However, you're only given more questions as you realize you're not the only ghost following him around...

name: Mythic Factor: Leaving the Labyrinth
summary: Golf your way out of a monster-infested magical dungeon! Use enchanted powers to launch glowing crystals into portals while dodging traps, monsters, and each other. Up to 7 players can join the chaos—expect wild shots, accidental sabotage, and a lot of yelling.

name: Myth Finders
summary: Discover MythFinders: magical worlds, hidden secrets, artifacts, challenges and mysteries await true adventurers!

name: My Everyday Life at Insect Academy
Mycelium Mayhem
summary: You are a tiny mushroom fighting isopods on a stump. Player and enemies are tied to a looped ability system that perform actions automatically in a cycle. Each wave increases in difficulty, try to survive as long as you can.

name: Mythic Trials 2
summary: Mythic Trials 2 is a Hack'n'Slash Rogue-Lite where each player has different skills. PvP Battle Royale, PvE Cooperation modes, Diablo-style loot, pet breeding, world bosses, rankings, drafts, and much more.

name: Myth of Lumi
summary: Myth of Lumi is a 3D physics-based turf war game where you duel rival magicians in card throwing showdowns. Recruit Lumis, mystical creatures bound within your playing cards, to aid you in battle and carve your path to fame and fortune.

name: My Teacher
summary: This is a casual puzzle game, where the position of each game image is random and can be repeated.At first, it may be very chaotic,Then gradually place the image in the corresponding position,The image gradually becomes complete,Come and give it a try!

name: My Infamous Dungeon
summary:
It's time to be evil. Build and master your dungeon, hire despicable monsters, and rise to conquer the overworld. Gaze from below as your dark tendrils creep across the land, snatching treasures from the forces of good and funding an ever growing empire. But beware! Saint Million the Hero King and his table of royal knights are always watching. Leave your dungeon weak, and a single cleave from the hero's sword will end your reign.

My Infamous Dungeon is a roguelite dungeon builder. Take time to carefully plan your dungeon, then protect it against waves of greedy heroes.

name: Mystery Trackers: Reflections of the Past - Collector's Edition
Mysplaced
summary: Mysplaced is an enchanting action-adventure game where exploration, puzzles, and combat come together in a beautifully crafted 3D world. Dive into a realm filled with secrets, challenges, and a compelling story waiting to be uncovered.

name: My Cozy Room: Mexican and Asian
My Happy Girls
summary: In this game you will plunge into the memories of beautiful girls and see some moments of there life. Collect the puzzle and open their memories. Good luck!

name: My Cute Roommate
summary: Your high school years are over, and now it’s time to think about the future. You need to pick a good college, find yourself a girlfriend, and start thinking about a job. That’s when your life changes; you’re diagnosed with a mysterious illness and there’s only one way to cure it.

name: Myrk: Echoes of the Forgotten
summary:
Awaken the Scions. Reclaim the Elements. Unravel forgotten prophecy.

Step into the realm of MYRK: Echoes of the Forgotten, a story-rich RPG where elemental chaos has fractured the cosmos. Once guided by balance and prophecy, the world now lies in turmoil. You are one of the last Scions—beings chosen by fate to rise from centuries of slumber and confront the aftermath of the First Collapse

name: My Hot Beach Vacation
summary: My hot beach vacation tells the story of a salary man and your friends that goes to a hot beach in a summer vacation.

name: Mystery Dungeon Shiren the Wanderer
summary:
The mobile version of Fushigi no Dungeon: Furai no Shiren was released for iOS on March 12, 2019, in Japan. An Android version was also launched on the same date; however, it was temporarily removed from distribution due to technical issues and later re-released after fixes were implemented.

The smartphone release is based on the Nintendo DS version of Shiren the Wanderer and was adapted for mobile devices with touch controls and interface adjustments.

name: My Wife's Cheating on Me!
summary: This provocative visual novel offers a seductive blend of drama and eroticism, as you delve into the secrets of this couple’s relationship.

name: My Putrid Ponies
summary: A zombie ponies game where you have to survive with a shotgun.

name: My Sticker Zoo
summary: My Sticker Zoo is a relaxing strategy and puzzle game where you build your own zoo. Construct impressive habitats for your sticker animals by placing tiles. Manage a variety of wildlife parks as you unlock new scenario's. Collect all the stars, set new high-scores and become an expert ranger!

name: Mystery Island: Missing Amy
summary: The adventure begins when Ada, a young explorer, receives a mysterious selfie from her sister, who in fact disappeared months ago. ...... The background of the selfie is a mysterious island with blood-red sea water. Ada decides to go out on the sea to look for her sister……

name: My Aquarium
summary: "My Aquarium" runs at the bottom of the screen while you are doing other things, making it an idle aquarium simulator you can enjoy comfortably.

name: My Bimbo Dream: Season 1
summary: As Randall, you’ll guide Sue, your loving landlady, as her values erode and desires awaken. A visual novel of bimbofication, twisted love, and sexual corruption. Will she become your perfect woman?

name: Mystery Mania
summary: Solve the mysteries of the mansion! Our award-winning point-and-click adventure is now freshly designed for iPhone and iPod touch.

name: My Bird
summary: Your bird is one of the first birds to learn the basics of jet-powered flight

name: My Bike
summary: Choose from one of three different motorcycle models and try it on the track!

name: Mystery of Unicorn Castle
summary: Jane Morion always considered herself to be an ordinary girl. Then a letter from England arrived describing the inheritance of a family castle. Solve a looming mystery where dreams and magic intertwine. Explore rooms inside the castle while detecting hidden objects. Can you reveal the secrets of the manor's inhabitants and discover the Morion legacy? The Mystery of Unicorn Castle contains a dark spell thats haunted the family for centuries.

name: Myrkwood: Offshoot
summary: Myrkwood: Offshoot is a top-down survival defense game that you can play with friends! Defend the Gem as you fight through waves of enemies!

name: My Hooptie
summary: Fix up your crappy car and build the engine yourself. Make money by selling wood, potatoes, mining ores, or racing. Explore the map, manage survival, Build your story set in America, 2002.

name: Mystery Quest
summary: Mystery quest - Mysterious things are going on in the magical world. Help the young sorceress collect all the scattered things and put things in order in the possessions of her teacher, and maybe then she will share the secrets of magic with you..

name: My Cinema World
summary:
Welcome to My Cinema World , a leader among cinema games, where your mini screen dreams turn into empire realities!

Ever fantasized about owning an idle cinema empire? Here, you're not just playing; you're on a thrilling quest to become a mogul in this little universe. Begin with a modest single screen and strategically build up to a dazzling global idle cinema empire! Our game sets itself apart from other idle games with its deep engagement and strategic management, perfect for players who love to see their empire grow with each session.

name: Myst: The Age of Rime
summary:
The Age of Rime introduces players to the snowy, mountainous seascape that Atrus and his family would visit in years past, before the events of Myst and Riven upended their lives. Sweeping vistas, beautiful ice structures, and fantastical natural phenomena await new visitors.

This breathtaking new Age also houses a detailed laboratory space where bold experiments were made, delving into the mysterious nature of Linking Books themselves. This new version of Rime includes all-new narrative beats, new lore, and new sights to behold.

name: Myths of Switzerland
summary: Myths of Switzerland is a survival horror adventure where you play as Alice and Felix, trapped in a nightmarish world twisted by ancient Swiss folklore. Face the unimaginable, uncover forgotten legends, and survive the terrifying myths that were never meant to be remembered. Will you Survive ?

name: My Femboy Maid
summary: A new maid has started work, but they're a femboy?!

name: MyVegas Bingo
summary: Leave that weekend church game behind. This is Bingo taken to a whole new level. From the stunning graphics to the energetic animations to the playful power up’s, myVEGAS Bingo has it all. Each time you play, you’ll have access to the most exclusive rooms and iconic resorts on the Las Vegas Strip – like MGM Grand, Bellagio, and Excalibur.

name: MyVegas Blackjack
summary: myVEGAS Blackjack elevates the thrill of traditional blackjack with creative twists and exciting features—like a daily bonus gift box, progressive jackpots, mini-games, and a “Bold Play Meter” that rewards extra risk with additional payouts. It’s a safe bet that you’ll love the stunning graphics, themed casinos, and the fan-favorite ShaqJack game in this amped-up—and endlessly modern—version of everyone’s favorite casino-floor classic.

name: MyKonami Slots
summary: myKONAMI Slots puts the hottest, real-world casino games in the palm of your hand, letting you enjoy the most authentic slot machine action, any time, any place. From linked progressives, to multiplayer tournaments, if you’re a slot purist, then this is the game for you.

name: Mythokyn Nightfall
summary: Chaos erupts on your Warden Initiation night as comets rain from the sky. Pick a starting Mythokyn to aid you as you traverse through the chaos of the night, fighting and capturing Mythokyn on your way back to the safety of the city of Gladehaven in this creature-collecting action roguelike game

name: My Arcade
summary: An arcade bundle by CWDI GAMES. Includes three arcade games; Chaos, Meteor Storm, and The Eternal Maze.

name: Mystic
summary: Survive in a retro-futuristic world filled with Jinns, animals, and other spiritual entities based on eastern fantasies in the spirit of Arabian Nights and middle-eastern history. Gather, craft, evade and ultimately fight your way to an epic battle between Man vs Jinn.

name: My Little Coffee Shop
summary: Open the doors of your own coffee shop and immerse yourself in the world of fragrant coffee! In My Little Coffee Shop, you will have to: prepare different types of coffee and desserts; serve customers and fulfill their orders; decorate and improve the interior of your coffee shop; expand your business and discover new opportunities. Create the most cozy place in the city where everyone will find their favorite drink.

name: My Hotel Simulator
summary: Build and manage your own hotel, from a small property to a luxury resort. Design rooms, maintain cleanliness, develop amenities, and offer guests unforgettable experiences at your hotel!

name: My Peephole: Hotel Harborview
summary: One room. One hole. One judgement. Watch the guests through your peephole, inspect their documents, dial the telephone, and judge who's normal and who's not. Do your job properly to avoid the demon's punishment.

name: My Name Is...
summary: Survival horror about sanity balancing affecting gameplay in a steampunk world of phobias, full of dangerous entities, anomalies and randomly generated puzzles.

name: My Hero: Before the Conquest
summary: This is a turn-based card game. Build a powerful team, reasonably arrange your cards according to the environment, and fully utilize the equipment, potions, and scrolls you have obtained. Keep fighting until you reach the deepest part of the enemy's territory!

name: My Boo Album
summary:
Boo boo, hey you! It you love My Boo, you can't miss the official sticker album from your favorite pet monster!
Earn FREE packets every day and rip them open to find surprise themed stickers that you can stick to your album or even exchange with friends!
Each page of your album has its own story to tell. Can you unveil them all?

name: My Tiny Garden
summary: My Tiny Garden is a cozy idle game that runs at the bottom of your screen. Plant cute plants, water, fertilize, and prune them. Earn coins to unlock new pots, plants, and stands. Decorate your desktop and relax while working, studying, or browsing.

name: Mystic Beauty: Anime Shift Puzzles
summary: Explore the charm of Mystic Beauty - Anime Shift Puzzles! Shift pieces to reveal stunning anime art in a relaxing and captivating puzzle experience.

name: My Car My Life
summary: Build the car of your dreams to compete in intense drag races, featuring detailed mechanics, advanced customization, and realistic physics. Tune every part of the engine, control the revs with precision, and win through reaction and skill.

name: My Cozy Aquarium
summary: Dive into a cozy underwater world where caring for fish and decorating aquariums becomes your most relaxing adventure.

name: My Lovely Flower
summary: A PS1-style horror game where you run a flower shop, grow blooms, and craft bouquets for mysterious customers. Uncover secrets buried in soil as tension slowly takes root.

name: Mycopsychosys: Project Jupiter
summary: Explore, investigate, and survive this new infection. Collect clues, meet and interact with people, and bond with the main cast. Solve the mysteries like a true detective and follow the non-linear narrative. Are you ready to face this new deadly infection?

name: Mystery Island: Enigmatic Painting
summary: After a difficult journey, Ada officially became a detective. This disappearance commission seemed extraordinary. During the exploration of the ancient castle, it seemed that a series of strange events also surfaced...

name: My Eerie Lair
summary: A dark cozy ‘Romantasy’ furnishing game where a vampire kidnaps his beloved and tries to win her heart by turning his eerie castle into their dream home.

name: My Housetopia
summary: "My Housetopia" is a relaxing sticker-based game where you can decorate everything from cozy rooms to grand villas. Enjoy endless mode, free creation, and community mods. No time limits—just pure creative fun, anytime, anywhere. Design your dream home without pressure!

name: Myosotis
summary: Myosotis is a narrative-driven game following Frank Miller, an elderly man living alone after his wife’s passing. As days blur and nights grow darker, familiar places change, memories twist, and reality itself begins to slip away through conversation and story-driven moments.

name: My Dream Garage
summary: Design and customize your dream garage, showcase your car collection, and create a unique space that reflects your style!

name: My Cold Girlfriend
summary: What's It Like to Have a Girlfriend with a Hidden Side? A romantic comedy visual novel set in a modern campus, where a dare leads to an unexpected relationship with a cold beautyand a sweet, chaotic cohabitation begins.

name: My Little Spider
summary: Adopt a cute pet spider that lives anywhere on your desktop! Team up to discover unique bugs, decorate their web, and unlock adorable spider hats as you work or relax.

name: Myth Guardians
summary: A strategic defense game where legendary gods become towers to repel the advancing demon hordes. Place, upgrade, and merge towers to create synergies, and use tactical placement and skills to hold the line.

name: My Retro World
summary: Build the retro world of your dreams: from chill vaporwave vibes to neon retrowave skylines, from 90s suburbs to futuristic cityscapes, all in the most nostalgic sandbox...

name: My Furry Dragon
summary: Oh no, the kingdom is preparing for war, and the princess has been captured by the Terrifying Dragon. Now you must travel through the Dreadful Forest to find the princess and fight the evil dragon. But what if the Dragon is not evil at all?..

name: My Dream Setup: Sim Racing
summary: Do you want to create your dream Sim Racing setup? With the Sim Racing DLC, it's finally possible! You can create any setup you want. Any size, any color combination, any budget - from casual desk racers to full professional rigs - it's all up to you.

name: Mysterious House
summary: A wave of disappearances. A rabbit blamed. As fear turns the apartment into a cage of paranoia, a venomous rumor takes hold. But dig deeper, and you'll find a truth far more sinister than any beast—a reality colder than murder.....

name: My Little Farm
summary: A first-person fast-food simulator where you run your own fried chicken shop. Cook, fry, serve, and manage the chaos with juicy physics, sizzling kitchens, and hungry customers.

name: My Devil's Voice
summary: The infernal authorities entrusted the Ambitious Demon with a new business - to look after a small town. He is already ready to lead the inhabitants to the most terrible manifestations of the Fall in their lives, but, unfortunately, the heavenly administration also does not sleep and directs her to counterbalance the equally ambitious angel in order to maintain the balance of power. You have to help the demon in the confrontation with the angel and persuade the inhabitants of the city to fall into sin.

name: Mystery and Magic: Escape Room Bundle
summary:
Two escape room games are included!
Secrets of Blackrock Manor - Escape Room and Mystic Academy: Escape Room.

name: My Family Tree
summary:
Originally made for Narrative Driven Jam 12. The theme was asymmetry and it made me think of a family tree with unbalanced branches. Missed the deadline and forgot about it for while, but finally wrapped up the loose ends and decided to post it anyway!

"In this game, your goal is to piece together your family tree from phone conversations and sticky notes. As you learn information, more stickies will appear and be able to place on your tree by hovering over the right spot. It's rather short, but I hope you like it!

Shoutout to my TikTok followers for providing feedback on the phone voices and helping guide me to this iteration of this sound effect, where short clips are selected and played randomly to give it a little more realism.

Content warning: death. Nobody dies during the game, but not all the family members are still around. Just a heads up if you don't wanna engage with that right now." -Description on official itch.io page

name: My Winter Car
summary: My Winter Car is the ultimate challenge for project car owning, building, fixing, tuning and maintenance simulator. Sequel to My Summer Car, but with added challenge for those who can master the original game!

name: Myrne 6313
summary: Myrne 6313 is a mix between the extraction shooter genre and corporate life. Survive an hostile office space where each step can be your last. Help HR find their stapler, get chased by security dogs, clear your inbox, fight cultists in the parking lot, learn magic… And more!

name: My Neighbor's Lonely Wife 2
summary: After moving to a new house, you quickly meet the beautiful young wife next door, Haruka Aoi. Chat with her, befriend her, and make her lonely heart slowly succumb to your charms.

name: My Existential Crisis
summary: Are you interested behind the scenes of indie game development? Then, this short-quiz game is for you. Test your knowledge of history of indie game development and then unlock a comedic short cartoon animation called "My Existential Crisis"

name: Mystical Herbalists
summary: A tactical alchemy board-game. Gather herbs, master recipes, finish missions, and compete in local hot-seat multiplayer.

name: My Winter Drive
summary:
Brace yourself for a chilly adventure through icy roads and snowy landscapes. In My Winter Drive, you take the wheel of various vehicles and navigate realistic winter conditions where every curve, skid, and snowdrift tests your driving skills.
Whether you're delivering cargo, rescuing stranded travelers, or just enjoying the serene beauty of frozen wilderness, this game offers a true-to-life winter driving experience with immersive physics and dynamic weather.

name: Mystery Horror Bundle: Saint Kotar & Charon's Staircase
summary: Face your fears, solve puzzles, and unravel secrets in Saint Kotar and Charon's Staircase.

name: My Sexy Neighbour 2
summary: Run a spicy blog, take crazy dares from your fans, and sneak around your neighborhood to deliver the wildest content online. From naughty pranks to full-on adult missions — it's all about cash, chaos, and keeping it sexy. Don't get caught.

name: My Wife Wants to Be a Professional Cosplayer?!
summary: Your wife's almost thirty, and she loves cosplay more than anything. So this year, she made a vow: to try her hand at becoming a professional cosplayer and take the internet by storm! And you... Well, as her husband, it's your duty to help your hot wife fulfill her dreams!

name: Myths & Rites
summary:
Take on the role of a legendary guardian and face mythical creatures in strategic turn-based battles. Build your deck, combine attack, defense, and ritual skill cards to purify the corrupted forces and restore balance between man and nature.

Each card is a fragment of ancient power.
Each battle, a rite of redemption.

name: Mystery Trackers: Raincliff's Phantoms - Collector's Edition
Mythic Wonders: The Philosopher's Stone - Collector's Edition
Mythic Kart Maker
summary: Mythic Kart Maker is fantasy kart racing level editor, with vehicular combat, whimsical characters, & a vibrant 3D prerendered art-style, with gameplay akin to classic "kart racers".

name: Mything
summary: Gather your monsters and fight against the Gods of Greek mythology in this idle battler. Collect and upgrade your units.

name: My Little Haven
summary: Step into the beautiful dream world and help your toy friends settle into their miniature cozy homes!

name: My Voice Zoo
summary: My Voice Zoo is a unique idle zoo game brought to life with your own voice. Record your sounds through the microphone and turn them into animal calls, creating a one-of-a-kind zoo found nowhere else. Start building your very own zoo, complete only with your voice!

name: My Idle Space Cruiser
summary: On board a space cruiser, you'll travel the actual distance of the entire universe known to man.

name: My Sadistic Girlfriends
summary: Experience a sexual and sensual day with Rikina and Kyoka, your 302cm and 303cm tall sadistic girlfriends.

name: Mytosis
summary: Mytosis is a short, experimental incremental game about evolving life forms from simple cells to complex procedural organisms.

name: My Little Sister Is an Angel
summary: "Hey, wanna try becoming a god?" After saving an angel, introvert Yuki gets pulled into divine training, and the Archangel moves in as his “little sister” to guide him. A warm supernatural romance VN where your choices lead to 4 endings.

name: Mystics Ablaze
summary: Magi, spirits and occultists clash with colorful crystal orbs and explosive teleportation! Mystics Ablaze is a deep and spectacular couch fighting game for 2-4 players unlike anything you’ve ever played.

name: Myth of Yggdrasil
summary: Discover an MMORPG that honors its origins while embracing modern times. Myth of Yggdrasil offers an experience that welcomes players with strategic freedom, modern features, and the comfort to evolve at their own pace. Explore a classic universe, reimagined and full of surprises. An open future, ready for a new story, awaits you.

name: My Beautiful Misinterpretation of Words
summary: "My Beautiful Misinterpretation of Words" is a collection of experimental art games I vomited over the span of a year. The gameplay and visuals dramatically varies every moment. One may say it is less of a "game" but more of an "experience". Now, I welcome you into my mind.

name: My Home Dream
summary:
My Home Dream is the first simulation game in which the player can create a home of his own, setting up room layouts, walls, garden, etc on a grid using a simple input system. You can choose from a lot of different furnitures, floor tiles, roofs, doors, windows, electronics, etc.

There are different kind of styles, house and furnitures so anyone can be an inside decorator of bathrooms, kitchens, bedrooms, etc.

name: My evil magician boss suddenly loves me?!
summary: Erotic dating sim with minigames! Play as the manager of a magic workshop! Explore dungeons, gather resources and forge weapons for sale. Make your boss fall for you and spoil her to bits by gifting her various outfits!

name: My Wife Serves the King
summary: MY WIFE SERVES THE KING is a visual novel set in a world of intrigue and passion. Your wife serves the king, and only you can decide whether to accept this or fight for her love.

name: My New Paranormal Life
summary: My New Paranormal Life is a story-rich, erotic visual novel focused on its dating-sim and sandbox aspects.

name: Mysterious Experiment Quiz
summary: Enter the lab of logic and intuition—can you survive this mysterious quiz experiment?

name: Myth of Valderit
summary:
Myth of Valderit is a psychological horror experience set in the cursed village of Valderit, inspired by the abandoned Catalan village of La Mussara. You wake up as Nil, separated from your friends Julia and Enric, and soon uncover the dark secrets lurking within the village…

This single-player, first-person experience combines exploration, survival, and puzzle-solving. Nil must endure and remain alive, evading the fanatical devotees of an unimaginable entity.

name: My NEET Life
summary: When a business-woman approaches NEET prodigy Akiko with the proposition that could change her life, she enters an entirely bigger world outside of her bedroom, full of work and... well, more work.
